talk__description: Sir Ken Robinson makes an entertaining and profoundly moving case for creating an education system that nurtures (rather than undermines) creativity.

让我们丧失了创造力。","time":365000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么会这样？","time":368000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"五年前，我住在Stratford-on-Avon。","time":370000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我已经搬到了洛杉矶。","time":374000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可想而知，这是个多么合乎逻辑的移居。","time":376000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）其实，","time":380000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时我们住在 Snitterfield","time":382000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就在 Stratford 郊外，那里是","time":384000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"莎士比亚父亲的出生地。
你有过灵感吗？我曾经有过。","time":386000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你没把莎士比亚

没有哪个国家的教育体系","time":520000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"天天安排舞蹈课","time":523000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但却每天都安排数学课。为什么？","time":525000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么不是每天安排舞蹈课呢？

也是塔尖上的人。（笑声）","time":577000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我倾慕大学教授的学识，但","time":580000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不应该用这样一个头衔作为

他们只用脑子生活。","time":597000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且偏重于大脑的一侧。","time":600000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用书面语来说就是--他们脑体分离。","time":602000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们只是把身体当作","time":606000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大脑的载体而已，难道不是吗？","time":608000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声)这个载体可以载着大脑去开会。","time":617000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你想亲身体验","time":624000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你就去参加一次会议","time":627000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"--学术研讨会，","time":630000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后在会议结束后再去迪厅蹦迪。","time":632000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）在那你会看到，成年男女","time":635000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在不和乐拍地疯狂摇摆。","time":639000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"期待夜晚的结束好回家

从小就不让他们碰触。","time":673000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"理由就是","time":675000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不这样学就找不到工作。对吗？","time":677000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别玩音乐了，你成不了音乐家；","time":680000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别画画了，你成不了艺术家。","time":682000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些温和的忠告--
筑成现在的大错。全世界","time":685000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都被卷入了工业革命的热潮。","time":689000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第二点，学术能力已经成为","time":690000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"衡量好学生的主要标准","time":693000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种标准是那些大学自己制定的。","time":694000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只要你思考一下就会发现整个教育体系","time":697000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不论哪个国家的公共教育
都是一种按部就班的程序","time":699000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最终目标是为了考入大学。","time":701000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"造成的后果就是许多很有天才的","time":703000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有创造力的学生被钝化了。","time":706000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为这些学生发现他们的专长在学校","time":708000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并不受重视甚至还受到蔑视。","time":710000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为我们不能再这样扼杀孩子们的天才了。","time":714000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"根据联合国教科文组织的统计，今后30年","time":716000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"全世界毕业的学生将超过","time":718000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"过去的总和。","time":721000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是人口增长造成的，
人口增长关系到","time":723000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们谈论的许多话题--","time":725000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"包括技术和技术变革
对生产力的影响、人口统计学","time":727000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"及人口爆炸。","time":730000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很快，文凭就不再有含金量了。是这样吧？","time":732000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我上学那会儿，有文凭就有工作。","time":735000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时候如果你没工作，那是因为你不想找。","time":739000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说实话，我那时候就是这样。（笑声）","time":742000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但现在的状况是，孩子们有文凭却经常","time":745000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"呆在家里打电脑游戏，","time":750000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为以前只要学士学位的工作岗位
现在需要硕士学位，","time":751000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在还没毕业的孩子将来
就得有个博士学位才好找工作。","time":754000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是学术学位的通货膨胀。","time":757000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是整个教育体系","time":759000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"坍塌的前兆。我们必须从根本上反思","time":761000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们评价好学生的标准。","time":763000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"培养人才有三个原则","time":764000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一，多样化。
我们认知世界的角度不同","time":766000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有的从视觉角度，","time":769000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有的从听觉角度，有的从美学角度","time":771000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有的从抽象的角度，
有的从动态的角度。","time":774000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第二，好学生应该是充满活力的。","time":777000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果观察一下人类大脑的内部组织，就像我们","time":779000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"昨天所看到的演讲中演示的，","time":782000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大脑发育具有关联性。","time":785000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大脑不应被分成几部分。","time":787000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其实我认为应该创造性地
把大脑看作一整套工序--","time":790000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"生产有价值的原创想法的工序--","time":793000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种原创想法往往来自互动的思考方式","time":795000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不是呆板的常规模式。","time":798000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"大脑本来就是","time":801000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"由神经来连接左脑和右脑","time":803000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个连接部分叫胼胝体（医学名词）。
女性大脑中的这个部分比男性的要厚。","time":806000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"昨天听了Helen的演讲受到启发，我认为","time":808000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"脑部特征可能使女性更善于
应对头绪纷乱的事情。","time":810000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对吗？","time":814000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"虽然关于这方面的研究有很多，
但我对于这方面的了解 其实来源于我的亲身体验。","time":816000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我妻子在家做饭时--","time":819000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"感谢上帝，她不常做饭，（笑声）","time":821000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"虽然她不擅厨艺但很擅长其他一些事--","time":825000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不过她做饭时总是","time":828000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"打打电话，","time":830000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和孩子们说说话，给天棚刷刷漆，","time":832000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还在旁边做开胸手术。","time":835000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而我做饭时就会关上厨房门，
不让孩子们进来打扰，","time":838000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不打电话，这时如果我妻子进来我会很生气。","time":841000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我会这样对我妻子说：
“Terry，我在煎鸡蛋，请你别打扰。”（笑声）","time":844000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大家都知道那句有哲理的话--","time":857000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果森林里有棵树倒了可没人听到，","time":859000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是否意味着没发生过？记得这句话吗？","time":862000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最近我看到一件很棒的T恤，
上面印着：“如果一个男人说出他的心声","time":865000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"却是在森林里说的，而且没被女人听到，","time":868000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那应该不算犯错吧？”（笑声）","time":871000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"培养好学生的第三个原则就是--","time":880000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"个性化。我目前在写本书--","time":883000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"书名叫《顿悟》，素材来自一些","time":885000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"访谈，访谈内容是关于怎样发现","time":887000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"自身的才能。对于这点我很感兴趣。","time":889000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"激发我写这本书的原因是一次对话","time":891000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我采访了一位很优秀的女士，也许很多人","time":894000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没听说过这个人，她叫Gillian Lynne,","time":896000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们知道这个人吗？应该有人知道吧。
她是一个舞蹈编剧","time":898000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所有人都知道她的作品。","time":900000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她编舞的作品有《猫》、《歌剧魅影》。","time":902000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她很有才华。我在英国看过
由皇家芭蕾舞团演出的她的作品。","time":904000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们也看过她的作品。","time":908000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有一次，我和Gillian 吃午饭，我问她：","time":910000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“Gillian,你是怎样成为舞蹈家的？她回答说：","time":912000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说起来很有意思，她上学的时候，","time":914000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"觉得自己完全没有希望。
她上学那会儿是1930年代，","time":916000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"老师给她家长写信说：“我们认为","time":919000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Gillian患有学习障碍症。”她无法集中注意力，","time":921000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她老是坐不安生。
用现在的话讲，那意思就是","time":923000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她有多动症。你们也这么想吧？
但那时候是1930年代，","time":925000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“多动症”这个词还没出现。","time":929000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那个老师用词不当。（笑声）","time":932000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时候人们还不知道用“多动症”这个词。","time":935000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"于是，Gillian去看病。","time":939000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她妈妈带她去的，","time":943000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"医生让她坐在椅子上，","time":946000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她把手压在腿下，这样过了20分钟","time":949000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她妈妈一直在向医生讲述","time":951000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Gillian在学校的表现：","time":953000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她在学校不安生，","time":957000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她总是晚交作业，等等，","time":959000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其实不过是个才8岁的孩子--最后，
医生走过去坐到","time":961000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Gillian的旁边对她说：“Gillian,","time":964000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你妈妈跟我说了很多","time":966000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我想和你妈妈单独谈谈。”","time":968000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“你在这儿等一下，我们马上谈完。”","time":970000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"医生和她妈妈出去了。","time":973000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但医生在出去时把收音机打开了","time":975000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"收音机在医生办公桌上。在他们","time":977000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"走出房间后，医生对她妈妈说:","time":979000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我们就站在这儿观察一下她。
”他们离开房间后，","time":981000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Gillian站起来，随着音乐跳起舞来。","time":984000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她妈妈和医生在门外看了几分钟","time":988000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"医生对她妈妈说：","time":990000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Lynne太太，Gillian没病，
她是个舞蹈天才。","time":993000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让她去上舞蹈学校吧。”","time":997000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"话说到这，我问Gillian：“后来怎么样了？”","time":999000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她回答道：“我妈妈送我去了舞蹈学校。
我无法形容那里有多棒。","time":1001000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那里有很多","time":1004000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像我这样的人--坐不住的人。","time":1006000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们必须在动态中才能思考。”","time":1009000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们跳芭蕾，跳踢踏舞，跳爵士舞，","time":1012000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跳现代舞。","time":1014000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"后来她考入皇家芭蕾舞学校，","time":1016000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成为芭蕾舞女主演，事业发展很成功","time":1019000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从那毕业后","time":1021000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从皇家芭蕾舞学校毕业后","time":1023000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她成立了自己的公司
--Gillian Lynne 舞蹈公司","time":1025000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"遇到了Andrew Lloyd Weber
（注：歌舞剧《猫》的编曲者）。她负责","time":1028000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"担任过一些极其成功的音乐剧的编舞","time":1031000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她给数以万计的观众带来了艺术享受，","time":1033000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她也是个亿万富翁。可是，有人","time":1038000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也许曾认为她有多动症命令她","time":1041000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“冷静。”","time":1045000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"现在，我想说的是--（掌声）","time":1047000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"AL Gore（注：美国前副总统） 
曾在这里做过一次演讲","time":1050000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"内容是关于生态学以及Rachel Carson
引发的那次环境保护运动。","time":1052000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我相信对于未来，我们的唯一出路","time":1055000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是贯彻一种新的人性化生态的思想，","time":1059000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也就是说我们应重新定义","time":1062000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人类能力的多样化。","time":1066000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的教育体系培养我们的方式","time":1068000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"正如我们开采地球的方式--
以功利为目的。","time":1072000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这种方式对于未来将不再适用。","time":1074000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们必须重新思考那些最基本的准则","time":1077000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也就是我们教育孩子的准则。","time":1080000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Jonas Salk曾说过：“如果所有的昆虫","time":1082000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都从地球上消失的话，","time":1086000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么50年之内，所有生命也将从地球上消失。","time":1089000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而如果人类从地球上消失的话，","time":1092000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么50年之内，其他物种会活得更好。”","time":1095000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他说的很对。","time":1099000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"TED倡导的是人类的创造性思维。","time":1101000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在，我们必须运用这种思维方式小心地","time":1104000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"避开那些按部就班的规则","time":1108000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"达到这个目的唯一的方法","time":1111000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就是运用创造力","time":1115000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最大限度地发挥创造力，而且","time":1118000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用孩子们喜欢的方式培养他们。
我们的任务","time":1120000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是全方位地培养孩子，
这样他们才能面对未来的社会。","time":1123000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"顺便说句--我们可能活不到未来那天","time":1126000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但孩子们会。而我们要做的就是帮助","time":1129000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们能在未来有所作为。谢谢大家。","time":1132000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"66","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"7223","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"Good morning. How are you?","time":2103,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Audience) Good.","time":4702,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"It's been great, hasn't it?","time":6129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've been blown away by the whole thing.","time":8408,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, I'm leaving.","time":10753,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":12269,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"There have been three themes
running through the conference,","time":18096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which are relevant
to what I want to talk about.","time":21687,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One is the extraordinary
evidence of human creativity","time":23997,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in all of the presentations that we've had","time":28491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and in all of the people here;","time":30928,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just the variety of it
and the range of it.","time":32904,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The second is that it's put us in a place","time":36158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where we have no idea
what's going to happen","time":38325,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in terms of the future.","time":40846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No idea how this may play out.","time":42261,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I have an interest in education.","time":45270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Actually, what I find is,
everybody has an interest in education.","time":46916,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Don't you?","time":51352,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I find this very interesting.","time":52693,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you're at a dinner party,
and you say you work in education --","time":54119,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"actually, you're not often
at dinner parties, frankly.","time":58101,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":60870,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"If you work in education,
you're not asked.","time":64690,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":67142,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And you're never asked back, curiously.
That's strange to me.","time":70345,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But if you are, and you say to somebody,","time":74328,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you know, they say, "What do you do?"","time":76568,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you say you work in education,","time":78370,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you can see the blood run from their face.","time":80082,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're like, "Oh my God. Why me?"","time":82155,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":83864,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""My one night out all week."","time":86164,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":87712,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But if you ask about their education,
they pin you to the wall,","time":90346,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because it's one of those things
that goes deep with people, am I right?","time":93611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Like religion and money and other things.","time":97042,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I have a big interest in education,
and I think we all do.","time":100559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have a huge vested interest in it,","time":105025,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"partly because it's education
that's meant to take us into this future","time":106851,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that we can't grasp.","time":110195,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you think of it,","time":111873,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"children starting school this year
will be retiring in 2065.","time":113063,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nobody has a clue,","time":120272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"despite all the expertise that's been
on parade for the past four days,","time":121867,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what the world will look like
in five years' time.","time":125450,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And yet, we're meant
to be educating them for it.","time":128000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So the unpredictability,
I think, is extraordinary.","time":130318,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And the third part of this
is that we've all agreed, nonetheless,","time":132892,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on the really extraordinary
capacities that children have --","time":136344,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"their capacities for innovation.","time":141673,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I mean, Sirena last night
was a marvel, wasn't she?","time":144032,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just seeing what she could do.","time":146845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she's exceptional, but I think
she's not, so to speak,","time":148539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"exceptional in the whole of childhood.","time":154112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What you have there is a person
of extraordinary dedication","time":157041,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who found a talent.","time":159896,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And my contention is,
all kids have tremendous talents,","time":161091,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we squander them, pretty ruthlessly.","time":163701,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I want to talk about education,","time":166119,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I want to talk about creativity.","time":168000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My contention is that creativity now
is as important in education as literacy,","time":169896,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we should treat it
with the same status.","time":176016,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":178827,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":179963,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":181176,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"That was it, by the way.
Thank you very much.","time":185485,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":187795,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So, 15 minutes left.","time":189934,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":191635,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""Well, I was born ... "","time":194816,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":196511,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I heard a great story recently --
I love telling it --","time":200006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of a little girl
who was in a drawing lesson.","time":202680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She was six, and she was
at the back, drawing,","time":205075,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the teacher said this girl
hardly ever paid attention,","time":207274,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and in this drawing lesson, she did.","time":210058,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The teacher was fascinated.","time":211868,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She went over to her,
and she said, "What are you drawing?"","time":213232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the girl said,
"I'm drawing a picture of God."","time":216045,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the teacher said, "But nobody
knows what God looks like."","time":219642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the girl said,
"They will in a minute."","time":222984,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":225096,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"When my son was four in England --","time":236662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"actually, he was four
everywhere, to be honest.","time":239413,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":241628,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"If we're being strict about it,
wherever he went, he was four that year.","time":243404,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He was in the Nativity play.
Do you remember the story?","time":246815,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":249477,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"No, it was big, it was a big story.","time":250720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Mel Gibson did the sequel,
you may have seen it.","time":252571,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":254900,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""Nativity II."","time":256185,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But James got the part of Joseph,
which we were thrilled about.","time":257770,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We considered this to be
one of the lead parts.","time":261678,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We had the place crammed
full of agents in T-shirts:","time":264608,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""James Robinson IS Joseph!"","time":267119,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":268557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He didn't have to speak, but you know
the bit where the three kings come in?","time":269614,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They come in bearing gifts,
gold, frankincense and myrrh.","time":273266,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This really happened.","time":275975,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We were sitting there, and I think
they just went out of sequence,","time":277157,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because we talked to the little boy
afterward and said,","time":280297,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""You OK with that?" They said,
"Yeah, why? Was that wrong?"","time":282900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They just switched.","time":285720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The three boys came in, four-year-olds
with tea towels on their heads.","time":286900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They put these boxes down, and the first
boy said, "I bring you gold."","time":290234,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the second boy said,
"I bring you myrrh."","time":293580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the third boy said, "Frank sent this."","time":295878,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":297984,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What these things have in common
is that kids will take a chance.","time":310711,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If they don't know, they'll have a go.","time":313825,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Am I right? They're not
frightened of being wrong.","time":317331,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't mean to say that being wrong
is the same thing as being creative.","time":320924,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What we do know is,
if you're not prepared to be wrong,","time":324886,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you'll never come up
with anything original --","time":328000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if you're not prepared to be wrong.","time":330391,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And by the time they get to be adults,
most kids have lost that capacity.","time":332995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They have become
frightened of being wrong.","time":337462,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we run our companies like this.","time":339950,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We stigmatize mistakes.","time":341664,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we're now running
national education systems","time":343340,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where mistakes are the worst
thing you can make.","time":345666,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the result is that
we are educating people","time":348800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"out of their creative capacities.","time":351932,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Picasso once said this, he said
that all children are born artists.","time":354298,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The problem is to remain
an artist as we grow up.","time":358749,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I believe this passionately,
that we don't grow into creativity,","time":361995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we grow out of it.","time":365251,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or rather, we get educated out of it.","time":366980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So why is this?","time":369607,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I lived in Stratford-on-Avon
until about five years ago.","time":372124,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, we moved from Stratford
to Los Angeles.","time":374931,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you can imagine
what a seamless transition this was.","time":377912,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":380560,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Actually, we lived in a place
called Snitterfield,","time":382000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just outside Stratford,","time":384400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which is where
Shakespeare's father was born.","time":385675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Are you struck by a new thought? I was.","time":388334,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You don't think of Shakespeare
having a father, do you?","time":390481,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Do you?","time":393100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because you don't think
of Shakespeare being a child, do you?","time":394497,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Shakespeare being seven?","time":397412,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I never thought of it.","time":398700,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I mean, he was seven at some point.","time":399900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He was in somebody's
English class, wasn't he?","time":401616,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":403906,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"How annoying would that be?","time":410717,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":412070,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""Must try harder."","time":419939,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":421303,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Being sent to bed by his dad,
to Shakespeare, "Go to bed, now!"","time":425559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"To William Shakespeare.","time":428564,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""And put the pencil down!"","time":429746,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":431041,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""And stop speaking like that."","time":432140,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":433641,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""It's confusing everybody."","time":437244,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":438592,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Anyway, we moved
from Stratford to Los Angeles,","time":443886,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I just want to say a word
about the transition.","time":449096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Actually, my son didn't want to come.","time":451596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've got two kids;
he's 21 now, my daughter's 16.","time":453422,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He didn't want to come to Los Angeles.","time":455841,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He loved it, but he had
a girlfriend in England.","time":458068,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This was the love of his life, Sarah.","time":461880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He'd known her for a month.","time":464761,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":466160,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Mind you, they'd had
their fourth anniversary,","time":467534,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because it's a long time when you're 16.","time":470837,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He was really upset on the plane.","time":472797,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He said, "I'll never find
another girl like Sarah."","time":474462,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we were rather pleased
about that, frankly --","time":476893,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":479231,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"because she was the main reason
we were leaving the country.","time":487434,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":490404,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But something strikes you
when you move to America","time":496141,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and travel around the world:","time":498527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"every education system on earth
has the same hierarchy of subjects.","time":499918,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Every one. Doesn't matter where you go.","time":503589,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You'd think it would be
otherwise, but it isn't.","time":505516,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"At the top are mathematics and languages,
then the humanities.","time":507810,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"At the bottom are the arts.
Everywhere on earth.","time":510815,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And in pretty much every system, too,
there's a hierarchy within the arts.","time":513130,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Art and music are normally given
a higher status in schools","time":517519,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"than drama and dance.","time":520400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There isn't an education
system on the planet","time":521852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that teaches dance every day to children","time":523983,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the way we teach them mathematics.","time":525926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why?","time":527600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why not?","time":528782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think this is rather important.","time":529973,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think math is very important,
but so is dance.","time":531591,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Children dance all the time
if they're allowed to, we all do.","time":533879,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We all have bodies, don't we?
Did I miss a meeting?","time":536783,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":539257,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Truthfully, what happens is,
as children grow up,","time":542645,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we start to educate them progressively
from the waist up.","time":544990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then we focus on their heads.","time":547728,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And slightly to one side.","time":549378,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"If you were to visit education as an alien","time":552044,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and say "What's it for, public education?"","time":554139,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think you'd have to conclude,
if you look at the output,","time":557144,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who really succeeds by this,","time":559895,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who does everything they should,","time":561276,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who gets all the brownie points,
who are the winners --","time":563000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think you'd have to conclude
the whole purpose of public education","time":565755,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"throughout the world","time":569017,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is to produce university professors.","time":570239,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Isn't it?","time":572718,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're the people who come out the top.","time":573910,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I used to be one, so there.","time":575918,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":577761,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And I like university professors,","time":581482,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but, you know, we shouldn't hold them up","time":583106,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as the high-water mark
of all human achievement.","time":585045,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're just a form of life.","time":588000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Another form of life.","time":590137,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But they're rather curious.","time":591584,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I say this out of affection for them:","time":593005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there's something curious
about professors.","time":594993,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In my experience -- not all of them,
but typically -- they live in their heads.","time":597092,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They live up there
and slightly to one side.","time":600862,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're disembodied, you know,
in a kind of literal way.","time":603495,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They look upon their body as a form
of transport for their heads.","time":606955,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":610129,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Don't they?","time":616200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's a way of getting
their head to meetings.","time":617601,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":619770,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"If you want real evidence
of out-of-body experiences, by the way,","time":625022,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"get yourself along to a residential
conference of senior academics","time":628968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and pop into the discotheque
on the final night.","time":632467,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":634842,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And there, you will see it.","time":637478,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Grown men and women
writhing uncontrollably, off the beat.","time":638858,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":643375,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Waiting until it ends, so they can
go home and write a paper about it.","time":645891,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":649240,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Our education system is predicated
on the idea of academic ability.","time":651245,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And there's a reason.","time":655130,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Around the world, there were
no public systems of education,","time":656325,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"really, before the 19th century.","time":659978,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They all came into being
to meet the needs of industrialism.","time":662109,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So the hierarchy is rooted on two ideas.","time":665380,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Number one, that the most useful
subjects for work are at the top.","time":667456,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you were probably steered benignly away
from things at school","time":672042,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when you were a kid,","time":675099,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"things you liked,","time":676275,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on the grounds you would never
get a job doing that.","time":677452,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Is that right?","time":679918,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Don't do music, you're not
going to be a musician;","time":681093,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"don't do art, you won't be an artist."","time":683529,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Benign advice -- now, profoundly mistaken.","time":685404,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The whole world
is engulfed in a revolution.","time":688174,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And the second is academic ability,","time":690343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which has really come to dominate
our view of intelligence,","time":692464,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because the universities design
the system in their image.","time":695307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you think of it,","time":698070,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the whole system of public education
around the world is a protracted process","time":699245,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of university entrance.","time":702933,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the consequence is
that many highly talented,","time":704108,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"brilliant, creative people
think they're not,","time":706425,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because the thing
they were good at at school","time":708967,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"wasn't valued,
or was actually stigmatized.","time":711124,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I think we can't afford
to go on that way.","time":713450,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"In the next 30 years, according to UNESCO,","time":715703,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"more people worldwide will be
graduating through education","time":718014,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"than since the beginning of history.","time":721444,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"More people.","time":723663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it's the combination
of all the things we've talked about:","time":724844,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"technology and its
transformational effect on work,","time":727789,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and demography and the huge
explosion in population.","time":730206,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Suddenly, degrees aren't worth anything.","time":732708,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Isn't that true?","time":735169,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I was a student,
if you had a degree, you had a job.","time":736870,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you didn't have a job,
it's because you didn't want one.","time":739875,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I didn't want one, frankly.","time":742697,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":745055,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But now kids with degrees
are often heading home","time":746670,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to carry on playing video games,","time":750499,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because you need an MA
where the previous job required a BA,","time":752317,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and now you need a PhD for the other.","time":755389,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's a process of academic inflation.","time":757200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it indicates the whole structure
of education is shifting beneath our feet.","time":759000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We need to radically rethink
our view of intelligence.","time":762780,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"We know three things about intelligence.","time":765346,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One, it's diverse.","time":767294,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We think about the world in all the ways
that we experience it.","time":768469,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We think visually, we think in sound,
we think kinesthetically.","time":771474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We think in abstract terms,
we think in movement.","time":774475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Secondly, intelligence is dynamic.","time":776820,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you look at the interactions
of a human brain,","time":779673,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as we heard yesterday
from a number of presentations,","time":782000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"intelligence is wonderfully interactive.","time":785047,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The brain isn't divided into compartments.","time":787229,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, creativity --","time":789872,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which I define as the process of having
original ideas that have value --","time":791470,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"more often than not comes about","time":795514,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"through the interaction of different
disciplinary ways of seeing things.","time":797468,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"By the way, there's a shaft of nerves
that joins the two halves of the brain,","time":802472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"called the corpus callosum.","time":806127,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's thicker in women.","time":807449,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Following off from Helen yesterday,","time":809471,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this is probably why women
are better at multitasking.","time":811218,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because you are, aren't you?","time":814253,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's a raft of research,
but I know it from my personal life.","time":816102,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If my wife is cooking a meal
at home, which is not often ...","time":819865,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"thankfully.","time":824224,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":825414,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"No, she's good at some things.","time":828128,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But if she's cooking,
she's dealing with people on the phone,","time":829604,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"she's talking to the kids,
she's painting the ceiling --","time":832523,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":835194,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"she's doing open-heart surgery over here.","time":836233,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If I'm cooking, the door
is shut, the kids are out,","time":838282,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the phone's on the hook,","time":841304,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if she comes in, I get annoyed.","time":842567,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I say, "Terry, please,
I'm trying to fry an egg in here."","time":844281,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":847095,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""Give me a break."","time":854254,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":855478,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Actually, do you know
that old philosophical thing,","time":857222,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""If a tree falls in a forest,
and nobody hears it, did it happen?"","time":859745,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Remember that old chestnut?","time":863252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I saw a great T-shirt
recently, which said,","time":864605,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""If a man speaks his mind in a forest,
and no woman hears him,","time":867539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is he still wrong?"","time":871000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":872420,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And the third thing about intelligence is,","time":880089,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's distinct.","time":882152,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm doing a new book at the moment
called "Epiphany,"","time":884114,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which is based on a series
of interviews with people","time":886642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about how they discovered their talent.","time":889107,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm fascinated by
how people got to be there.","time":890995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's really prompted by a conversation
I had with a wonderful woman","time":893140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who maybe most people
have never heard of, Gillian Lynne.","time":896355,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Have you heard of her? Some have.","time":899056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She's a choreographer,
and everybody knows her work.","time":900676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She did "Cats" and "Phantom of the Opera."","time":903152,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She's wonderful.","time":905192,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I used to be on the board
of The Royal Ballet, as you can see.","time":906367,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":909338,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Gillian and I had lunch one day.
I said, "How did you get to be a dancer?"","time":911291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was interesting.","time":914840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When she was at school,
she was really hopeless.","time":916015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the school, in the '30s,
wrote to her parents and said,","time":918286,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""We think Gillian
has a learning disorder."","time":921099,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She couldn't concentrate;
she was fidgeting.","time":923158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think now they'd say she had ADHD.","time":925280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Wouldn't you?","time":927181,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But this was the 1930s, and ADHD
hadn't been invented at this point.","time":928504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It wasn't an available condition.","time":932705,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":934769,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"People weren't aware they could have that.","time":938008,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":940074,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Anyway, she went to see this specialist.","time":942523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, this oak-paneled room,
and she was there with her mother,","time":946723,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she was led and sat
on this chair at the end,","time":950454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she sat on her hands for 20 minutes,","time":952805,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"while this man talked to her mother","time":954774,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about all the problems
Gillian was having at school,","time":956479,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because she was disturbing people,
her homework was always late, and so on.","time":958967,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Little kid of eight.","time":962540,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In the end, the doctor went
and sat next to Gillian and said,","time":963715,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I've listened to all these
things your mother's told me.","time":966650,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I need to speak to her privately.","time":969387,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Wait here. We'll be back.
We won't be very long,"","time":971005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they went and left her.","time":973345,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But as they went out of the room,","time":976019,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"he turned on the radio
that was sitting on his desk.","time":977683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when they got out of the room,","time":980563,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"he said to her mother,
"Just stand and watch her."","time":982225,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the minute they left the room,","time":984627,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"she was on her feet, moving to the music.","time":987163,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And they watched for a few minutes,
and he turned to her mother and said,","time":989782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Mrs. Lynne, Gillian isn't sick.","time":993309,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She's a dancer.","time":995312,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Take her to a dance school."","time":998338,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I said, "What happened?"","time":999748,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She said, "She did. I can't tell you
how wonderful it was.","time":1001000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We walked in this room,
and it was full of people like me --","time":1004000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"people who couldn't sit still,","time":1006853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"people who had to move to think."","time":1009099,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Who had to move to think.","time":1012030,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They did ballet, they did tap, jazz;
they did modern; they did contemporary.","time":1013886,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She was eventually auditioned
for the Royal Ballet School.","time":1017520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She became a soloist; she had
a wonderful career at the Royal Ballet.","time":1020290,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She eventually graduated
from the Royal Ballet School,","time":1023567,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"founded the Gillian Lynne Dance Company,","time":1026146,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"met Andrew Lloyd Webber.","time":1028098,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She's been responsible for","time":1029359,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"some of the most successful
musical theater productions in history,","time":1030679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"she's given pleasure to millions,","time":1033851,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she's a multimillionaire.","time":1035471,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Somebody else might have put her
on medication and told her to calm down.","time":1036902,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":1040636,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What I think it comes to is this:","time":1048603,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Al Gore spoke the other night","time":1050200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about ecology and the revolution
that was triggered by Rachel Carson.","time":1052000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I believe our only hope for the future","time":1057257,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is to adopt a new conception
of human ecology,","time":1059393,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"one in which we start
to reconstitute our conception","time":1063292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of the richness of human capacity.","time":1065843,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Our education system has mined our minds","time":1068128,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in the way that we strip-mine the earth
for a particular commodity.","time":1071523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And for the future, it won't serve us.","time":1075377,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have to rethink
the fundamental principles","time":1077823,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on which we're educating our children.","time":1080000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"There was a wonderful quote
by Jonas Salk, who said,","time":1082087,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""If all the insects
were to disappear from the Earth,","time":1084785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"within 50 years,
all life on Earth would end.","time":1089906,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If all human beings
disappeared from the Earth,","time":1093770,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"within 50 years,
all forms of life would flourish."","time":1096831,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And he's right.","time":1100378,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What TED celebrates is the gift
of the human imagination.","time":1102390,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have to be careful now
that we use this gift wisely,","time":1106533,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that we avert some of the scenarios
that we've talked about.","time":1110791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the only way we'll do it
is by seeing our creative capacities","time":1114044,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for the richness they are","time":1117823,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and seeing our children
for the hope that they are.","time":1119634,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And our task is to educate
their whole being,","time":1122840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so they can face this future.","time":1125262,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"By the way -- we may not see this future,","time":1126699,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but they will.","time":1129228,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And our job is to help them
make something of it.","time":1130815,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you very much.","time":1133557,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":1134766,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"66","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: Your body language may shape who you are
talk__description: (NOTE: Some of the findings presented in this talk have been referenced in an ongoing debate among social scientists about robustness and reproducibility. Read "Criticisms & updates" below for more details as well as Amy Cuddy's response.) Body language affects how others see us, but it may also change how we see ourselves. Social psychologist Amy Cuddy argues that "power posing" -- standing in a posture of confidence, even when we don't feel confident -- can boost feelings of confidence, and might have an impact on our chances for success.

t":"Jessica 况","time":358727,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"女人一般比较容易比男人感到无力","time":364192,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这并不太令人意外。然而我发现的另一件事是","time":366778,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这似乎也跟","time":370733,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"学生参与的程度高低有关","time":373578,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就MBA的课来说这真的非常重要","time":377259,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为课堂参与程度要占成绩的一半","time":379841,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以商学院一直以来都为此伤脑筋","time":382522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"入学的时候男生女生是不分轩轾的","time":386995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可是成绩出来却有这些性别差异","time":390267,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而看起来却有一部分原因和参与度有关","time":392263,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我开始思索，好吧","time":395523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这群人一开始进来是这样，他们参与其中","time":398546,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那有没有可能让大家来假装","time":401070,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让他们更加参与进来?","time":404741,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我在Berkeley的主要合作研究伙伴，Dana Carney","time":406713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我很想知道，你能假装直到你成功吗？","time":411378,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"譬如说，只做一下下然后就体验到一个","time":414933,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让你感到更加充满力量的结果","time":417963,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以得知非语言如何掌控他人","time":421786,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对我们的想法和感受。有很多证据可以证明","time":425338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我们的问题是，我们非语言的部分","time":427031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是否真的掌控我们对自己的想法和感受?","time":430143,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这里确实有些证据可以表明","time":433253,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"举例来说，当我们高兴的时候我们会笑","time":435943,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但同样地，当我们含着一只笔练习笑容的时候","time":440579,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也会感到开心","time":442757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这说明这是相互的。说到力量的时候","time":447172,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"亦是如此。所以当我们感到充满力量的时候","time":450253,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你更加可能会这样做，但你也可能","time":455468,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"假装自己很有力量","time":458854,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后真的感到力量强大","time":464460,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那第二个问题就是，你看","time":466888,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们知道心理状态会影响我们的身体","time":469948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那身体是否能影响心理呢?","time":472531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这里所说的心理充满力量","time":476948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"究竟指的是什么?","time":479675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我指的是想法和感觉","time":481047,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和可以组成我们想法和感受的实际事物","time":483213,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我这里是指荷尔蒙。我指的是这个","time":486668,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"充满力量和没有力量的心智","time":489876,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是什么样的呢?","time":492979,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"毫不令人意外，心理坚强的人往往","time":494210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比较果断，自信，且乐观","time":498506,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就连在赌注里也觉得他们会赢","time":502730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们也倾向于能够抽象地思考","time":505729,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以这其中有很大区别。他们更敢于冒险","time":509908,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"充满力量与否的心智二者存有许多不同","time":512514,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"生理上两个关键的贺尔蒙","time":515367,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"睾丸酮，是一种支配荷尔蒙","time":518659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可的松，是一种压力荷尔蒙","time":522724,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们发现","time":526387,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"灵长类的雄性首领","time":529724,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有高浓度的睪丸酮和低浓度的可的松","time":533563,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"相同情形也在","time":536761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"强而有力的领导人身上可见","time":540287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这表示什么? 当你想到力量","time":542542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们往往只想到睪丸酮","time":544845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为它代表支配统治","time":547270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但力量其实是在于你如何应对压力","time":549058,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以你会想要一个","time":552528,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有着很高浓度的睪丸酮但同时又高度紧张的领导吗?","time":555657,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大概不会是吧?你会希望那个人","time":558399,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是充满力量，肯定果断且知道如何支配","time":560734,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但不是非常紧张，或是懒洋洋的","time":563018,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"灵长类动物的金字塔里","time":566706,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果一个首领想要掌控这个种群","time":572938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或取代原先的首领","time":576629,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几天之内，那一方体内的睪丸酮会大大地上升","time":579186,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而其可的松会剧烈地下降","time":582297,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"身体影响心理之例，由此可见一斑","time":585802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"至少就表面而言是如此","time":588843,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同时角色的转换也会影响心智","time":591209,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，如果你改变角色","time":595338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就一个小改变","time":598120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像这样一个小小的操作，这样一个小小的干预?","time":600704,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"持续两分钟\"你说，\"我要你们这样站着，","time":603117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它会让你感到更加充满力量\"","time":605768,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们是这样做的","time":608551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们决定将人们带进实验室，做一个小实验","time":613026,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些人将维持有力或无力的姿势两分钟","time":617239,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我就会告诉你","time":621668,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这五种姿势，虽然他们只做了两种","time":623917,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是其一","time":626879,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看看这些","time":629359,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个被媒体取名为","time":631453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"神力女超人\"","time":634271,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有这些","time":636646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或站或坐","time":637968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些是无力的姿势","time":640322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你双手交叉，试着让自己变小一点","time":642307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是非常无力的一张","time":646370,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你在摸你的脖子","time":648109,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你其实在保护自己","time":649466,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"实际的状况是，他们进来","time":652092,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"取出唾液","time":654677,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"维持一个姿势达两分钟","time":656437,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们不会看到姿势的照片，因为我们不想要影响他们","time":659610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们希望他们自己感觉到力量","time":661403,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是吗?所以他们做了整整两分钟","time":664783,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们关于一些事物问:\"现在你觉得自己多有力量?\"","time":666842,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"受试者接着会有一个博奕的机会","time":670051,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接着再取得唾液范本","time":672818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是整个实验","time":675583,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们发现到风险承担能力，","time":677148,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也就是在赌博时，当处于强有力的姿势的时","time":680854,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"86%的人会选择赌博","time":683752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"相对处于一个较无力的姿势时","time":687250,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只有60%的人，这真是很令人惊讶的差异","time":689195,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就睪丸酮而言我们发现","time":693370,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些人进来的那一刻起，有力量的那些人","time":695850,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"会有20%的提高","time":699355,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无力的人则下降10%","time":701717,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，再次地，当你有这些改变","time":706338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有力的人","time":709155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可的松下降25%，","time":711907,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而无力的人可的松则上升15%","time":714954,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"二分钟可以让这些荷尔蒙改变","time":719086,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"使你的脑袋变得","time":721818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"果断，自信和自在","time":724835,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或高度紧张以及感到与世隔绝","time":727763,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们都曾有过这些体验对吗?","time":731771,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看来非语言确实掌控","time":735627,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们对自己的想法和感受","time":738514,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不只是别人，更是我们自己","time":740835, 25068,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我们想做是这个","time":828484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把人带进实验室","time":829904,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们再次保持有力或无力姿势","time":832088,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接着进行一个高度压力的面试","time":835465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为时五分钟。所有都会被记录下来","time":838097,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同时也会被评论，而这些考官都接受过训练","time":841713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不会给予任何非语言的反馈","time":844224,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以他们看起来就像这样，像图上所示","time":848199,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"想象一下，这个人正在面试你","time":849806,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"整整五分钟，什么都没有，这比刁难诘问更难受","time":852090,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大家都不喜欢这种方式。这就是 所谓的","time":856713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"陷入社交流沙中\"","time":860026,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可以大大激发你的可的松","time":862117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们给予受试者这样的面试","time":863926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我们真的想看看会有什么样的结果","time":865628,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接着我们得出下列四种结果","time":868457,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"受试者不知假设前提和状况下","time":871564,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有人知道谁摆什么样的姿势","time":874736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接着他们观看这些带子","time":877521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后他们说，\"噢，我们想要录用这些人\"--","time":882611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些摆强有力姿势的人--\"这些人我们不想录用\"","time":884683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也评量这群人整体而言更正面","time":888105,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但背后的原因是什么?这跟演讲的内容无关","time":890890,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是他们在演讲中带出来的存在感","time":895626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同时，我们也就这些关于能力之变动因素评价他们","time":898502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像是演讲的整体架构怎样?","time":900551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它有多棒?讲员的证照学历?","time":903642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些全都无关。有影响的是","time":906418,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些事。基本上人们表达真实的自己","time":909474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就他们自己","time":912753,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们的想法，当他们心里","time":914626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有芥蒂","time":916849,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是被后真实的力量，或者可以说是计划的结果","time":919385,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以当我告诉人们","time":924316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的身体会改变心理，心理会改变行为","time":927684,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而行为会改变结果，他们跟我说","time":930563,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"我不这么觉得--听起来好像是假的\" 对吗?","time":933539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我就说，你就假装一直到你达成目的为止。不是我啦","time":935406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想要到达到那个目标后仍然感觉像是一个骗局","time":939185,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想要成为一个骗子","time":942360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我一点也不想达到那个目标才发觉我不应该如此","time":943879,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我真是有感而发的","time":948291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这里跟大家分享一个小故事","time":950478,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"关于成为一个骗子然后感到不应该在这里的故事","time":952536,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"在我19岁的时候，发生了一场很严重的车祸","time":955946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我整个人飞出车外，滚了好几翻","time":958887,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是弹出车外的，之后在休息室醒来以后发现头部重伤","time":962292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我从大学里休学","time":965803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别人告知我智商下降了2个标准差","time":969395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"情况非常非常糟糕","time":975107,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道我的智商应该是多少，因为我以前被人家认为是很聪明的那种","time":977695,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小时候大家都觉得我很有才华","time":980566,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我离开大学时，我试着回去","time":982578,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们说都告诉我说，\"你没有办法毕业的。","time":985778,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道，你还可以做很多其它的事阿，","time":987502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别往死胡同里钻了。\"","time":990379,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我死命挣扎，我必须承认","time":992277,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你的认同感被剥夺的时候，那个主要的身分认同","time":996161,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就我而言是我的智力被夺走了","time":998935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再没有比这个更加无助的时候了","time":1000794,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我感到完全的无助，我拼命地疯狂地努力","time":1005203,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"幸运眷顾，努力，幸运眷顾，再努力。","time":1007805,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"最终我从学校毕业了。","time":1010939,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我比同侪多花了四年的时间","time":1013391,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后说服我的恩师，Susan Fiske","time":1015198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我进去，所以我最后进入了普林斯顿","time":1019756,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当时觉得，我不应该在这里","time":1022700,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是个骗子","time":1025551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在我第一年演讲的那个晚上，","time":1026845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"普林斯顿第一年的演讲","time":1028426,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大约是对20个人做20分钟的演讲。就这样","time":1031064,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当时如此害怕隔天被拆穿","time":1033099,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我打给她说，\"我不干了。\"","time":1035986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说:\"你不可以不干，","time":1038799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我赌在你身上了，你得留下。","time":1040655,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你会留下，你将会留下来了。","time":1043213,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你要骗过所有人。","time":1045404,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你被要求的每个演讲你都得照办","time":1046761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你得一直讲一直讲","time":1050541,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"即使你怕死了，脚瘫了","time":1052280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"灵魂出窍了，直到你发现你在说","time":1055249,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"噢，我的天啊，我正在做这件事","time":1057827,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我已经成为它的一部分了，我正在做它。\"","time":1060992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是说所做的，硕士的五年","time":1063958,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些年，我在Northwestern","time":1066368,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我后来去了哈佛，我在哈佛，我没有在想到它","time":1068109,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但之前有很长一段时间我都在想这件事","time":1070696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"不应该在这。不应该在这。\"","time":1074196,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以哈佛第一年结束","time":1076500,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我对整个学期在课堂上都没有说话的一个学生说:","time":1078978,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你得参与融入否则你不会过这一科的","time":1083544,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来我的办公室吧。其实我压根就不认识她。","time":1086751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说:她很挫败地进来了，她说","time":1089253,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"我不应该在这里的。\"","time":1093235,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就在此刻，两件事发生了","time":1099280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我突然明白","time":1103408,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"天啊，我再也没有这种感觉了。你知道吗。","time":1104902,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我再也不会有那种感觉，但她有，我能体会到她的感受。","time":1108136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第二个想法是，她应该在这里!","time":1110818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她可以假装，一直到她成功为止。","time":1113455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我跟她说，\"你当然应该! 你应该在这里!\"","time":1115259,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"明天起你就假装","time":1118999,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你要让自己充满力量，你要知道","time":1120434,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你将会---\"(掌声)","time":1123498,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(掌声)","time":1126521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"\"你要走进教室","time":1128560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你会发表最棒的评论。\"","time":1132993,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道吗?她就真的发表了最成功的评论","time":1135417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大家都回过神来，他们就好像","time":1138422,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"喔我的天啊，我竟没有注意到她坐在那里，你知道吗?(笑声)","time":1139285,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"几个月后她来找我，我才明白","time":1142729,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她不仅只是假装到她成功为止","time":1145600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她已经融会贯通了","time":1147884,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"整个人脱胎换骨","time":1150608,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想对大家说，不要仅为了成功而假装","time":1152431,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要把它溶到你骨子里去。知道吗?","time":1156515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"持续地做直到它内化到你的骨髓里","time":1159312,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"最后与大家分享的是","time":1162953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小小的调整可以有大大的改变","time":1165608,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就二分钟","time":1170080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"二分钟，二分钟，二分钟","time":1172577,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在你进行下一场紧张的评估之前","time":1174313,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"拿出二分钟，尝试做这个，电梯里","time":1177559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"浴室间，房门关起在你的桌子前面","time":1180265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你就这么做，设置你的脑袋","time":1183504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以发挥最大效益","time":1185944,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"提升你的睪丸铜，降低你的可的松","time":1187766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"千万别留下，噢，我没把最好的表现出来那种遗憾","time":1190731,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是留下，噢，我真想","time":1194697,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让他们知道，让他们看见，我是个怎样的人","time":1197049,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"在这里我想要求大家，你知道的","time":1198885,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"尝试这有力的姿势","time":1201427,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同时也想请求各位","time":1205208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把这项科学分享出去，因为它很简单","time":1207094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可不是自尊心的问题喔(笑声)","time":1210322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"放开它。和人分享","time":1212199,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为最经常可以使用它的人会是那些","time":1214086,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有资源和技术的一群人","time":1215947,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有社会地位和权势。把这个传达给他们","time":1220105,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好让他们可以私下这样做","time":1223231,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们会需要他们的身体，隐私和那二分钟","time":1224514,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后这会大大地改变他们生活的结果","time":1227343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"谢谢(掌声)","time":1230493,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(掌声)","time":1234679,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1569","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}
