{"data":{"translation":{"id":"42273","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"1107400","uri":"/profiles/1108408","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/02/b7/dd/178141.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345428384.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Morton Bast","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"1201876","uri":"/profiles/1202910","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345472522.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Joseph Geni","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"So I want to start by offering you
a free no-tech life hack,","time":707,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and all it requires of you is this:","time":6129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that you change your posture
for two minutes.","time":8750,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But before I give it away,
I want to ask you to right now","time":12937,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"do a little audit of your body
and what you're doing with your body.","time":16361,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So how many of you are
sort of making yourselves smaller?","time":19954,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Maybe you're hunching, crossing your legs,
maybe wrapping your ankles.","time":22669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sometimes we hold onto our arms like this.","time":26014,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sometimes we spread out. (Laughter)","time":29753,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I see you.","time":33424,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I want you to pay attention
to what you're doing right now.","time":35696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We're going to come back
to that in a few minutes,","time":38711,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'm hoping that if you learn
to tweak this a little bit,","time":41069,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it could significantly change
the way your life unfolds.","time":44017,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So, we're really fascinated
with body language,","time":47453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we're particularly interested
in other people's body language.","time":51977,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You know, we're interested in,
like, you know — (Laughter) —","time":55900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"an awkward interaction, or a smile,","time":60121,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or a contemptuous glance,
or maybe a very awkward wink,","time":64519,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or maybe even something like a handshake.","time":68751,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Narrator: Here they are
arriving at Number 10.","time":71989,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This lucky policeman gets to shake hands
with the President of the United States.","time":75338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here comes the Prime Minister --
No. (Laughter) (Applause)","time":79831,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter) (Applause)","time":84758,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Amy Cuddy: So a handshake,
or the lack of a handshake,","time":87433,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"can have us talking for weeks
and weeks and weeks.","time":91140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Even the BBC and The New York Times.","time":93664,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So obviously when we think
about nonverbal behavior,","time":95804,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or body language -- but we call it
nonverbals as social scientists --","time":99755,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's language, so we think
about communication.","time":103143,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When we think about communication,
we think about interactions.","time":106023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So what is your body language
communicating to me?","time":109050,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What's mine communicating to you?","time":111489,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And there's a lot of reason to believe
that this is a valid way to look at this.","time":113555,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So social scientists
have spent a lot of time","time":119527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"looking at the effects
of our body language,","time":121795,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or other people's body language,
on judgments.","time":123900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we make sweeping judgments
and inferences from body language.","time":126209,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And those judgments can predict
really meaningful life outcomes","time":129648,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like who we hire or promote,
who we ask out on a date.","time":133638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For example, Nalini Ambady,
a researcher at Tufts University,","time":137431,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"shows that when people watch
30-second soundless clips","time":142116,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of real physician-patient interactions,","time":146588,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"their judgments
of the physician's niceness","time":149612,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"predict whether or not
that physician will be sued.","time":152445,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it doesn't have to do so much","time":155082,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with whether or not that physician
was incompetent,","time":156764,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but do we like that person
and how they interacted?","time":159287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Even more dramatic,
Alex Todorov at Princeton","time":162117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"has shown us that judgments
of political candidates' faces","time":165052,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in just one second predict 70 percent","time":168729,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of U.S. Senate and gubernatorial
race outcomes,","time":172697,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and even, let's go digital,","time":176547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"emoticons used well in online negotiations","time":178769,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"can lead you to claim more value
from that negotiation.","time":182914,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you use them poorly, bad idea. Right?","time":185746,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So when we think of nonverbals,
we think of how we judge others,","time":188969,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"how they judge us
and what the outcomes are.","time":192066,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We tend to forget, though,
the other audience","time":194968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that's influenced by our nonverbals,
and that's ourselves.","time":197088,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We are also influenced by our nonverbals,","time":200523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"our thoughts and our feelings
and our physiology.","time":203736,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So what nonverbals am I talking about?","time":206099,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm a social psychologist.
I study prejudice,","time":209162,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I teach at a competitive
business school,","time":212105,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so it was inevitable that I would become
interested in power dynamics.","time":214832,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I became especially interested
in nonverbal expressions","time":219316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of power and dominance.","time":223128,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And what are nonverbal expressions
of power and dominance?","time":225131,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, this is what they are.","time":227870,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So in the animal kingdom,
they are about expanding.","time":229953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you make yourself big, you stretch out,","time":232831,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you take up space,
you're basically opening up.","time":235841,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's about opening up.","time":238782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this is true
across the animal kingdom.","time":240728,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's not just limited to primates.","time":243483,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And humans do the same thing. (Laughter)","time":246244,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So they do this both when they have
power sort of chronically,","time":248952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and also when they're feeling
powerful in the moment.","time":252663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this one is especially interesting
because it really shows us","time":255664,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"how universal and old these
expressions of power are.","time":258736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This expression, which is known as pride,","time":262758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Jessica Tracy has studied.","time":265357,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She shows that people
who are born with sight","time":267610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and people who are congenitally
blind do this","time":270517,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when they win at a physical competition.","time":273458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So when they cross
the finish line and they've won,","time":275772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it doesn't matter if they've never
seen anyone do it.","time":278250,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They do this.","time":280751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So the arms up in the V,
the chin is slightly lifted.","time":282068,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What do we do when we feel powerless?","time":284590,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We do exactly the opposite.","time":286677,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We close up.
We wrap ourselves up.","time":288456,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We make ourselves small.","time":290984,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We don't want to bump
into the person next to us.","time":292352,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So again, both animals and humans
do the same thing.","time":294732,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this is what happens
when you put together high and low power.","time":297489,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So what we tend to
do when it comes to power","time":301469,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that we complement
the other's nonverbals.","time":304595,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So if someone is being
really powerful with us,","time":307248,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we tend to make ourselves smaller.
We don't mirror them.","time":309679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We do the opposite of them.","time":312323,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I'm watching this behavior
in the classroom,","time":313937,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and what do I notice?","time":317136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I notice that MBA students really exhibit
the full range of power nonverbals.","time":319673,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you have people
who are like caricatures of alphas,","time":326926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"really coming into the room, they get
right into the middle of the room","time":329474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"before class even starts,
like they really want to occupy space.","time":332879,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When they sit down,
they're sort of spread out.","time":336316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They raise their hands like this.","time":338579,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You have other people
who are virtually collapsing","time":340337,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when they come in.
As soon they come in, you see it.","time":342972,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You see it on their faces
and their bodies,","time":345496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they sit in their chair
and they make themselves tiny,","time":347789,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they go like this
when they raise their hand.","time":350607,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I notice a couple of things about this.","time":352969,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One, you're not going to be surprised.","time":354851,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It seems to be related to gender.","time":356685,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So women are much more likely
to do this kind of thing than men.","time":358727,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Women feel chronically
less powerful than men,","time":364192,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so this is not surprising.","time":366778,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But the other thing I noticed","time":368660,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that it also seemed
to be related to the extent","time":370733,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to which the students were participating,
and how well they were participating.","time":373399,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this is really important
in the MBA classroom,","time":377259,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because participation
counts for half the grade.","time":379841,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So business schools have been struggling
with this gender grade gap.","time":382522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You get these equally qualified
women and men coming in","time":386995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then you get
these differences in grades,","time":390267,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it seems to be partly
attributable to participation.","time":392434,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I started to wonder, you know, okay,","time":395523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so you have these people coming in
like this, and they're participating.","time":398546,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Is it possible that we could
get people to fake it","time":402188,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and would it lead them
to participate more?","time":404741,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So my main collaborator
Dana Carney, who's at Berkeley,","time":406765,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I really wanted to know,
can you fake it till you make it?","time":411378,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Like, can you do this
just for a little while","time":414933,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and actually experience
a behavioral outcome","time":417484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that makes you seem more powerful?","time":420160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we know that our nonverbals
govern how other people","time":421886,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"think and feel about us.
There's a lot of evidence.","time":425338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But our question really was,","time":427743,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"do our nonverbals govern
how we think and feel about ourselves?","time":429189,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"There's some evidence that they do.","time":433253,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, for example, we smile
when we feel happy,","time":435943,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but also, when we're forced to smile","time":440579,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"by holding a pen in our teeth
like this, it makes us feel happy.","time":442757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it goes both ways.","time":447172,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When it comes to power,
it also goes both ways.","time":449114,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So when you feel powerful,","time":452920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you're more likely to do this,","time":455468,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but it's also possible
that when you pretend to be powerful,","time":457263,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you are more likely
to actually feel powerful.","time":463465,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So the second question
really was, you know,","time":466888,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so we know that our minds
change our bodies,","time":469948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but is it also true
that our bodies change our minds?","time":472531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when I say minds,
in the case of the powerful,","time":476948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what am I talking about?","time":479675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I'm talking about thoughts and feelings","time":481047,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the sort of physiological things
that make up our thoughts and feelings,","time":483213,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and in my case, that's hormones.
I look at hormones.","time":486809,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So what do the minds of the powerful
versus the powerless look like?","time":489876,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So powerful people tend to be,
not surprisingly,","time":494210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"more assertive and more confident,
more optimistic.","time":498506,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They actually feel they're going to win
even at games of chance.","time":502730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They also tend to be able
to think more abstractly.","time":506040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So there are a lot of differences.
They take more risks.","time":509908,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There are a lot of differences
between powerful and powerless people.","time":512552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Physiologically,
there also are differences","time":515815,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on two key hormones: testosterone,
which is the dominance hormone,","time":518659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and cortisol, which is the stress hormone.","time":522724,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So what we find is that high-power
alpha males in primate hierarchies","time":526418,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"have high testosterone and low cortisol,","time":533563,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and powerful and effective leaders","time":536761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"also have high testosterone
and low cortisol.","time":540287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So what does that mean?
When you think about power,","time":542542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"people tended to think
only about testosterone,","time":544947,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because that was about dominance.","time":547270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But really, power is also about
how you react to stress.","time":549058,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So do you want the high-power
leader that's dominant,","time":552528,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"high on testosterone,
but really stress reactive?","time":555657,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Probably not, right?","time":558399,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You want the person who's powerful
and assertive and dominant,","time":559964,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but not very stress reactive,
the person who's laid back.","time":563018,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So we know that in primate hierarchies,","time":566706,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if an alpha needs to take over,","time":571856,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if an individual needs to take over
an alpha role sort of suddenly,","time":574948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"within a few days,
that individual's testosterone has gone up","time":579186,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"significantly and his cortisol
has dropped significantly.","time":582297,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we have this evidence,
both that the body can shape","time":585802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the mind, at least at the facial level,","time":588843,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and also that role changes
can shape the mind.","time":591209,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So what happens, okay,
you take a role change,","time":595338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what happens if you do that
at a really minimal level,","time":598120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like this tiny manipulation,
this tiny intervention?","time":600704,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""For two minutes," you say,
"I want you to stand like this,","time":603157,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's going to make you feel
more powerful."","time":605991,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So this is what we did.","time":608551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We decided to bring people into the lab
and run a little experiment,","time":611505,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and these people adopted, for two minutes,","time":616120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"either high-power poses
or low-power poses,","time":619669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'm just going to show
you five of the poses,","time":623153,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"although they took on only two.","time":625494,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So here's one.","time":627079,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A couple more.","time":629809,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This one has been dubbed
the "Wonder Woman" by the media.","time":631792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here are a couple more.","time":636646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you can be standing
or you can be sitting.","time":637968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And here are the low-power poses.","time":640322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you're folding up,
you're making yourself small.","time":642307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This one is very low-power.","time":646644,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When you're touching your neck,
you're really protecting yourself.","time":648109,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So this is what happens.","time":652092,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They come in, they spit into a vial,","time":654207,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for two minutes, we say,
"You need to do this or this."","time":656437,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They don't look at pictures of the poses.","time":659610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We don't want to prime them
with a concept of power.","time":661675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We want them to be feeling power.","time":664226,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So two minutes they do this.","time":665883,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We then ask them, "How powerful
do you feel?" on a series of items,","time":667242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then we give them
an opportunity to gamble,","time":670451,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then we take another saliva sample.","time":672818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it. That's the whole experiment.","time":675583,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So this is what we find.","time":677465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Risk tolerance, which is the gambling,","time":679050,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we find that when you are
in the high-power pose condition,","time":680954,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"86 percent of you will gamble.","time":685092,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When you're in the low-power
pose condition,","time":687250,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"only 60 percent, and that's
a whopping significant difference.","time":689370,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Here's what we find on testosterone.","time":693370,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"From their baseline when they come in,","time":695850,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"high-power people experience
about a 20-percent increase,","time":698387,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and low-power people experience
about a 10-percent decrease.","time":701717,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So again, two minutes,
and you get these changes.","time":706338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's what you get on cortisol.","time":709155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"High-power people experience
about a 25-percent decrease,","time":711156,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the low-power people experience
about a 15-percent increase.","time":714954,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So two minutes lead
to these hormonal changes","time":719086,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that configure your brain","time":721818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to basically be either assertive,
confident and comfortable,","time":723462,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or really stress-reactive,
and feeling sort of shut down.","time":727763,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we've all had the feeling, right?","time":732840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it seems that our nonverbals do govern
how we think and feel about ourselves,","time":735627,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so it's not just others,
but it's also ourselves.","time":740835,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Also, our bodies change our minds.","time":743291,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But the next question, of course,","time":745718,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is, can power posing for a few minutes","time":748124,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"really change your life
in meaningful ways?","time":749968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is in the lab, it's this little task,
it's just a couple of minutes.","time":752029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Where can you actually apply this?","time":756346,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Which we cared about, of course.","time":758111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so we think where you want to use this
is evaluative situations,","time":759946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like social threat situations.","time":766711,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Where are you being evaluated,
either by your friends?","time":769188,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For teenagers,
it's at the lunchroom table.","time":771768,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For some people it's speaking
at a school board meeting.","time":773849,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It might be giving a pitch
or giving a talk like this","time":778146,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or doing a job interview.","time":781934,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We decided that the one
that most people could relate to","time":784732,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because most people had been through,
was the job interview.","time":787424,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So we published these findings,","time":790343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the media are all over it,","time":793098,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they say, Okay, so this is what you do","time":794683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when you go in
for the job interview, right?","time":796782,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":798879,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"You know, so we were of course
horrified, and said,","time":799910,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Oh my God, no,
that's not what we meant at all.","time":802381,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For numerous reasons, no, don't do that.","time":804677,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Again, this is not about you
talking to other people.","time":806941,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's you talking to yourself.","time":809532,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What do you do before you go
into a job interview? You do this.","time":811117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're sitting down.
You're looking at your iPhone --","time":814200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or your Android, not trying
to leave anyone out.","time":816766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're looking at your notes,","time":819052,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you're hunching up, making yourself small,","time":820946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when really what you should
be doing maybe is this,","time":822970,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like, in the bathroom, right?
Do that. Find two minutes.","time":825423,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So that's what we want to test. Okay?","time":828484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we bring people into a lab,","time":830270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they do either high-
or low-power poses again,","time":832088,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they go through
a very stressful job interview.","time":835465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's five minutes long.
They are being recorded.","time":838097,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're being judged also,","time":841713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the judges are trained
to give no nonverbal feedback,","time":843694,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so they look like this.","time":848199,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Imagine this is the person
interviewing you.","time":849985,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So for five minutes, nothing,
and this is worse than being heckled.","time":852090,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People hate this.","time":856713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's what Marianne LaFrance calls
"standing in social quicksand."","time":858377,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So this really spikes your cortisol.","time":862117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So this is the job interview
we put them through,","time":863926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because we really wanted
to see what happened.","time":866236,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We then have these coders look
at these tapes, four of them.","time":868457,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're blind to the hypothesis.
They're blind to the conditions.","time":871564,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They have no idea
who's been posing in what pose,","time":874736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they end up looking
at these sets of tapes,","time":877521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they say,
"We want to hire these people,"","time":882611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all the high-power posers.","time":884783,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""We don't want to hire these people.","time":886308,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We also evaluate these people
much more positively overall."","time":888105,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But what's driving it?","time":891946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's not about the content of the speech.","time":893610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's about the presence
that they're bringing to the speech.","time":895626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because we rate them
on all these variables","time":898502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"related to competence,
like, how well-structured is the speech?","time":901003,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"How good is it?
What are their qualifications?","time":904566,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No effect on those things.
This is what's affected.","time":906824,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These kinds of things.","time":909474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People are bringing
their true selves, basically.","time":911197,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're bringing themselves.","time":913612,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They bring their ideas, but as themselves,","time":915026,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with no, you know, residue over them.","time":917149,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So this is what's driving the effect,
or mediating the effect.","time":919385,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So when I tell people about this,","time":924316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that our bodies change our minds
and our minds can change our behavior,","time":927684,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and our behavior can change
our outcomes, they say to me,","time":931063,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""It feels fake." Right?","time":933839,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I said, fake it till you make it.","time":935406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's not me.","time":937308,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't want to get there
and then still feel like a fraud.","time":939185,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't want to feel like an impostor.","time":942360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't want to get there only to feel
like I'm not supposed to be here.","time":944194,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And that really resonated with me,","time":948291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I want to tell you
a little story about being an impostor","time":950478,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and feeling like
I'm not supposed to be here.","time":953724,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"When I was 19, I was
in a really bad car accident.","time":955946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was thrown out of a car,
rolled several times.","time":958887,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was thrown from the car.","time":962292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I woke up in a head injury rehab ward,","time":964174,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I had been withdrawn from college,","time":967162,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I learned that my IQ had dropped
by two standard deviations,","time":969395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which was very traumatic.","time":975107,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I knew my IQ because
I had identified with being smart,","time":977695,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I had been called gifted as a child.","time":980566,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I'm taken out of college,
I keep trying to go back.","time":982578,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They say, "You're not going
to finish college.","time":985778,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just, you know, there are other
things for you to do,","time":988002,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but that's not going to work out for you."","time":990579,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I really struggled
with this, and I have to say,","time":992603,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"having your identity taken
from you, your core identity,","time":996161,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and for me it was being smart,","time":998935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"having that taken from you,","time":1000794,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there's nothing that leaves you feeling
more powerless than that.","time":1002457,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I felt entirely powerless.","time":1005580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I worked and worked, and I got lucky,","time":1007383,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and worked, and got lucky, and worked.","time":1009269,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Eventually I graduated from college.","time":1011139,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It took me four years
longer than my peers,","time":1013391,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I convinced someone,
my angel advisor, Susan Fiske,","time":1015415,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to take me on,
and so I ended up at Princeton,","time":1019756,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I was like,
I am not supposed to be here.","time":1022700,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I am an impostor.","time":1025551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the night before my first-year talk,","time":1026845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the first-year talk at Princeton
is a 20-minute talk to 20 people.","time":1028774,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it.","time":1032297,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was so afraid of being
found out the next day","time":1033499,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I called her
and said, "I'm quitting."","time":1035986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She was like, "You are not quitting,","time":1038799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I took a gamble
on you, and you're staying.","time":1040655,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're going to stay, and this is
what you're going to do.","time":1043213,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You are going to fake it.","time":1046004,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're going to do every talk

and do it and do it,","time":1050541,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"even if you're terrified

'Oh my gosh, I'm doing it.","time":1057622,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Like, I have become this.
I am actually doing this.'"","time":1060992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So that's what I did.","time":1063958,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Five years in grad school,","time":1065077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a few years, you know,
I'm at Northwestern,","time":1066485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I moved to Harvard, I'm at Harvard,","time":1068609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm not really thinking about it anymore,
but for a long time I had been thinking,","time":1070696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Not supposed to be here."","time":1074696,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So at the end of my first year at Harvard,","time":1076502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a student who had not talked

and she said,","time":1089783,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I'm not supposed to be here."","time":1093235,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And that was the moment for me.","time":1100111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because two things happened.","time":1102092,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One was that I realized,","time":1103708,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"oh my gosh,

but she does, and I get that feeling.","time":1108136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the second was,
she is supposed to be here!","time":1111160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Like, she can fake it, she can become it.","time":1113455,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I was like, "Yes, you are!

powerful, and, you know --","time":1120785,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":1123498,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And you're going to go

sitting there. (Laughter)","time":1140385,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"She comes back to me months later,","time":1143329,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I realized that she had not just

till she became it.","time":1148210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So she had changed.","time":1150608,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so I want to say to you,
don't fake it till you make it.","time":1152431,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Fake it till you become it.","time":1156515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Do it enough until you actually
become it and internalize.","time":1159312,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The last thing I'm going
to leave you with is this.","time":1162953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Tiny tweaks can lead to big changes.","time":1165608,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, this is two minutes.","time":1170080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Two minutes, two minutes, two minutes.","time":1172577,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Before you go into the next stressful
evaluative situation,","time":1174411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for two minutes, try doing this,
in the elevator,","time":1177559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in a bathroom stall, at your desk
behind closed doors.","time":1180265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's what you want to do.","time":1183504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Configure your brain
to cope the best in that situation.","time":1184931,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Get your testosterone up.
Get your cortisol down.","time":1187766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Don't leave that situation feeling
like, oh, I didn't show them who I am.","time":1190731,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Leave that situation feeling like,","time":1194697,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I really feel like I got to say
who I am and show who I am.","time":1196421,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I want to ask you first, you know,
both to try power posing,","time":1199417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and also I want to ask you to share
the science, because this is simple.","time":1205208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't have ego involved in this.
(Laughter)","time":1210322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Give it away. Share it with people,","time":1212499,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because the people who can use it the most","time":1214286,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"are the ones with no resources
and no technology","time":1216730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and no status and no power.","time":1220105,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Give it to them
because they can do it in private.","time":1222303,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They need their bodies,
privacy and two minutes,","time":1224875,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it can significantly change
the outcomes of their life.","time":1227343,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":1230493,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":1231648,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1569","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: Inside the mind of a master procrastinator
talk__description: Tim Urban knows that procrastination doesn't make sense, but he's never been able to shake his habit of waiting until the last minute to get things done. In this hilarious and insightful talk, Urban takes us on a journey through YouTube binges, Wikipedia rabbit holes and bouts of staring out the window -- and encourages us to think harder about what we're really procrastinating on, before we run out of time.

将来那个任务所需的能力吗？","time":500093,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们得坐下来开始干活。”","time":503366,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而猴子说：“完全同意，
但是让我们打开谷歌地球","time":505657,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把镜头推进到印度地下200尺，","time":508946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后花两个半小时
向上滚动到这个国家的地表，","time":512130,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我们更好地感受一下印度。“","time":515775,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":517777,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那天我就是这么做的。","time":523149,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":524658,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"当6个月变成4个月，
然后2个月，然后1个月时，","time":528604,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"TED工作人员开始发布演讲者。","time":532524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我打开网站看到自己的脸","time":535643,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"盯着自己看。","time":538279,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你猜这个时候谁醒了？","time":539659,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":541283,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"于是恐慌怪兽开始发疯，","time":545430,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几秒钟之后，整个系统一片混乱。","time":547904,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":550674,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"而猴子，还记得吗？他害怕恐慌怪兽","time":555511,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"嘣的一声，他爬到树上去了！","time":558636,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"于是终于，","time":559818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"理性的决策制定者
终于可以操控方向盘，","time":560993,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可以开始准备这次演讲。","time":563613,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"恐慌怪兽的存在解释了","time":565355,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所有这些相当愚蠢的拖延行为","time":567667,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就比如我这样的人花了两个星期","time":571172,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还没办法开始写论文的开头语，","time":573530,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后奇迹般地又拥有了
令人难以置信的工作热情","time":577398,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"整晚熬夜写了8页。","time":580193,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"整个情况中的三种角色","time":584385,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"构建了拖延者的系统。","time":587391,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不美好，但是至少还有用。","time":590096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我几年前决定在博客写的东西。","time":593545,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"发布之后，
收到的回应让我大吃一惊。","time":597631,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我收到几千封邮件，","time":600626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来自世界各地不同地方的人，","time":602803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们做着各种不同的事儿。","time":605500,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有护士、银行家、画家、工程师","time":607202,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有很多很多博士生。","time":610356,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":612702,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"内容基本上差不多：","time":614727,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我也有这个问题。”","time":617039,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是让我印象深刻的是那种反差，
帖子的轻松口吻","time":619015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和那些邮件的沉重语气的反差。","time":622868,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些人有强烈的挫败感","time":624987,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为拖延影响到他们的生活，","time":628094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为猴子控制了他们的想法。","time":630880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"思考之后，我的问题是","time":634902,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果拖延者的系统是有效的，
那么到底是怎么回事？","time":637892,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么这些人身陷
如此灰暗的境地？","time":641028,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"结果我发现原来有两种拖延。","time":643538,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我今天谈到的，上面举过的例子","time":647987,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都有截止期。","time":650845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有截止期的时候，","time":652020,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"拖延的影响
被限制在一个较短的期限内","time":653342,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为恐慌怪兽会介入。","time":656291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是对于第二种拖延来说","time":658228,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它发生在没有截止期的情况下。","time":660306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如你想自己创业","time":662817,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者从事艺术类的工作，","time":665531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"起初并没有截止期，
因为在你还没有开始努力干活之前","time":667968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不会有任何事情发生","time":671517,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有产生推进力让事情继续进行。","time":673785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"除了事业之外那些重要的事情","time":675435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也没有截止期，","time":678537,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如看望你的家庭，
或者锻炼身体保持身体健康，","time":680166,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"努力改善恋人关系","time":683455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者离开一段不满意的关系。","time":684883,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果拖延者做这些困难的事
只有一种机制","time":687588,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"即恐慌怪兽，那么问题来了，","time":692760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为在这些没有截止期的情况下，","time":694669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"恐慌怪兽根本不会出现。","time":697493,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他没有需要醒来的时候，","time":699145,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"于是拖延的后果是不受限制的，","time":700621,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们只会无限延期。","time":703343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而这种长期的拖延","time":705953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比起更有趣、更短期、
基于截止期的那种拖延来说，","time":708717,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不那么明显，也不经常被谈论。","time":711822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它通常是安静地、悄悄地影响我们。","time":714747,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它可能是","time":718816,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大量长期不快乐、内疚的来源。","time":719994,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我觉得，这才是那些人
发来邮件的原因，","time":724576,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这才是他们处于
如此糟糕状况的原因。","time":727472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是因为他们为了某个项目狂赶，","time":729998,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是这种长期拖延
使他们感觉在他们自己的生活中","time":732766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有时好像只是一个旁观者。","time":736211,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们的沮丧不是因为
他们无法实现自己的梦想；","time":738594,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是他们甚至无法开始
去追逐自己的梦想。","time":741600,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以读完这些邮件之后，
我有一点领悟","time":744713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为不存在不拖延的人。","time":750182,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没错，我认为大家都是拖延者。","time":753979,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你也许并不是像我们这样，","time":757898,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每方面都一团糟，","time":759836,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":761210,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"也许有些人可以
很好的面对截止日期，","time":762763,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是请记住：猴子最卑鄙的伎俩","time":766103,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在于没有截止日期的部分。","time":768651,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"现在我想给大家最后看一样东西。","time":771249,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我把它叫做生命日历。","time":773305,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"假设一个人可以活到90岁，
每个星期是一个格子。","time":776352,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其实没多少格子，","time":781345,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"尤其是我们已经活了这么多年。","time":782958,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为我们都需要花些时间，
认真看一下这个生命日历。","time":786607,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们需要认真思考
我们真正拖延的是什么，","time":792977,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为每个人都在拖延某件事。","time":796014,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们得时刻意识到
即时满足这个猴子的存在。","time":800782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我们所有人都应该做的事儿。","time":805455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且因为格子并不多，","time":808669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这项工作也许应该从今天就开始。","time":810993,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好吧，也许不是今天，但是...","time":813307,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":816331,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"你懂的。","time":817996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不久的将来。","time":819576,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢。","time":821393,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(掌声）","time":822626,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2458","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[{"author":null,"annotation":"Tim Urban, [Why Procrastinators Procrastinate](http://waitbutwhy.com/2013/10/why-procrastinators-procrastinate.html), Wait But Why","date":null,"linkUrl":null,"source":null,"text":null,"timecode":"03:24","title":null,"category":"note","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":null,"annotation":"Tim Urban, [Your Life in Weeks](http://waitbutwhy.com/2014/05/life-weeks.html), Wait But Why","date":null,"linkUrl":null,"source":null,"text":null,"timecode":"12:53","title":null,"category":"note","__typename":"Footnote"}],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"96765","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"So in college,","time":645,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was a government major,","time":3349,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which means I had to write
a lot of papers.","time":4937,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, when a normal student writes a paper,","time":7423,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they might spread the work out
a little like this.","time":9495,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, you know --","time":11892,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":13067,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"you get started maybe a little slowly,","time":14748,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but you get enough done in the first week","time":16599,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that, with some heavier days later on,","time":18591,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"everything gets done, things stay civil.","time":20446,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":22627,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And I would want to do that like that.","time":23853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That would be the plan.","time":26148,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I would have it all ready to go,","time":27366,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but then, actually, the paper
would come along,","time":29880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then I would kind of do this.","time":32398,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":34363,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And that would happen every single paper.","time":36757,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But then came my 90-page senior thesis,","time":39638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a paper you're supposed
to spend a year on.","time":43544,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I knew for a paper like that,
my normal work flow was not an option.","time":45855,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was way too big a project.","time":49498,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I planned things out,","time":50923,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I decided I kind of had
to go something like this.","time":52100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is how the year would go.","time":55781,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I'd start off light,","time":57257,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'd bump it up in the middle months,","time":59248,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then at the end,
I would kick it up into high gear","time":61590,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just like a little staircase.","time":64240,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"How hard could it be
to walk up the stairs?","time":65703,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No big deal, right?","time":68233,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But then, the funniest thing happened.","time":71090,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Those first few months?","time":72924,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They came and went,","time":74791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I couldn't quite do stuff.","time":75982,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we had an awesome new revised plan.","time":77591,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":79464,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And then --","time":80655,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":81838,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But then those middle months
actually went by,","time":83744,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I didn't really write words,","time":86552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and so we were here.","time":88758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then two months turned into one month,","time":91500,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which turned into two weeks.","time":94100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And one day I woke up","time":95749,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with three days until the deadline,","time":97724,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"still not having written a word,","time":101502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and so I did the only thing I could:","time":103457,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I wrote 90 pages over 72 hours,","time":105540,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"pulling not one but two all-nighters --","time":108171,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"humans are not supposed to pull
two all-nighters --","time":110471,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"sprinted across campus,","time":114373,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"dove in slow motion,","time":116390,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and got it in just at the deadline.","time":117900,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I thought that was the end of everything.","time":119980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But a week later I get a call,","time":122028,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's the school.","time":123611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And they say, "Is this Tim Urban?"","time":125757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I say, "Yeah."","time":127420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And they say, "We need
to talk about your thesis."","time":128912,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I say, "OK."","time":131276,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And they say,","time":133468,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""It's the best one we've ever seen."","time":135230,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":137150,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":140014,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"That did not happen.","time":144945,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":146271,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"It was a very, very bad thesis.","time":148433,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":151080,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I just wanted to enjoy that one moment
when all of you thought,","time":153378,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""This guy is amazing!"","time":157502,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":159431,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"No, no, it was very, very bad.","time":160803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Anyway, today I'm a writer-blogger guy.","time":163343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I write the blog Wait But Why.","time":166775,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And a couple of years ago,
I decided to write about procrastination.","time":168542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My behavior has always perplexed
the non-procrastinators around me,","time":172302,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I wanted to explain
to the non-procrastinators of the world","time":175610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what goes on in the heads
of procrastinators,","time":179322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and why we are the way we are.","time":181453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, I had a hypothesis","time":182917,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that the brains of procrastinators
were actually different","time":184097,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"than the brains of other people.","time":186976,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And to test this, I found an MRI lab","time":189698,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that actually let me scan both my brain","time":191913,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the brain of a proven
non-procrastinator,","time":194369,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so I could compare them.","time":197048,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I actually brought them here
to show you today.","time":198507,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I want you to take a look carefully
to see if you can notice a difference.","time":200732,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I know that if you're not
a trained brain expert,","time":204293,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's not that obvious,
but just take a look, OK?","time":206631,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So here's the brain
of a non-procrastinator.","time":208918,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":211835,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now ...","time":214133,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"here's my brain.","time":216325,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":218280,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"There is a difference.","time":223713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Both brains have a Rational
Decision-Maker in them,","time":225904,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but the procrastinator's brain","time":228316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"also has an Instant Gratification Monkey.","time":229992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, what does this mean
for the procrastinator?","time":233002,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, it means everything's fine
until this happens.","time":235328,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"[This is a perfect time
to get some work done.] [Nope!]","time":237793,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So the Rational Decision-Maker
will make the rational decision","time":240439,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to do something productive,","time":243396,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but the Monkey doesn't like that plan,","time":245316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so he actually takes the wheel,","time":247290,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and he says, "Actually, let's read
the entire Wikipedia page","time":248822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of the Nancy Kerrigan/
Tonya Harding scandal,","time":251727,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I just remembered
that that happened.","time":253887,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":256042,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Then --","time":257082,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":258264,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Then we're going to go over to the fridge,","time":259551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to see if there's anything new
in there since 10 minutes ago.","time":261613,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"After that, we're going to go
on a YouTube spiral","time":264503,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that starts with videos
of Richard Feynman talking about magnets","time":267165,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and ends much, much later
with us watching interviews","time":270439,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with Justin Bieber's mom.","time":273179,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":275083,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""All of that's going to take a while,","time":277295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so we're not going to really have room
on the schedule for any work today.","time":279082,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sorry!"","time":282608,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Sigh)","time":283795,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, what is going on here?","time":286325,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The Instant Gratification Monkey
does not seem like a guy","time":291481,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you want behind the wheel.","time":294196,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He lives entirely in the present moment.","time":295474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He has no memory of the past,
no knowledge of the future,","time":297443,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and he only cares about two things:","time":300295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"easy and fun.","time":302016,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, in the animal world, that works fine.","time":304338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you're a dog","time":307454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you spend your whole life doing
nothing other than easy and fun things,","time":308686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you're a huge success!","time":312281,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":313470,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And to the Monkey,","time":315405,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"humans are just another animal species.","time":317969,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You have to keep well-slept, well-fed
and propagating into the next generation,","time":320087,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which in tribal times
might have worked OK.","time":324617,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But, if you haven't noticed,
now we're not in tribal times.","time":326927,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We're in an advanced civilization,
and the Monkey does not know what that is.","time":329801,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Which is why we have
another guy in our brain,","time":333958,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the Rational Decision-Maker,","time":336263,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who gives us the ability to do things
no other animal can do.","time":338652,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We can visualize the future.","time":341703,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We can see the big picture.","time":343648,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We can make long-term plans.","time":345424,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And he wants to take
all of that into account.","time":346798,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And he wants to just have us do","time":350138,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"whatever makes sense
to be doing right now.","time":351853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, sometimes it makes sense","time":354825,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to be doing things that are easy and fun,","time":356238,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like when you're having dinner
or going to bed","time":358291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or enjoying well-earned leisure time.","time":360466,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's why there's an overlap.","time":362318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sometimes they agree.","time":363792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But other times, it makes much more sense","time":365560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to be doing things that are harder
and less pleasant,","time":368406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for the sake of the big picture.","time":372032,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And that's when we have a conflict.","time":373596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And for the procrastinator,","time":376017,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that conflict tends to end
a certain way every time,","time":377356,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"leaving him spending a lot of time
in this orange zone,","time":379889,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"an easy and fun place that's entirely
out of the Makes Sense circle.","time":383633,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I call it the Dark Playground.","time":387984,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":390287,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, the Dark Playground is a place","time":391935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that all of you procrastinators
out there know very well.","time":395087,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's where leisure activities happen","time":398892,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"at times when leisure activities
are not supposed to be happening.","time":400720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The fun you have in the Dark Playground","time":404418,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"isn't actually fun,
because it's completely unearned,","time":406332,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the air is filled with guilt,
dread, anxiety, self-hatred --","time":408839,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all of those good procrastinator feelings.","time":412078,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the question is, in this situation,
with the Monkey behind the wheel,","time":414703,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"how does the procrastinator ever get
himself over here to this blue zone,","time":418203,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a less pleasant place, but where
really important things happen?","time":421820,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Well, turns out the procrastinator
has a guardian angel,","time":425125,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"someone who's always looking
down on him and watching over him","time":430186,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in his darkest moments --","time":433418,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"someone called the Panic Monster.","time":434872,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":436991,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, the Panic Monster
is dormant most of the time,","time":442386,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but he suddenly wakes up
anytime a deadline gets too close","time":447270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or there's danger of public embarrassment,","time":451196,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a career disaster or some other
scary consequence.","time":453265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And importantly, he's the only thing
the Monkey is terrified of.","time":455800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, he became very relevant
in my life pretty recently,","time":459996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because the people of TED
reached out to me about six months ago","time":464598,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and invited me to do a TED Talk.","time":467868,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":469913,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, of course, I said yes.","time":475058,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's always been a dream of mine
to have done a TED Talk in the past.","time":476989,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":480818,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":484814,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But in the middle of all this excitement,","time":492203,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the Rational Decision-Maker seemed
to have something else on his mind.","time":494196,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He was saying, "Are we clear
on what we just accepted?","time":497521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Do we get what's going to be now
happening one day in the future?","time":500093,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We need to sit down
and work on this right now."","time":503366,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the Monkey said, "Totally agree,
but let's just open Google Earth","time":505657,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and zoom in to the bottom of India,
like 200 feet above the ground,","time":508946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and scroll up for two and a half hours
til we get to the top of the country,","time":512130,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so we can get a better feel for India."","time":515775,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":517777,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So that's what we did that day.","time":523149,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":524658,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"As six months turned into four
and then two and then one,","time":528604,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the people of TED decided
to release the speakers.","time":532524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I opened up the website,
and there was my face","time":535643,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"staring right back at me.","time":538279,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And guess who woke up?","time":539659,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":541283,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So the Panic Monster
starts losing his mind,","time":545430,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and a few seconds later,
the whole system's in mayhem.","time":547904,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":550674,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And the Monkey -- remember,
he's terrified of the Panic Monster --","time":555511,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"boom, he's up the tree!","time":558636,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And finally,","time":559818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"finally, the Rational Decision-Maker
can take the wheel","time":560993,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I can start working on the talk.","time":563613,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, the Panic Monster explains","time":565355,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all kinds of pretty insane
procrastinator behavior,","time":567667,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like how someone like me
could spend two weeks","time":571172,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"unable to start the opening
sentence of a paper,","time":573530,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then miraculously find
the unbelievable work ethic","time":577398,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to stay up all night
and write eight pages.","time":580193,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this entire situation,
with the three characters --","time":584385,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this is the procrastinator's system.","time":587391,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's not pretty, but in the end, it works.","time":590096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is what I decided to write about
on the blog a couple of years ago.","time":593545,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"When I did, I was amazed by the response.","time":597631,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Literally thousands of emails came in,","time":600626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"from all different kinds of people
from all over the world,","time":602803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"doing all different kinds of things.","time":605604,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These are people who were nurses,
bankers, painters, engineers","time":607366,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and lots and lots of PhD students.","time":610356,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":612702,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And they were all writing,
saying the same thing:","time":614727,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I have this problem too."","time":617039,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But what struck me was the contrast
between the light tone of the post","time":619015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the heaviness of these emails.","time":622868,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These people were writing
with intense frustration","time":624987,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about what procrastination
had done to their lives,","time":628094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about what this Monkey had done to them.","time":630880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I thought about this, and I said,","time":634902,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"well, if the procrastinator's system
works, then what's going on?","time":637892,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why are all of these people
in such a dark place?","time":641028,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Well, it turns out that there's
two kinds of procrastination.","time":643538,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Everything I've talked about today,
the examples I've given,","time":647987,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they all have deadlines.","time":650845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when there's deadlines,","time":652020,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the effects of procrastination
are contained to the short term","time":653342,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because the Panic Monster gets involved.","time":656291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But there's a second kind
of procrastination","time":658228,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that happens in situations
when there is no deadline.","time":660306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So if you wanted a career
where you're a self-starter --","time":662817,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"something in the arts,
something entrepreneurial --","time":665531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there's no deadlines on those things
at first, because nothing's happening,","time":667968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"not until you've gone out
and done the hard work","time":671517,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to get momentum, get things going.","time":673785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's also all kinds of important things
outside of your career","time":675435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that don't involve any deadlines,","time":678537,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like seeing your family or exercising
and taking care of your health,","time":680166,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"working on your relationship","time":683455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or getting out of a relationship
that isn't working.","time":684883,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now if the procrastinator's only mechanism
of doing these hard things","time":687588,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is the Panic Monster, that's a problem,","time":692760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because in all of these
non-deadline situations,","time":694669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the Panic Monster doesn't show up.","time":697493,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He has nothing to wake up for,","time":699145,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so the effects of procrastination,
they're not contained;","time":700621,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they just extend outward forever.","time":703343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it's this long-term
kind of procrastination","time":705953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that's much less visible
and much less talked about","time":708717,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"than the funnier, short-term
deadline-based kind.","time":711822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's usually suffered
quietly and privately.","time":714747,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it can be the source","time":718816,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of a huge amount of long-term
unhappiness, and regrets.","time":719994,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I thought, that's why
those people are emailing,","time":724576,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that's why they're
in such a bad place.","time":727472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's not that they're cramming
for some project.","time":729998,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's that long-term procrastination
has made them feel like a spectator,","time":732766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"at times, in their own lives.","time":736211,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The frustration is not
that they couldn't achieve their dreams;","time":738594,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's that they weren't even
able to start chasing them.","time":741600,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I read these emails
and I had a little bit of an epiphany --","time":744713,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I don't think
non-procrastinators exist.","time":750182,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's right -- I think all of you
are procrastinators.","time":753979,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, you might not all be a mess,","time":757898,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like some of us,","time":759836,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":761210,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"and some of you may have
a healthy relationship with deadlines,","time":762763,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but remember: the Monkey's sneakiest trick","time":766103,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is when the deadlines aren't there.","time":768651,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now, I want to show you one last thing.","time":771249,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I call this a Life Calendar.","time":773305,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's one box for every week
of a 90-year life.","time":776352,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's not that many boxes,","time":781345,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"especially since we've already
used a bunch of those.","time":782958,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I think we need to all take a long,
hard look at that calendar.","time":786607,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We need to think about what
we're really procrastinating on,","time":792977,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because everyone is procrastinating
on something in life.","time":796014,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We need to stay aware
of the Instant Gratification Monkey.","time":800782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's a job for all of us.","time":805455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And because there's not
that many boxes on there,","time":808669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's a job that should
probably start today.","time":810993,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Well, maybe not today, but ...","time":813307,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":816331,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"You know.","time":817996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sometime soon.","time":819576,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":821393,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":822626,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2458","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[{"author":null,"annotation":"Tim Urban, [Why Procrastinators Procrastinate](http://waitbutwhy.com/2013/10/why-procrastinators-procrastinate.html), Wait But Why","date":null,"linkUrl":null,"source":null,"text":null,"timecode":"03:24","title":null,"category":"note","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":null,"annotation":"Tim Urban, [Your Life in Weeks](http://waitbutwhy.com/2014/05/life-weeks.html), Wait But Why","date":null,"linkUrl":null,"source":null,"text":null,"timecode":"12:53","title":null,"category":"note","__typename":"Footnote"}],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: This is what happens when you reply to spam email
talk__description: Suspicious emails: unclaimed insurance bonds, diamond-encrusted safe deposit boxes, close friends marooned in a foreign country. They pop up in our inboxes, and standard procedure is to delete on sight. But what happens when you reply? Follow along as writer and comedian James Veitch narrates a hilarious, weeks-long exchange with a spammer who offered to cut him in on a hot deal.
