但它的确出现在了我的收件箱里，","time":7596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"发件人是个叫所罗门·奥东寇的家伙。","time":10176,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":12349,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我知道。","time":14159,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":15334,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"邮件是这么开头的：","time":16588,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"信上说：“你好，詹姆斯·维奇，","time":17772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我有个挺有意思的投资提案，
想和你谈一谈——所罗门”","time":19414,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这时我的手指大概
已经放在删除键上了，对吧？","time":24246,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当时看着我的手机，
心想我可以直接删了它。","time":27183,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者我也可以做点什么，
我们每个人一直都很想做的事。","time":30442,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":34631,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"于是我说：“所罗门，
你的邮件令我很感兴趣。”","time":38541,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":40774,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":43500,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"游戏就此开始。","time":48500,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"他说：“亲爱的詹姆斯·维奇，
我们会给你运送黄金。”","time":53214,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":56199,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"“你可以将黄金转手，
赚取10%的回扣。”","time":58302,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":61223,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"于是我就知道了，
和我打交道的是个高手。","time":63307,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":65382,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我说：“它价值多少？”","time":70408,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"他说：“我们一开始可以做小一点。”","time":73058,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当时就，“哎……”","time":75582,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后他说：“25公斤。”","time":76758,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":79576,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"“总价值大约250万美元。”","time":82969,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我说：“所罗门，
我们要做这生意，就干一大票。”","time":87536,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":90235,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"“我能搞定。你手上有多少金子？”","time":98286,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":102215,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"他说：“关键不是我有多少，","time":105761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是你能接多少。","time":107525,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们一开始可以发过去50公斤试试。”","time":109620,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我说：“50公斤？","time":112707,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"简直一点搞头都没有啊，","time":114602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"除非你至少运过来一整吨。”","time":116269,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":118523,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":119742,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"他说：“你是干什么工作的？”","time":123401,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":125348,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我说：“我是银行对冲基金的执行经理。”","time":128283,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":130649,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"“朋友，这不是我第一次运金条了。","time":135243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不，不，不。”","time":137993,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"然后我开始有点慌了。","time":140989,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当时就说：“你们总部在哪？”","time":142164,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我还不了解你，","time":143816,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我想如果我们要通过邮政业务发货，","time":145022,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一定要办签收。","time":147414,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这笔金子可不算少了。“","time":148746,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"他说：“说服我们公司扩大运货量","time":150666,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"的确不容易。”","time":153127,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我说：“所罗门，
我非常同意你的观点。","time":154861,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我现在给你整理一些图像资料，

what about you?"","time":211363,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I thought about it for a long time.","time":214133,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I said, "One word;","time":218925,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Hummus."","time":221632,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":222807,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""It's going places.","time":228261,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":229435,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I was in Sainsbury's the other day","time":231395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and there were like

Fizzy Cola Bottle Jelly Beans","time":371485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to the Creme Egg,","time":374734,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for the Peanut M&Ms process to start.","time":377791,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":380118,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Send 1,500 pounds","time":381940,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"via a Giant Gummy Lizard."","time":384093,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":386506,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And that was so much fun, right,","time":397392,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that it got me thinking:","time":399821,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like, what would happen if I just spent

replying to scam emails.","time":420079,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's really difficult,","time":422974,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I highly recommend we do it.","time":424149,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't think what I'm doing is mean.","time":425751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There are a lot of people
who do mean things to scammers.","time":427616,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"All I'm doing is wasting their time.","time":430392,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I think any time
they're spending with me","time":434894,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is time they're not spending
scamming vulnerable adults","time":437077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"out of their savings, right?","time":439698,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And if you're going to do this --
and I highly recommend you do --","time":441584,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"get yourself a pseudonymous email address.","time":445171,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Don't use your own email address.","time":447206,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's what I was doing at the start

any day is a good day","time":463023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if you receive an email

written on it, it's just a shape!","time":501905,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":505318,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I said, "Winnie,

talk__description: Simon Sinek has a simple but powerful model for inspirational leadership -- starting with a golden circle and the question: "Why?"  His examples include Apple, Martin Luther King Jr. and the Wright brothers ...

Jiang","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"当事情的发展出乎意料之外的时候，","time":1000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你怎么解释？","time":3000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"换句话说，当别人似乎出乎意料地","time":5000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"取得成功的时候，","time":8000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你怎么解释？","time":10000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如说，","time":12000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么苹果公司创新能力这么强？","time":14000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这么多年来，年复一年，","time":16000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们比所有竞争对手都更加具有创新性。","time":18000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而其实他们只是一家电脑公司。","time":21000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们跟其他公司没有任何分别，","time":23000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有同样的途径，接触到同样的人才，","time":25000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同样的代理商，顾问，和媒体。","time":27000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那为什么他们","time":30000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就似乎有那么一点不同寻常呢？","time":32000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同样的，为什么是由马丁•路德•金","time":35000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来领导民权运动？","time":37000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那个时候在美国，民权运动之前，","time":39000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不仅仅只有他一个人饱受歧视。","time":41000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他也决不是那个时代唯一的伟大演说家。","time":43000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么会是他？","time":45000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"又为什么怀特兄弟","time":47000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能够造出动力控制的载人飞机，","time":50000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟他们相比，当时的其他团队似乎","time":53000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"更有能力，更有资金，","time":55000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们却没能制造出载人飞机，","time":58000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"怀特兄弟打败了他们。","time":61000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一定还有一些什么别的因素在起作用。","time":63000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"大概三年半之前，","time":66000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我有了个新发现，","time":68000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个发现完全改变了","time":70000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我对这个世界如何运作的看法。","time":73000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"甚至从根本上改变了","time":76000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的工作生活方式。","time":78000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那就是我发现了一种模式，","time":82000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我发现世界上所有伟大的令人振奋的领袖","time":85000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和组织，","time":87000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论是苹果公司、马丁•路德•金还是怀特兄弟，","time":89000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们思考、行动、交流沟通的方式","time":92000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都完全一样，","time":94000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是跟所有其他人的方式","time":96000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"完全相反。","time":98000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我所做的仅仅是把它整理出来。","time":100000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可能是世上","time":102000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最简单的概念。","time":104000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我称它为黄金圆环。","time":106000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"为什么？怎么做？是什么？","time":116000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这小小的模型就解释了","time":119000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么一些组织和领导者","time":121000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能够在别人不能的地方激发出灵感和潜力。","time":123000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我来尽快地解释一下这些术语。","time":125000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"地球上的每个人，每个组织","time":127000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都明白自己做的是什么，","time":130000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"百分之百。","time":132000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其中一些知道该怎么做，","time":134000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以称之为是你的差异价值，","time":136000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或是你的独特工艺，或是你的独特卖点也好，怎么说都行。","time":138000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是非常，非常少的人和组织","time":141000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"明白为什么做。","time":144000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这里的“为什么”和“为利润” 没有关系，","time":146000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"利润只是一个结果，永远只能是一个结果。","time":148000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说的“为什么” 指的是：你的目的是什么？","time":150000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你这样做的原因是什么？你怀着什么样的信念？","time":152000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你的机构为什么而存在？","time":155000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你每天早上是为什么而起床？","time":158000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么别人要在乎你？","time":160000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"结果是，我们思考的方式，行动的方式，","time":163000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"交流的方式都是由外向内的。","time":165000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很显然的，我们所采用的方式是从清晰开始，然后到模糊的东西。","time":167000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是激励型领袖以及","time":170000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"组织机构，","time":172000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论他们的规模大小，所在领域，","time":174000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们思考，行动和交流的方式","time":177000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都是从里向外的。","time":179000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"举个例子吧。","time":182000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我举苹果公司是因为这个例子简单易懂，每个人都能理解。","time":184000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果苹果公司跟其他公司一样，","time":187000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们的市场营销信息就会是这个样子：","time":190000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我们做最棒的电脑，","time":193000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"设计精美，使用简单，","time":196000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"界面友好。","time":198000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你想买一台吗？” 不怎么样吧。","time":200000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是我们大多数人的交流方式，","time":203000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也是大多数市场推广的方式，大部分销售所采用的方式，","time":205000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也是我们大部分人互相交流的方式。","time":207000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们说我们的职业是干什么的，我们说我们是如何的与众不同，或者我们怎么比其他人更好，","time":209000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我们就期待着一些别人的反应，","time":212000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如购买，比如投票，诸如此类。","time":214000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我们新开的的律师事务所，","time":216000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们拥有最棒的律师和最大的客户，","time":218000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们总是能满足客户的要求。","time":220000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我们的新车型，","time":222000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"非常省油，真皮座椅。买一辆吧。","time":224000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是这些推销词一点劲都没有。","time":227000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这是苹果公司实际上的沟通方式：","time":229000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我们做的每一件事情，","time":233000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都是为了突破和创新。","time":235000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们坚信应该以不同的方式思考。","time":238000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们挑战现状的方式","time":241000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是通过把我们的产品设计得十分精美，","time":243000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"使用简单，和界面友好。","time":246000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们只是在这个过程中做出了最棒的电脑。","time":248000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"想买一台吗？”","time":251000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"感觉完全不一样，对吧？你已经准备从我这里买一台了。","time":253000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我所做的只是将传递信息的顺序颠倒一下而已。","time":256000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实已经向我们证明，人们买的不是你做的产品，","time":258000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们买的是你的信念和宗旨。","time":261000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们买的不是你做的产品，人们买的是你的信念。","time":263000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这就解释了为什么","time":265000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这里的每个人","time":267000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从苹果公司买电脑时都觉得理所当然。","time":269000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我们从苹果公司","time":272000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"买MP3播放器，手机，或者数码摄像机时，","time":274000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也感觉很舒服。","time":277000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而其实，我刚才已经说过，苹果公司只是个电脑公司。","time":279000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有什么能从结构上将苹果公司","time":281000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同竞争对手区分开来。","time":283000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"竞争对手和苹果公司有同样的能力制造所有这些产品。","time":285000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"实际上，他们也尝试过。","time":288000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几年前，捷威（Gateway）公司推出了平板电视。","time":290000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们制造平板电视的能力很强，","time":293000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为他们做平板显示器已经很多年了。","time":295000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是没有人买他们的平板电视。","time":298000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"戴尔公司推出了MP3播放器和掌上电脑，","time":305000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们产品的质量非常好，","time":308000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"产品的设计也非常不错。","time":310000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是也没有人买他们的这些产品。","time":313000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其实，说到这里，我们无法想象","time":315000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"会从戴尔公司买MP3播放器。","time":317000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你为什么会从一家电脑公司买MP3播放器呢？","time":319000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是每天我们都这么做。","time":321000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们买的不是你做的产品，人们买的是你的信念。","time":323000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"做公司的目标不是要跟","time":325000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所有需要你的产品的人做生意，","time":327000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是跟","time":331000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"与你有着相同理念的人做生意。","time":333000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是最精彩的部分。","time":336000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我说的这些没有一个是我自己的观点。","time":338000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些观点都能从生物学里面找到根源。","time":340000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是心理学，是生物学。","time":343000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你俯视看大脑的横截面，","time":345000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你会发现人类大脑实际上分成","time":348000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"三个主要部分，","time":350000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而这三个主要部分和黄金圆环匹配得非常好。","time":352000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们最新的脑部，管辖智力的脑部，","time":355000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者说我们的大脑皮层，","time":358000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对应着“是什么” 这个圆环。","time":360000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大脑皮层负责我们所有的","time":362000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"理性和逻辑的思考","time":364000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和语言功能。","time":366000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"中间的两个部分是我们的两个边脑。","time":368000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"边脑负责我们所有的情感，","time":371000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如信任和忠诚，","time":374000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也负责所有的行为","time":377000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和决策，","time":379000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这部分没有语言功能。","time":381000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"换句话说，当我们由外向内交流时，","time":384000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没错，人们可以理解大量的复杂信息，","time":387000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如特征，优点，事实和图表。","time":390000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但不足以激发行动。","time":393000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我们由内向外交流时，","time":395000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们是在直接同控制行为的","time":397000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那一部分大脑对话，","time":399000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我们由人们理性地思考","time":401000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们所说和做的事情。","time":403000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是那些发自内心的决定的来源。","time":405000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道，有时候你展示给一些人","time":407000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所有的数据图表，","time":409000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们会说“我知道这些数据和图表是什么意思，","time":411000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但就是感觉不对。”","time":413000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么我们会用这个动词，“感觉” 不对？","time":415000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为控制决策的那一部分大脑","time":418000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并不支配语言，","time":420000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们只好说 “我不知道为什么，就是感觉不对。”","time":422000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者有些时候，你说听从心的召唤，","time":425000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者说听从灵魂。","time":427000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想把这些观念分解得太彻底，但心和灵魂都不是","time":429000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"控制行为的部分。","time":431000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所有这一切都发生在你的边脑，","time":433000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"控制决策行为而非语言的边脑。","time":435000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"如果你自己都不知道你为什么干你所做的事情，","time":438000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而别人要对你的动机作出反应，","time":441000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么你怎么可能赢得大家","time":444000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对你的支持，从你这里购买东西，","time":447000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者，更重要的，对你忠诚","time":449000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并且想成为你正在做的事情的一分子呢？","time":451000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再说一次，目标不仅仅是将你有的东西卖给需要它们的人；","time":454000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是将东西卖给跟你有共同信念的人。","time":457000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"目标不仅仅是雇佣那些","time":460000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"需要一份工作的人；","time":462000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"目标是雇佣那些同你有共同信念的人。","time":464000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道吗，我总是说，","time":467000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你雇佣某人只是因为他能做这份工作，他们就只是为你开的工资而工作，","time":472000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是如果你雇佣跟你有共同信念的人，","time":475000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们会为你付出热血，汗水和泪水。","time":477000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这一点，没有比怀特兄弟的故事","time":479000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"更恰当的例子了。","time":481000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"大多数人都没听说过塞缪尔·兰利这个人。","time":483000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"20世纪初期，","time":486000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"投入机动飞行器的热情就像当今的网站热，","time":489000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每个人都在做尝试。","time":492000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"塞缪尔·兰利拥有所有大家认为是","time":494000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成功的要素。","time":497000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的意思是，即便是现在，你问别人","time":500000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“为什么你的产品或者公司失败了呢？”","time":502000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们总是用同样的","time":504000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"三个东西以同样的排列顺序来回答你，","time":506000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"缺乏资金，用人不善，形势不好。","time":508000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"总是那三种理由，所以让我们来逐个分析一下。","time":511000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"国防部给了塞缪尔·兰利","time":514000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"5万美金","time":516000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"作为研制飞行器的资金。","time":519000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以说，资金不是问题。","time":521000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他在哈佛大学工作过，","time":523000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也在史密森尼学会工作过，人脉极其广泛。","time":525000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他认识当时最优秀的人才。","time":528000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此，他雇佣了","time":530000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用资金能吸引到的最优秀的人才。","time":532000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当时的市场形势相当有利。","time":534000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"纽约时报对他做跟踪报道，","time":536000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每个人都支持他。","time":539000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是为什么你们连听都没听说过他呢？","time":541000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"与此同时，几百公里之外的俄亥俄州代顿市","time":544000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有一对兄弟，奥维尔•莱特和维尔伯•莱特，","time":547000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们俩没有任何我们认为的","time":549000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成功的要素。","time":551000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们没有钱。","time":553000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们用自行车店的收入来追求他们的梦想。","time":555000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"莱特兄弟的团队中没有一个人","time":558000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"上过大学，","time":560000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就连奥维尔和维尔伯也没有。","time":562000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"纽约时报更是不沾边的。","time":564000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不同的是，","time":567000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"奥维尔和维尔伯追求的是一个事业，","time":569000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一个目标，一种信念。","time":571000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们相信如果他们","time":573000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能研制出飞行器，","time":575000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"将会改变全世界的发展进程。","time":577000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"塞缪尔·兰利就不同了，","time":580000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他想要发财，他想要成名。","time":582000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他追求的是最终结果，","time":585000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是变得富有。","time":587000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看吧，看接下来怎么样了。","time":589000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些怀有和怀特兄弟一样梦想的人","time":592000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟他们一起热血朝天地奋斗着。","time":594000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"另一边的人则是为了工资而工作。","time":597000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"后来流传的故事说，每次怀特兄弟出去实验时，","time":599000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都必须带着五组零件，","time":602000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为那是在他们回来吃晚饭之前","time":604000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"将要坠毁的次数。","time":606000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"最后，在1903年12月17日，","time":609000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"怀特兄弟成功起飞，","time":612000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是当时没有任何其他人在场目睹。","time":615000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们是在几天后才知道的。","time":617000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"后来的事情进一步证实了","time":621000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"兰利动机不纯，","time":623000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他在怀特兄弟成功的当天就辞职了。","time":625000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他本来应该可以说：","time":628000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“伙计们，这真是一项伟大的发明，","time":630000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可以改进你们的技术。” 但是他没有，","time":632000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为他不是第一个制造出飞机的人，他就不会变得富有，","time":635000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他也不会变得有名，所以他辞职了。","time":637000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"人们买的不是你的产品；而是你的信念。","time":639000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你讲述你的信念，","time":642000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你将吸引那些跟你拥有同样信念的人。","time":644000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是为什么吸引那些跟你拥有同样信念的人非常重要呢？","time":647000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"创新的传播有一个规律，","time":652000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你不知道这个规律，你一定了解这个概念。","time":654000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的社会中，有2.5%的人","time":657000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是革新者。","time":660000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"13.5%的人","time":662000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是早期的少部分采纳者。","time":665000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接下来的34%是早期接受的大多数，","time":667000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后是比较晚接受的大多数和最后行动的。","time":669000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这部分最后行动的人买按键电话的唯一原因是","time":672000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为他们再也买不到转盘电话了。","time":675000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":677000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"虽然我们在不同的时候会处在这个曲线上不同的位置，","time":679000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是创新的传播规律告诉我们","time":682000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你想在大众市场上","time":685000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"获得成功，或者要大众接纳一个点子，","time":688000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你得等到","time":690000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"获得15%-18%的市场接受度","time":692000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个转折点之后才行。","time":694000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时之后市场才真正打开。","time":697000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我喜欢问公司：“你的新生意怎么样呀？”","time":700000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们会很自豪地告诉你 “哦，大概有10%吧。”","time":703000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是呀，你有可能就在10%的顾客群这里过不去了。","time":705000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们都能让10%的人“意会”，","time":707000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对，我们一般这样形容他们。","time":709000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就好比描述那种感觉： “哦，他们有点心领神会了”。","time":711000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"问题是：你怎么在他们还没有成为你的顾客之前","time":713000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就发现那些能意会的人，和那些不能意会的人？","time":716000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是问题的所在，就是这点间隙，","time":719000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你得把这个间隙给填上，","time":721000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"正如杰弗里穆尔所说的，“跨越鸿沟”。","time":723000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为早期的大多数","time":725000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不会尝试新事物，","time":727000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"除非有些人","time":729000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"已经先尝试过了。","time":731000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而这些人，创新者和早期的少数人，","time":733000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们喜欢大胆的尝试。","time":736000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们更自然地凭直觉做事情，","time":738000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"发自于他们的世界观的直觉，","time":741000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不仅仅是因为市场上有什么样的产品。","time":745000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这是一批在 iPhone上市的头几天","time":747000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去排队等六个小时来购买的人，","time":749000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而其实只要等一个星期你就可以随便走进店里","time":751000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从货架上买到。","time":753000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一批在平板电视刚推出时","time":755000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"会花4万美金买一台的人，","time":757000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"尽管当时的技术还不成熟。","time":760000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"补充说一下，他们并不是因为技术的先进","time":763000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而买那些产品，","time":765000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是为了他们自己。","time":767000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为他们想成为第一个体验新产品的人。","time":769000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们买的不是你的产品；人们买的是你的信念。","time":771000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你的行动只是证明了","time":773000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你的信念。","time":775000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"实际上，人们会去做能够体现","time":777000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们的信念的事情。","time":779000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些为了抢先","time":781000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在头六个小时内买到iPhone 而","time":783000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"排六个小时的队的人，","time":786000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是出于他们的世界观，","time":788000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"出于他们想别人怎么看自己。","time":790000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们是第一批体验者。","time":792000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们买的不是你的产品；他们买的是你的信念。","time":794000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我再举些著名的例子吧，","time":796000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"证实创新传播规律的一个失败的例子","time":798000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和一个成功的例子。","time":800000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"首先我们讲这个失败的例子。","time":802000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还是商业上的。","time":804000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就如我们一秒钟前刚刚说过的，","time":806000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成功的要素是充足的资金，优秀的人才和良好的市场形势。","time":808000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么，是不是如果有这些你就应该获得成功。","time":811000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看看蒂沃（TiVo）数字视频公司吧。","time":813000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"自从推出蒂沃机顶盒以来，大概是八、九年前，","time":815000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"直到今天，","time":817000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它们一直是市场上唯一的最高品质的产品，","time":819000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这没有任何异议。","time":822000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它们绝对是资金充足，","time":825000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"市场形势也大好。","time":827000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其实，“蒂沃” 都变成了一个日常用的动词。","time":829000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如：我经常把东西蒂沃到我那台华纳数码视频录像机里面。","time":831000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"但是蒂沃是个商业上的失败案例，","time":837000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们没有赚到一分钱。","time":839000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们上市时，","time":841000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"股票价格大约在30到40美元，","time":843000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后就直线下跌，而成交价格从没超过10美元。","time":845000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"实际上，我印象中它的交易价格从来没有超过 6美元，","time":847000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"除了几次小的震荡之外。","time":850000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为你会发现，蒂沃公司新推出他们的产品时，","time":852000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们只是告诉我们他们产品是什么，","time":854000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们说 “我们的产品可以把电视节目暂停，","time":857000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跳过广告，回放电视节目，","time":860000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还能记住你的观看习惯，","time":863000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你甚至都不用刻意设置它。”","time":865000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"挑剔的人们说：","time":868000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我们不相信你，","time":870000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不需要这样的东西，我们也不喜欢这样的东西。","time":872000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你在唬人。”","time":874000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"假如他们这么说：","time":876000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“如果你","time":878000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"想掌控","time":880000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"生活的方方面面，","time":883000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"朋友，那么就试试我们的产品吧。","time":886000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它可以暂停直播节目，跳过广告，","time":889000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"回放直播节目，还能记下你的观看习惯，等等。","time":891000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们买的不是你的产品；人们买的是你的信念。","time":894000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你所做的仅仅只是","time":896000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你的信念的证明而已。","time":898000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"下面我给大家介绍一个","time":900000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成功的例子。","time":903000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"1963年的夏天，","time":906000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"25万人","time":909000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"聚集在华盛顿特区","time":911000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"聆听马丁•路德•金博士的演讲。","time":913000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时，既没有发请帖，","time":916000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也没有可能在网上查看日期。","time":919000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"怎么会有 25万人参加呢？","time":922000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且，金博士不是美国唯一","time":924000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"的伟大演说家，","time":926000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也不是美国唯一一位在民权法案实施前","time":928000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"遭受歧视的人。","time":930000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"实际上，他的一些想法甚至不正确。","time":932000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是他有个天赋。","time":935000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他没有到处宣扬美国需要改变什么方面，","time":937000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他只是到处告诉别人他所相信的。","time":940000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我相信。我相信。我相信。”","time":942000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他总是这么跟别人说。","time":944000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而那些和他怀有同样信念的人","time":946000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"受了他的启发，他们也开始","time":948000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"将自己的信念告诉别人。","time":950000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有些人建立起一些组织机构","time":952000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"将这些话传给更多的人。","time":954000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你看，就这样，","time":956000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"25万人","time":958000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在那天，那个时候，","time":960000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"聚集在一起听他演讲。","time":963000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"有多少人是为了听 “他” 演说而去的呢？","time":965000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有人。","time":969000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们是为了他们自己而去的。","time":971000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是他们对于美国的信念","time":973000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"支持着他们坐 8个小时的公车，","time":975000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"站在华盛顿八月中旬的烈日下。","time":978000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是他们所相信的信念，而不是黑人跟白人之间的斗争。","time":981000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"25%的听众是白人。","time":984000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"金博士相信","time":987000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"世界上有两种律法，","time":989000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一种是上天制定的，","time":991000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一种是世人制定的。","time":993000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"直到世人制定的法律","time":995000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和上天制定的律法相符合，","time":998000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们才真正生活在公正的世界里。","time":1000000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"民权运动只是碰巧","time":1002000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"帮他将信念","time":1004000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"付诸于现实的一件事情。","time":1007000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们跟随他，不是为了他，而是为了我们自己。","time":1009000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"顺便说一下，他的演讲是 “我有一个梦想”，","time":1012000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不是 “我有一个方案”。","time":1014000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":1016000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"听听现在的政治家们提出的 12点的大杂烩计划，","time":1020000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没一点劲。","time":1023000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一些人是当官的，而另一些人是领袖。","time":1025000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当官的只是占据在有权力","time":1028000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和威严的位置上，","time":1030000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是只有具有领袖素质的人才能激励我们。","time":1032000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论他们是个人还是组织，","time":1036000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们都追隨领袖，","time":1038000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是因为我们必须这样做，","time":1040000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是因为我们愿意。","time":1042000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们跟随具有领袖能力的人，不是为他们，","time":1045000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是为我们自己。","time":1048000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也只有那些从 “为什么”这个圆圈出发的人","time":1050000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"才有能力","time":1053000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"激励周围的人，","time":1055000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者找到能够激励他们的人。","time":1057000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（非常谢谢大家）","time":1060000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":1062000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"848","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"15234","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"How do you explain
when things don't go as we assume?","time":1000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or better, how do you explain","time":5000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when others are able to achieve things
that seem to defy all of the assumptions?","time":8000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For example:","time":12000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why is Apple so innovative?","time":14000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Year after year, after year,","time":16000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they're more innovative
than all their competition.","time":18000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And yet, they're just a computer company.","time":21000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're just like everyone else.","time":23000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They have the same access
to the same talent,","time":25000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the same agencies,","time":27214,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the same consultants, the same media.","time":28239,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Then why is it that they seem
to have something different?","time":30119,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why is it that Martin Luther King
led the Civil Rights Movement?","time":35000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He wasn't the only man
who suffered in pre-civil rights America,","time":39000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and he certainly wasn't
the only great orator of the day.","time":43000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why him?","time":45769,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And why is it that the Wright brothers","time":47000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were able to figure out controlled,
powered man flight","time":50000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when there were certainly other teams","time":53000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who were better qualified,
better funded --","time":55174,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they didn't achieve
powered man flight,","time":58071,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the Wright brothers beat them to it.","time":61000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's something else at play here.","time":62999,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"About three and a half years ago,
I made a discovery.","time":66125,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this discovery profoundly changed
my view on how I thought the world worked,","time":70000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it even profoundly changed the way
in which I operate in it.","time":76000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As it turns out, there's a pattern.","time":82000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As it turns out, all the great inspiring
leaders and organizations in the world,","time":85000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"whether it's Apple or Martin Luther King
or the Wright brothers,","time":89000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they all think, act and communicate
the exact same way.","time":92039,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it's the complete opposite
to everyone else.","time":96000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"All I did was codify it,","time":100000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's probably
the world's simplest idea.","time":102000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I call it the golden circle.","time":106000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Why? How? What?","time":116296,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This little idea explains","time":119000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"why some organizations and some leaders
are able to inspire where others aren't.","time":121000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let me define the terms really quickly.","time":125000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Every single person, every single
organization on the planet","time":127000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"knows what they do, 100 percent.","time":130000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Some know how they do it,","time":134000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"whether you call it
your differentiated value proposition","time":136000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or your proprietary process or your USP.","time":138708,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But very, very few people or organizations
know why they do what they do.","time":141000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And by "why" I don't mean
"to make a profit."","time":145771,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's a result. It's always a result.","time":148000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"By "why," I mean: What's your purpose?","time":150000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What's your cause? What's your belief?","time":152000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why does your organization exist?","time":154463,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why do you get out of bed in the morning?","time":158000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And why should anyone care?","time":160392,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As a result, the way we think, we act,","time":163000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the way we communicate
is from the outside in, it's obvious.","time":164929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We go from the clearest thing
to the fuzziest thing.","time":167769,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But the inspired leaders
and the inspired organizations --","time":170484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"regardless of their size,
regardless of their industry --","time":174000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all think, act and communicate
from the inside out.","time":177619,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Let me give you an example.","time":182547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I use Apple because they're easy
to understand and everybody gets it.","time":184000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If Apple were like everyone else,","time":187412,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a marketing message from them
might sound like this:","time":190007,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""We make great computers.","time":193511,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're beautifully designed,
simple to use and user friendly.","time":196000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Want to buy one?"","time":200000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Meh."","time":202194,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's how most of us communicate.","time":203219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's how most marketing
and sales are done,","time":205000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that's how we communicate interpersonally.","time":207512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We say what we do,","time":209631,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we say how we're different or better","time":211426,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we expect some sort of a behavior,","time":213219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a purchase, a vote, something like that.","time":215100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's our new law firm:","time":217100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have the best lawyers
with the biggest clients,","time":218400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we always perform for our clients.","time":220846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's our new car:","time":222492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It gets great gas mileage,
it has leather seats.","time":224000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Buy our car.","time":226656,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But it's uninspiring.","time":227869,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Here's how Apple actually communicates.","time":229000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Everything we do,
we believe in challenging the status quo.","time":233000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We believe in thinking differently.","time":238000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The way we challenge the status quo","time":241670,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is by making our products
beautifully designed,","time":243455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"simple to use and user friendly.","time":246000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We just happen to make great computers.","time":248000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Want to buy one?"","time":250663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Totally different, right?","time":252892,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're ready to buy a computer from me.","time":254219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I just reversed
the order of the information.","time":256200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What it proves to us is
that people don't buy what you do;","time":258422,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"people buy why you do it.","time":262318,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"This explains why
every single person in this room","time":264747,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is perfectly comfortable buying
a computer from Apple.","time":269000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But we're also perfectly comfortable","time":272000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"buying an MP3 player from Apple,
or a phone from Apple,","time":274000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or a DVR from Apple.","time":277000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As I said before,
Apple's just a computer company.","time":279001,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nothing distinguishes them structurally
from any of their competitors.","time":281552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Their competitors are equally qualified
to make all of these products.","time":285000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, they tried.","time":288472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A few years ago, Gateway
came out with flat-screen TVs.","time":290000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're eminently qualified
to make flat-screen TVs.","time":293000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They've been making
flat-screen monitors for years.","time":295453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nobody bought one.","time":298000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Dell came out with MP3 players and PDAs,","time":302657,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they make great quality products,","time":308000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they can make perfectly
well-designed products --","time":310000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and nobody bought one.","time":313000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, talking about it now,
we can't even imagine","time":314824,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"buying an MP3 player from Dell.","time":317300,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why would you buy one
from a computer company?","time":318872,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But we do it every day.","time":321100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People don't buy what you do;
they buy why you do it.","time":322721,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The goal is not to do business
with everybody who needs what you have.","time":325236,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The goal is to do business with people
who believe what you believe.","time":330785,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Here's the best part:","time":336000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"None of what I'm telling you
is my opinion.","time":337651,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's all grounded
in the tenets of biology.","time":340000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Not psychology, biology.","time":343000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you look at a cross-section
of the human brain,","time":345000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"from the top down,
the human brain is actually broken","time":347763,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"into three major components","time":350420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that correlate perfectly
with the golden circle.","time":352000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Our newest brain, our Homo sapien brain,","time":355000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"our neocortex,","time":358000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"corresponds with the "what" level.","time":360000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The neocortex is responsible","time":362000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for all of our rational
and analytical thought and language.","time":364000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The middle two sections make up
our limbic brains,","time":368000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and our limbic brains are responsible
for all of our feelings,","time":371000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like trust and loyalty.","time":374000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's also responsible
for all human behavior,","time":377000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all decision-making,","time":379167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it has no capacity for language.","time":381000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"In other words, when we communicate
from the outside in,","time":384000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"yes, people can understand vast
amounts of complicated information","time":387000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like features and benefits
and facts and figures.","time":390167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It just doesn't drive behavior.","time":393000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When we can communicate
from the inside out,","time":395000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we're talking directly
to the part of the brain","time":397120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that controls behavior,","time":399383,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then we allow people to rationalize it
with the tangible things we say and do.","time":401000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is where gut decisions come from.","time":405000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sometimes you can give somebody
all the facts and figures,","time":407574,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they say, "I know
what all the facts and details say,","time":411000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but it just doesn't feel right."","time":413746,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why would we use that verb,
it doesn't "feel" right?","time":415300,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because the part of the brain
that controls decision-making","time":417864,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"doesn't control language.","time":420663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The best we can muster up is,","time":422000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I don't know. 
It just doesn't feel right."","time":423485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or sometimes you say you're leading
with your heart or soul.","time":425562,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I hate to break it to you,
those aren't other body parts","time":429000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"controlling your behavior.","time":431696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's all happening here
in your limbic brain,","time":433000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the part of the brain that controls
decision-making and not language.","time":435167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But if you don't know
why you do what you do,","time":438477,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and people respond
to why you do what you do,","time":441000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"then how will you ever get people","time":444000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to vote for you,
or buy something from you,","time":447000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or, more importantly, be loyal","time":449072,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and want to be a part
of what it is that you do.","time":451000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The goal is not just to sell
to people who need what you have;","time":454000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the goal is to sell to people
who believe what you believe.","time":457074,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The goal is not just
to hire people who need a job;","time":460000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's to hire people
who believe what you believe.","time":464000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I always say that, you know,","time":467000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if you hire people just because they can
do a job, they'll work for your money,","time":469144,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but if they believe what you believe,","time":475000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they'll work for you with blood
and sweat and tears.","time":476815,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nowhere else is there a better example
than with the Wright brothers.","time":479274,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Most people don't know
about Samuel Pierpont Langley.","time":483000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And back in the early 20th century,","time":486638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the pursuit of powered man flight
was like the dot com of the day.","time":489000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Everybody was trying it.","time":492167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And Samuel Pierpont Langley
had, what we assume,","time":494000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to be the recipe for success.","time":497000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Even now, you ask people,","time":499697,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Why did your product
or why did your company fail?"","time":501420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and people always give
you the same permutation","time":504063,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of the same three things:","time":506348,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"under-capitalized, the wrong people,
bad market conditions.","time":507793,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's always the same three things,
so let's explore that.","time":510794,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Samuel Pierpont Langley","time":514422,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was given 50,000 dollars
by the War Department","time":516000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to figure out this flying machine.","time":519000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Money was no problem.","time":521000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He held a seat at Harvard","time":522595,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and worked at the Smithsonian
and was extremely well-connected;","time":525000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"he knew all the big minds of the day.","time":528024,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He hired the best minds money could find","time":530000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the market conditions were fantastic.","time":534000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The New York Times
followed him around everywhere,","time":536000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and everyone was rooting for Langley.","time":539000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Then how come we've never heard
of Samuel Pierpont Langley?","time":541000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"A few hundred miles away in Dayton, Ohio,","time":544485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Orville and Wilbur Wright,","time":547579,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they had none of what we consider
to be the recipe for success.","time":549000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They had no money;","time":553000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they paid for their dream
with the proceeds from their bicycle shop.","time":555000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Not a single person
on the Wright brothers' team","time":558263,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"had a college education,","time":560573,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"not even Orville or Wilbur.","time":562000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And The New York Times
followed them around nowhere.","time":564000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The difference was,","time":567000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Orville and Wilbur were driven by a cause,
by a purpose, by a belief.","time":569000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They believed that if they could
figure out this flying machine,","time":573000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it'll change the course of the world.","time":577000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Samuel Pierpont Langley was different.","time":580384,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He wanted to be rich,
and he wanted to be famous.","time":582357,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He was in pursuit of the result.","time":585000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He was in pursuit of the riches.","time":587000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And lo and behold, look what happened.","time":589000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The people who believed
in the Wright brothers' dream","time":590978,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"worked with them with blood
and sweat and tears.","time":594548,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The others just worked for the paycheck.","time":597000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They tell stories of how every time
the Wright brothers went out,","time":599000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they would have to take
five sets of parts,","time":602219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because that's how many times
they would crash before supper.","time":604250,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And, eventually, on December 17th, 1903,","time":608666,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the Wright brothers took flight,","time":612707,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and no one was there
to even experience it.","time":615000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We found out about it a few days later.","time":617072,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And further proof that Langley
was motivated by the wrong thing:","time":620754,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the day the Wright brothers took flight,","time":624801,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"he quit.","time":627159,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He could have said,","time":628184,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""That's an amazing discovery, guys,","time":630000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I will improve
upon your technology," but he didn't.","time":632000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He wasn't first, he didn't get rich,
he didn't get famous, so he quit.","time":635000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"People don't buy what you do;
they buy why you do it.","time":639710,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you talk about what you believe,","time":642234,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you will attract those
who believe what you believe.","time":644000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But why is it important to attract
those who believe what you believe?","time":647000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Something called the law
of diffusion of innovation,","time":652404,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if you don't know the law,
you know the terminology.","time":654981,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The first 2.5% of our population
are our innovators.","time":657515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The next 13.5% of our population
are our early adopters.","time":662000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The next 34% are your early majority,","time":667252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"your late majority and your laggards.","time":669120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The only reason these people
buy touch-tone phones","time":672445,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is because you can't buy
rotary phones anymore.","time":675000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":677263,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"We all sit at various places
at various times on this scale,","time":679000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but what the law of diffusion
of innovation tells us","time":682000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that if you want mass-market success
or mass-market acceptance of an idea,","time":685000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you cannot have it
until you achieve this tipping point","time":690000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"between 15 and 18 percent
market penetration,","time":694000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then the system tips.","time":697000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I love asking businesses,
"What's your conversion on new business?"","time":700000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They love to tell you,
"It's about 10 percent," proudly.","time":703269,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, you can trip
over 10% of the customers.","time":705926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We all have about 10% who just "get it."","time":708093,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's how we describe them, right?","time":710063,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's like that gut feeling,
"Oh, they just get it."","time":711800,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The problem is: How do you
find the ones that get it","time":714301,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"before doing business
versus the ones who don't get it?","time":716761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it's this here, this little gap
that you have to close,","time":719429,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as Jeffrey Moore calls it,
"Crossing the Chasm" --","time":723000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because, you see, the early majority
will not try something","time":725405,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"until someone else has tried it first.","time":729000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And these guys, the innovators
and the early adopters,","time":733000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they're comfortable
making those gut decisions.","time":736000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're more comfortable
making those intuitive decisions","time":738215,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that are driven by what
they believe about the world","time":741000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and not just what product is available.","time":745000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These are the people who stood
in line for six hours","time":747000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to buy an iPhone when they first came out,","time":749671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when you could have bought one
off the shelf the next week.","time":751831,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These are the people
who spent 40,000 dollars","time":755000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on flat-screen TVs
when they first came out,","time":757167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"even though the technology
was substandard.","time":760000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And, by the way, they didn't do it
because the technology was so great;","time":763000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they did it for themselves.","time":767000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's because they wanted to be first.","time":769000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People don't buy what you do;
they buy why you do it","time":771000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and what you do simply proves
what you believe.","time":773501,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, people will do the things
that prove what they believe.","time":777000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The reason that person bought the iPhone
in the first six hours,","time":781000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"stood in line for six hours,","time":786000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was because of what they believed
about the world,","time":788000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and how they wanted everybody to see them:","time":790405,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they were first.","time":792429,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People don't buy what you do;
they buy why you do it.","time":793485,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So let me give you a famous example,","time":796000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a famous failure and a famous success
of the law of diffusion of innovation.","time":798000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"First, the famous failure.","time":802587,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's a commercial example.","time":804000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As we said before, the recipe for success","time":806000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is money and the right people
and the right market conditions.","time":808261,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You should have success then.","time":811677,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Look at TiVo.","time":813446,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"From the time TiVo came out
about eight or nine years ago","time":815000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to this current day,","time":817739,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they are the single highest-quality
product on the market,","time":819001,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"hands down, there is no dispute.","time":822675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They were extremely well-funded.","time":825595,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Market conditions were fantastic.","time":827426,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I mean, we use TiVo as verb.","time":829149,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I TiVo stuff on my piece-of-junk
Time Warner DVR all the time.","time":831000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":834283,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But TiVo's a commercial failure.","time":836799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They've never made money.","time":839000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when they went IPO,","time":841000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"their stock was at about 30 or 40 dollars","time":843000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then plummeted,
and it's never traded above 10.","time":845000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, I don't think
it's even traded above six,","time":847453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"except for a couple of little spikes.","time":850000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Because you see, when TiVo
launched their product,","time":852000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they told us all what they had.","time":854358,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They said, "We have a product
that pauses live TV,","time":857000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"skips commercials, rewinds live TV
and memorizes your viewing habits","time":860478,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"without you even asking."","time":865000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the cynical majority said,","time":868175,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""We don't believe you.","time":870000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We don't need it. We don't like it.","time":872000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're scaring us."","time":874572,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What if they had said,","time":876691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""If you're the kind of person
who likes to have total control","time":878000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"over every aspect of your life,","time":883000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"boy, do we have a product for you.","time":886000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It pauses live TV, skips commercials,","time":889000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"memorizes your viewing habits, etc., etc."","time":891002,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People don't buy what you do;
they buy why you do it,","time":893858,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and what you do simply serves
as the proof of what you believe.","time":896396,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now let me give you a successful example
of the law of diffusion of innovation.","time":900559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In the summer of 1963,","time":906000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"250,000 people showed up
on the mall in Washington","time":909000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to hear Dr. King speak.","time":913000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They sent out no invitations,","time":916154,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and there was no website
to check the date.","time":919000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"How do you do that?","time":922000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, Dr. King
wasn't the only man in America","time":924000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who was a great orator.","time":926167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He wasn't the only man
in America who suffered","time":928594,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in a pre-civil rights America.","time":930784,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, some of his ideas were bad.","time":932586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But he had a gift.","time":935000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He didn't go around telling people
what needed to change in America.","time":936960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He went around
and told people what he believed.","time":940255,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I believe, I believe, I believe,"
he told people.","time":942596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And people who believed what he believed","time":946000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"took his cause, and they made it
their own, and they told people.","time":948555,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And some of those people
created structures","time":952000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to get the word out to even more people.","time":954072,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And lo and behold,
250,000 people showed up","time":956591,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on the right day at the right time
to hear him speak.","time":960000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"How many of them showed up for him?","time":965000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Zero.","time":969319,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They showed up for themselves.","time":971000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's what they believed about America","time":973000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that got them to travel
in a bus for eight hours","time":975726,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to stand in the sun in Washington
in the middle of August.","time":978000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's what they believed,
and it wasn't about black versus white:","time":981000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"25% of the audience was white.","time":984072,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Dr. King believed that there are
two types of laws in this world:","time":987397,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"those that are made by a higher authority
and those that are made by men.","time":991024,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And not until all the laws
that are made by men","time":995000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"are consistent with the laws
made by the higher authority","time":998000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"will we live in a just world.","time":1000817,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It just so happened
that the Civil Rights Movement","time":1002777,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was the perfect thing to help him
bring his cause to life.","time":1005216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We followed, not for him,
but for ourselves.","time":1009000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"By the way, he gave
the "I have a dream" speech,","time":1012000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"not the "I have a plan" speech.","time":1014325,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":1016334,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Listen to politicians now,
with their comprehensive 12-point plans.","time":1020000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're not inspiring anybody.","time":1023215,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because there are leaders
and there are those who lead.","time":1025000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Leaders hold a position
of power or authority,","time":1028000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but those who lead inspire us.","time":1032000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Whether they're individuals
or organizations,","time":1036533,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we follow those who lead,
not because we have to,","time":1038908,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but because we want to.","time":1042000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We follow those who lead, not for them,
but for ourselves.","time":1044785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it's those who start with "why"","time":1050484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that have the ability
to inspire those around them","time":1053000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or find others who inspire them.","time":1057764,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you very much.","time":1061216,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":1062404,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"848","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__description: Brené Brown studies human connection -- our ability to empathize, belong, love. In a poignant, funny talk, she shares a deep insight from her research, one that sent her on a personal quest to know herself as well as to understand humanity. A talk to share.
