(Jessica) Jiang","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"730029","uri":"/profiles/730645","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/01/73/80/95104.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1352593024.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Bowen Yang","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"那我就这么开始吧：","time":0,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几年前，一个活动策划人打电话给我，","time":2000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我当时要做一个演讲。","time":4000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她在电话里说：","time":6000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我真很苦恼该如何在宣传单上","time":8000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"介绍你。”","time":10000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我心想，怎么会苦恼呢？","time":12000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她继续道：“你看，我听过你的演讲，","time":14000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我觉得我可以称你为研究者，","time":16000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可我担心的是，如果我这么称呼你，没人会来听，","time":19000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为大家普遍认为研究员很无趣而且脱离现实。”","time":21000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":23000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好。","time":25000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后她说：“但是我喜欢你的演讲，","time":27000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就跟讲故事一样很吸引人。","time":29000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想来想去，还是觉得称你为讲故事的人比较妥当。”","time":31000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而那个做学术的，感到不安的我","time":34000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"脱口而出道：“你要叫我什么？”","time":37000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说：“我要称你为讲故事的人。\"","time":39000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我心想：”为什么不干脆叫魔法小精灵？“","time":42000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":45000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：”让我考虑一下。“","time":48000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我试着鼓起勇气。","time":51000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我对自己说，我是一个讲故事的人。","time":54000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是一个从事定性研究的科研人员。","time":57000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我收集故事；这就是我的工作。","time":59000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或许故事就是有灵魂的数据。","time":61000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或许我就是一个讲故事的人。","time":64000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"于是我说：”听着，","time":66000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要不你就称我为做研究兼讲故事的人。“","time":68000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说：”哈哈，没这么个说法呀。“","time":71000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":74000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我是个做研究兼讲故事的人，","time":76000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我今天想跟大家谈论的--","time":78000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们要谈论的话题是关于拓展认知--","time":80000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想给你们讲几个故事","time":82000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是关于我的一份研究的，","time":84000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这份研究从本质上拓宽了我个人的认知，","time":87000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也确确实实改变了我生活、爱、","time":90000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"工作还有教育孩子的方式。","time":93000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我的故事从这里开始。","time":95000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我还是个年轻的博士研究生的时候，","time":97000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一年，有位研究教授","time":100000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对我们说：","time":102000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”事实是这样的，","time":104000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果有一个东西你无法测量，那么它就不存在。“","time":106000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我心想他只是在哄哄我们这些小孩子吧。","time":109000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：“真的么？” 他说：“当然。”","time":112000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你得知道","time":115000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我有一个社会工作的学士文凭，一个社会工作的硕士文凭，","time":117000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我在读的是一个社会工作的博士文凭，","time":119000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我整个学术生涯","time":121000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都被人所包围，","time":123000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们大抵相信","time":125000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"生活是一团乱麻，接受它。","time":127000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而我的观点则倾向于，生活是一团乱麻，","time":130000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"解开它，把它整理好，","time":132000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再归类放入便当盒里。","time":135000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":137000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我觉得我领悟到了关键，","time":139000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有能力去创一番事业，让自己--","time":142000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真的，社会工作的一个重要理念是","time":145000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"置身于工作的不适中。","time":148000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我就是要把这不适翻个底朝天","time":151000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每科都拿到A。","time":154000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是我当时的信条。","time":156000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当时真的是跃跃欲试。","time":159000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想这就是我要的职业生涯，","time":161000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我对乱成一团，难以处理的课题感兴趣。","time":164000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想要把它们弄清楚。","time":167000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想要理解它们。","time":169000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想侵入那些","time":171000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道是重要的东西","time":173000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把它们摸透，然后用浅显易懂的方式呈献给每一个人。","time":175000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以我的起点是“关系”。","time":177000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为当你从事了10年的社会工作，","time":180000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你必然会发现","time":183000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"关系是我们活着的原因。","time":185000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它赋予了我们生命的意义。","time":188000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就是这么简单。","time":191000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论你跟谁交流","time":193000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"工作在社会执法领域的也好，负责精神健康、虐待和疏于看管领域的也好","time":195000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们所知道的是，关系","time":198000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是种感应的能力--","time":200000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"生物神经上，我们是这么被设定的--","time":203000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是为什么我们在这儿。","time":206000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我就从关系开始。","time":208000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"下面这个场景我们再熟悉不过了，","time":211000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你的上司给你作工作评估，","time":214000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她告诉了你37点你做得相当棒的地方，","time":216000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有一点--成长的空间？","time":219000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":221000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后你满脑子都想着那一点成长的空间，不是么。","time":223000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这也是我研究的一个方面，","time":227000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为当你跟人们谈论爱情，","time":230000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们告诉你的是一件让他们心碎的事。","time":233000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你跟人们谈论归属感，","time":235000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们告诉你的是最让他们痛心的","time":237000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"被排斥的经历。","time":240000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你跟人们谈论关系，","time":242000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们跟我讲的是如何被断绝关系的故事。","time":244000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以很快的--在大约开始研究这个课题6周以后--","time":247000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我遇到了这个前所未闻的东西","time":250000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它揭示了关系","time":253000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以一种我不理解也从没见过的方式。","time":256000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我暂停了原先的研究计划，","time":259000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对自己说，我得弄清楚这到底是什么。","time":261000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它最终被鉴定为耻辱感。","time":264000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"耻辱感很容易理解，","time":267000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"即害怕被断绝关系。","time":269000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有没有一些关于我的事","time":271000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果别人知道了或看到了，","time":273000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"会认为我不值得交往。","time":276000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要告诉你们的是：","time":279000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种现象很普遍；我们都会有（这种想法）。","time":281000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有体验过耻辱的人","time":283000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不具有人类的同情或关系。","time":285000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没人想谈论自己的糗事，","time":287000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你谈论的越少，你越感到可耻。","time":289000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"滋生耻辱感的","time":294000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是一种“我不够好.\"的心态--","time":296000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们都知道这是个什么滋味：","time":298000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”我不够什么。我不够苗条，","time":300000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不够有钱，不够漂亮，不够聪明，","time":302000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"职位不够高。“","time":304000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而支撑这种心态的","time":306000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是一种刻骨铭心的脆弱，","time":308000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"关键在于","time":311000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要想产生关系，","time":313000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们必须让自己被看见，","time":315000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真真切切地被看见。","time":318000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"你知道我怎么看待脆弱。我恨它。","time":320000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我思考着，这次是轮到我","time":323000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用我的标尺击溃它的时候了。","time":325000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要闯进去，把它弄清楚，","time":328000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要花一年的时间，彻底瓦解耻辱，","time":331000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要搞清楚脆弱是怎么运作的，","time":334000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我要智取胜过它。","time":336000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我准备好了，非常兴奋。","time":339000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟你预计的一样，事与愿违。","time":344000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":346000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道这个（结果）。","time":349000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我能告诉你关于耻辱的很多东西，","time":351000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但那样我就得占用别人的时间了。","time":353000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我在这儿可以告诉你，归根到底 --","time":355000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这也许是我学到的最重要的东西","time":358000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在从事研究的数十年中。","time":361000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我预计的一年","time":364000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"变成了六年，","time":366000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成千上万的故事，","time":368000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成百上千个采访，焦点集中。","time":370000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有时人们发给我期刊报道，","time":373000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"发给我他们的故事 --","time":375000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不计其数的数据，就在这六年中。","time":378000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我大概掌握了它。","time":381000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我大概理解了这就是耻辱，","time":383000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是它的运作方式。","time":385000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我写了本书，","time":387000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我出版了一个理论，","time":389000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但总觉得哪里不对劲 --","time":391000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它其实是，","time":394000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我粗略地把我采访过的人","time":396000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"分成","time":398000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"具有自我价值感的人 --","time":401000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说到底就是","time":404000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"自我价值感 --","time":406000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们勇于去爱并且拥有强烈的归属感 --","time":408000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"另一部分则是为之苦苦挣扎的人，","time":411000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"总是怀疑自己是否足够好的人。","time":413000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"区分那些","time":415000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"敢于去爱","time":417000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并拥有强烈归属感的人","time":419000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和那些为之而苦苦挣扎的人的变量只有一个。","time":421000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那就是，那些敢于去爱","time":423000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并拥有强烈归属感的人","time":425000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"相信他们值得被爱，值得享有归属感。","time":427000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就这么简单。","time":430000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们相信自己的价值。","time":432000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而对于我，","time":435000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那个阻碍人与人之间关系的最困难的部分","time":438000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是我们对于自己不值得享有这种关系的恐惧，","time":441000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论从个人，还是职业上","time":444000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我都觉得我有必要去更深入地了解它。","time":446000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以接下来","time":449000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我找出所有的采访记录","time":452000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"找出那些体现自我价值的，那些持有这种观念的记录，","time":454000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"集中研究它们。","time":457000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这群人有什么共同之处？","time":460000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我对办公用品有点痴迷，","time":462000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这是另一个话题了。","time":464000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我有一个牛皮纸文件夹，还有一个三福极好笔，","time":467000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我心想，我该怎么给这项研究命名呢？","time":470000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一个蹦入我脑子的是","time":472000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"全心全意这个词。","time":474000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一群全心全意，靠着一种强烈的自我价值感在生活的人们。","time":476000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我在牛皮纸夹的上端这样写道，","time":479000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而后我开始查看数据。","time":482000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实上，我开始是","time":484000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用四天时间","time":486000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"集中分析数据，","time":488000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我从头找出那些采访，找出其中的故事和事件。","time":491000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"主题是什么？有什么规律？","time":494000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我丈夫带着孩子离开了小镇，","time":497000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我老是陷入像杰克逊.波洛克（美国近代抽象派画家）似的疯狂状态，","time":500000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我一直在写，","time":503000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"完全沉浸在研究的状态中。","time":505000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"下面是我的发现。","time":508000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些人的共同之处在于","time":512000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"勇气。","time":514000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想在这里先花一分钟跟大家区分一下勇气和胆量。","time":516000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"勇气，最初的定义，","time":519000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当它刚出现在英文里的时候 --","time":521000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是从拉丁文cor，意为心，演变过来的 --","time":523000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最初的定义是","time":526000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真心地叙述一个故事，告诉大家你是谁的。","time":528000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以这些人","time":531000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就具有勇气","time":533000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"承认自己不完美。","time":535000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们具有同情心，","time":538000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"先是对自己的，再是对他人的，","time":540000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为，事实是，我们如果不能善待自己，","time":543000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也无法善待他人。","time":546000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最后一点，他们都能和他人建立关系，","time":549000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"-- 这是很难做到的--","time":551000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"前提是他们必须坦诚，","time":553000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们愿意放开自己设定的那个理想的自我","time":556000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以换取真正的自我，","time":559000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是赢得关系的","time":561000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"必要条件。","time":564000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"他们还有另外一个共同之处","time":568000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那就是，","time":570000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们全然接受脆弱。","time":575000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们相信","time":580000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让他们变得脆弱的东西","time":583000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也让他们变得美丽。","time":586000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们不认为脆弱","time":590000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是寻求舒适，","time":592000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也不认为脆弱是钻心的疼痛 --","time":594000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"正如我之前在关于耻辱的采访中听到的。","time":597000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们只是简单地认为脆弱是必须的。","time":599000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们会谈到愿意","time":603000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说出\"我爱你\"，","time":605000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"愿意","time":608000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"做些","time":611000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有的事情，","time":613000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"愿意","time":616000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"等待医生的电话，","time":618000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在做完乳房X光检查之后。","time":620000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们愿意为情感投资，","time":623000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论有没有结果。","time":626000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们觉得这些都是最根本的。","time":629000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我当时认为那是背叛。","time":632000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我无法相信","time":635000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我尽然对科研宣誓效忠 --","time":638000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"研究的定义是","time":640000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"控制（变量）然后预测，去研究现象，","time":642000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为了一个明确的目标，","time":645000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去控制并预测。","time":647000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而我现在的使命","time":649000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"即控制并预测","time":651000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"却给出了这样一个结果：要想与脆弱共存","time":653000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就得停止控制，停止预测","time":656000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"于是我崩溃了 --","time":659000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":662000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"-- 其实更像是这样。","time":666000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":669000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它确实是。","time":671000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我称它为崩溃，我的心理医生称它为灵魂的觉醒。","time":673000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"灵魂的觉醒当然比精神崩溃要好听很多，","time":677000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我跟你说那的确是精神崩溃。","time":679000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我不得不暂且把数据放一边，去求助心理医生。","time":681000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我告诉你：你知道你是谁","time":683000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你打电话跟你朋友说：“我觉得我需要跟人谈谈。","time":686000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你有什么好的建议吗？“","time":689000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我大约有五个朋友这么回答：","time":692000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”喔。我可不想当你的心理医生。“","time":694000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":696000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：”这是什么意思？“","time":699000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们说：”我只是想说，","time":701000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别带上你的标尺来见我。“","time":704000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：”行。“","time":706000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"就这样我找到了一个心理医生。","time":711000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我跟她，戴安娜，的第一次见面 --","time":713000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我带去了一份表单","time":716000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"上面都是那些全身心投入生活的人的生活方式，然后我坐下了。","time":718000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说：”你好吗？“","time":721000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：”我很好。还不赖。“","time":723000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说：”发生了什么事？“","time":726000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一个治疗心理医生的心理医生，","time":728000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不得不去看这些心理医生，","time":731000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为他们的废话测量仪很准（知道你什么时候在说真心话）。","time":733000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":736000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我说：","time":738000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“事情是这样的。我很纠结。”","time":740000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说：“你纠结什么？”","time":742000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：”嗯，我跟脆弱过不去。","time":744000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且我知道脆弱是","time":747000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"耻辱和恐惧的根源","time":750000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是我们为自我价值而挣扎的根源，","time":752000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但它同时又是","time":754000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"欢乐，创造性，","time":757000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"归属感，爱的源泉。","time":760000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我觉得我有问题，","time":762000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我需要帮助。“","time":764000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我补充道：”但是，","time":767000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这跟家庭无关，","time":769000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟童年无关。“","time":771000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":773000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我只需要一些策略。”","time":775000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":778000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（掌声）","time":782000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"谢谢。","time":785000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"戴安娜的反应是这样的。","time":789000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":792000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我接着说：“这很糟糕，对么？”","time":794000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说：“这不算好，也不算坏。”","time":797000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":800000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“它本身就是这样。”","time":802000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说：“哦，我的天，要悲剧了。”","time":804000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":807000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（悲剧）果然发生了，但又没有发生。","time":810000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大概有一年的时间。","time":812000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道的，有些人","time":815000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当他们发现脆弱和温柔很重要的时候，","time":817000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们放下所有戒备，欣然接受。","time":820000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（我要声明）一，这不是我，","time":823000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"二，我朋友里面也没有这样的人。","time":825000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":828000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对我来说，那是长达一年的斗争。","time":831000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是场激烈的混战。","time":834000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"脆弱打我一拳，我又还击它一拳。","time":836000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最后我输了，","time":838000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我或许赢回了我的生活。","time":841000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"然后我再度投入到了我的研究中，","time":843000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"又花了几年时间","time":845000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真正试图去理解那些全身心投入生活的人，","time":847000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们做了怎样的决定，","time":850000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们是如何应对","time":852000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"脆弱的。","time":854000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么我们为之痛苦挣扎？","time":856000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是独自在跟脆弱斗争吗？","time":858000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是。","time":861000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我学到的：","time":863000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们麻痹脆弱 --","time":866000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（例如）当我们等待（医生）电话的时候。","time":869000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好笑的是，我在Twitter微博和Facebook上发布了一条状态，","time":871000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“你怎样定义脆弱？","time":873000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"什么会让你感到脆弱？“","time":875000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在1个半小时内，我收到了150条回复。","time":877000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我想知道","time":880000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大家都是怎么想的。","time":882000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（回复中有）不得不请求丈夫帮忙，","time":885000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我病了，而且我们刚结婚；","time":887000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟丈夫提出要做爱；","time":890000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟妻子提出要做爱；","time":893000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"被拒绝；约某人出来；","time":895000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"等待医生的答复；","time":898000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"被裁员；裁掉别人--","time":900000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是我们生活的世界。","time":903000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们活在一个脆弱的世界里。","time":905000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们应对的方法之一","time":908000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是麻痹脆弱。","time":910000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我觉得这不是没有依据 --","time":912000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这也不是依据存在的唯一理由，","time":914000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为我们当代问题的一大部分都可以归咎于它 --","time":916000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在美国历史上，我们是欠债最多，","time":918000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"肥胖，","time":922000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"毒瘾、用药最为严重","time":925000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"的一代。","time":928000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"问题是 -- 我从研究中认识到 --","time":933000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你无法选择性地麻痹感情。","time":936000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你不能说，这些是不好的。","time":940000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是脆弱，这是悲哀，这是耻辱，","time":943000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是恐惧，这是失望，","time":945000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想要这些情感。","time":947000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要去喝几瓶啤酒，吃个香蕉坚果松饼。","time":949000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":952000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想要这些情感。","time":954000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道台下传来的是会意的笑声。","time":956000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别忘了，我是靠“入侵”你们的生活过日子的。","time":958000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"天哪。","time":961000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":963000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你无法只麻痹那些痛苦的情感","time":965000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不麻痹所有的感官，所有的情感。","time":968000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你无法有选择性地去麻痹。","time":970000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我们麻痹那些（消极的情感），","time":972000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也麻痹了欢乐，","time":975000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"麻痹了感恩，","time":977000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"麻痹了幸福。","time":979000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我们会变得痛不欲生，","time":981000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们继而寻找生命的意义，","time":984000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我们感到脆弱，","time":986000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我们喝几瓶啤酒，吃个香蕉坚果松饼。","time":988000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"危险的循环就这样这形成了。","time":991000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们需要思考的一件事是","time":996000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们是为什么，怎么样麻痹自己的。","time":999000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这不一定是指吸毒。","time":1001000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们麻痹自己的另一个方式是","time":1004000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把不确定的事变得确定。","time":1006000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"宗教已经从一种信仰、一种对不可知的相信","time":1010000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"变成了确定。","time":1013000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是对的，你是错的。闭嘴。","time":1015000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就是这样。","time":1018000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只要是确定的就是好的。","time":1020000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们越是害怕，我们就越脆弱，","time":1022000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我们变得愈加害怕。","time":1024000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这件就是当今政治的现状。","time":1026000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"探讨已经不复存在。","time":1028000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对话已经荡然无存。","time":1030000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有的仅仅是指责。","time":1032000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道研究领域是如何描述指责的吗？","time":1034000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一种发泄痛苦与不快的方式。","time":1037000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们追求完美。","time":1041000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果有人想这样塑造他的生活，那个人就是我，","time":1043000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这行不通。","time":1046000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我们做的只是把屁股上的赘肉","time":1048000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"挪到我们的脸上。","time":1050000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":1052000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这真是，我希望一百年以后，","time":1055000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当人们回过头来会不禁感叹：”哇！“","time":1057000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":1059000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们想要，这是最危险的，","time":1061000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的孩子变得完美。","time":1063000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我告诉你我们是如何看待孩子的。","time":1065000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从他们出生的那刻起，他们就注定要挣扎。","time":1067000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当你把这些完美的宝宝抱在怀里的时候，","time":1070000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的任务不是说：”看看她，她完美的无可挑剔。“","time":1073000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是确保她保持完美 --","time":1075000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"保证她五年级的时候可以进网球队，七年级的时候稳进耶鲁。","time":1077000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那不是我们的任务。","time":1080000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的任务是注视着她，对她说，","time":1082000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“你知道吗？你并不完美，你注定要奋斗，","time":1084000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但你值得被爱，值得享有归属感。”","time":1087000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这才是我们的职责。","time":1089000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"给我看用这种方式培养出来的一代孩子，","time":1091000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我保证我们今天有的问题会得到解决。","time":1093000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们假装我们的行为","time":1096000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不会影响他人。","time":1100000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不仅在我们个人生活中我们这么做，","time":1103000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在工作中也一样 --","time":1105000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论是紧急救助，石油泄漏，","time":1107000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还是产品召回 --","time":1109000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们假装我们做的事","time":1111000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对他人不会造成什么大影响。","time":1113000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想对这些公司说：嘿，这不是我们第一次牛仔竞技。","time":1116000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们只要你坦诚地，真心地","time":1120000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说一句：\"对不起，","time":1122000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们会处理这个问题。“","time":1124000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"但还有一种方法，我把它留给你们。","time":1130000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我的心得：","time":1132000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"卸下我们的面具，让我们被看见，","time":1134000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"深入地被看见，","time":1136000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"即便是脆弱的一面；","time":1138000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"全心全意地去爱，","time":1141000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"尽管没有任何担保 --","time":1143000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是最困难的，","time":1145000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我也可以告诉你，作为一名家长，这个非常非常困难 --","time":1147000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"带着一颗感恩的心，保持快乐","time":1152000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哪怕是在最恐惧的时候","time":1155000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哪怕我们怀疑：”我能不能爱得这么深？","time":1157000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我能不能如此热情地相信这份感情？","time":1159000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我能不能如此矢志不渝？“","time":1161000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在消极的时候能打住，而不是一味地幻想事情会如何变得更糟，","time":1164000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对自己说：”我已经很感恩了，","time":1166000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为能感受到这种脆弱，这意味着我还活着。“","time":1169000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最后，还有最重要的一点，","time":1173000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那就是相信我们已经做得够好了。","time":1176000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我相信当我们在一个","time":1179000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让人觉得“我已经足够了”的环境中打拼的时候","time":1181000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们会停止抱怨，开始倾听，","time":1185000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们会对周围的人会更友善，更温和，","time":1189000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对自己也会更友善，更温和。","time":1191000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这就是我演讲的全部内容。谢谢大家。","time":1194000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":1196000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1042","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"16482","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"So, I'll start with this: a couple
years ago, an event planner called me","time":1600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I was going
to do a speaking event.","time":5085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she called, and she said,","time":7158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I'm really struggling with how
to write about you on the little flyer."","time":8872,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I thought,
"Well, what's the struggle?"","time":12468,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she said, "Well, I saw you speak,","time":15228,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'm going to call you
a researcher, I think,","time":17156,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I'm afraid if I call you
a researcher, no one will come,","time":19665,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because they'll think
you're boring and irrelevant."","time":22577,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":25060,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And I was like, "Okay."","time":26085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she said, "But the thing
I liked about your talk","time":27685,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is you're a storyteller.","time":30187,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I think what I'll do
is just call you a storyteller."","time":31427,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And of course, the academic,
insecure part of me","time":34730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was like, "You're going
to call me a what?"","time":37730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she said, "I'm going
to call you a storyteller."","time":40064,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I was like, "Why not 'magic pixie'?"","time":42636,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":45509,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I was like, "Let me think
about this for a second."","time":48388,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I tried to call deep on my courage.","time":52031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I thought, you know,
I am a storyteller.","time":54594,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm a qualitative researcher.","time":57730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I collect stories; that's what I do.","time":59158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And maybe stories
are just data with a soul.","time":61396,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And maybe I'm just a storyteller.","time":64325,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so I said, "You know what?","time":66730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why don't you just say
I'm a researcher-storyteller."","time":68413,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she went, "Ha ha.
There's no such thing."","time":71078,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":74730,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I'm a researcher-storyteller,
and I'm going to talk to you today --","time":76437,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we're talking about
expanding perception --","time":80438,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and so I want to talk to you
and tell some stories","time":82511,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about a piece of my research
that fundamentally expanded my perception","time":84917,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and really actually changed
the way that I live and love","time":90100,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and work and parent.","time":93013,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And this is where my story starts.","time":94833,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I was a young researcher,
doctoral student,","time":97730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"my first year, I had
a research professor who said to us,","time":100437,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Here's the thing, if you cannot
measure it, it does not exist."","time":104438,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I thought he was just
sweet-talking me.","time":110114,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was like, "Really?"
and he was like, "Absolutely."","time":113079,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so you have to understand","time":115540,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I have a bachelor's
and a master's in social work,","time":117817,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I was getting my Ph.D. in social work,
so my entire academic career","time":120421,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was surrounded by people who kind of
believed in the "life's messy, love it."","time":123819,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I'm more of the, "life's messy,
clean it up, organize it","time":130214,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and put it into a bento box."","time":135666,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":137467,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And so to think that I had found my way,
to found a career that takes me --","time":139760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"really, one of the big sayings
in social work is,","time":145095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Lean into the discomfort of the work."","time":148452,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I'm like, knock discomfort
upside the head","time":151277,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and move it over and get all A's.","time":153833,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That was my mantra.","time":156135,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I was very excited about this.","time":159730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so I thought, you know what,
this is the career for me,","time":161730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I am interested
in some messy topics.","time":164730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But I want to be able
to make them not messy.","time":167730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I want to understand them.","time":170125,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I want to hack into these things
that I know are important","time":171471,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and lay the code out for everyone to see.","time":175072,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So where I started was with connection.","time":177730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because, by the time
you're a social worker for 10 years,","time":180413,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what you realize is that connection
is why we're here.","time":183849,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's what gives purpose
and meaning to our lives.","time":188580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is what it's all about.","time":191816,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It doesn't matter whether
you talk to people","time":193626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who work in social justice,
mental health and abuse and neglect,","time":195747,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what we know is that connection,
the ability to feel connected, is --","time":198863,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"neurobiologically
that's how we're wired --","time":204688,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's why we're here.","time":206730,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I thought, you know what,
I'm going to start with connection.","time":208133,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, you know that situation","time":211807,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where you get an evaluation
from your boss,","time":213728,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she tells you 37 things
that you do really awesome,","time":216260,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and one "opportunity for growth?"","time":219070,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":221468,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And all you can think about
is that opportunity for growth, right?","time":223936,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, apparently this is the way
my work went as well,","time":227428,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because, when you ask people about love,
they tell you about heartbreak.","time":230150,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When you ask people about belonging,","time":235151,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they'll tell you their most excruciating
experiences of being excluded.","time":237809,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when you ask people about connection,","time":241785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the stories they told me
were about disconnection.","time":244310,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So very quickly -- really about six weeks
into this research --","time":247858,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I ran into this unnamed thing
that absolutely unraveled connection","time":250907,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in a way that I didn't understand
or had never seen.","time":256953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so I pulled back out of the research","time":259849,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and thought, I need
to figure out what this is.","time":261850,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it turned out to be shame.","time":264104,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And shame is really easily understood
as the fear of disconnection:","time":267952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Is there something about me that,
if other people know it or see it,","time":271953,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I won't be worthy of connection?","time":276533,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The things I can tell you about it:","time":280333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's universal; we all have it.","time":282039,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The only people who don't experience shame","time":283730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"have no capacity for human
empathy or connection.","time":285754,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No one wants to talk about it,","time":288112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the less you talk about it,
the more you have it.","time":289730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What underpinned this shame,
this "I'm not good enough," --","time":293745,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which, we all know that feeling:","time":298935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I'm not blank enough.
I'm not thin enough,","time":300563,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"rich enough, beautiful enough,
smart enough, promoted enough."","time":302636,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The thing that underpinned this
was excruciating vulnerability.","time":305914,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This idea of, in order
for connection to happen,","time":311602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we have to allow ourselves
to be seen, really seen.","time":315730,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And you know how I feel
about vulnerability. I hate vulnerability.","time":320801,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so I thought, this is my chance
to beat it back with my measuring stick.","time":324023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going in, I'm going
to figure this stuff out,","time":328545,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to spend a year,
I'm going to totally deconstruct shame,","time":331260,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to understand
how vulnerability works,","time":334594,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'm going to outsmart it.","time":336896,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I was ready, and I was really excited.","time":339380,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As you know,
it's not going to turn out well.","time":344979,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":347146,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"You know this.","time":349683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, I could tell you a lot about shame,","time":351301,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I'd have to borrow
everyone else's time.","time":353214,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But here's what I can tell you
that it boils down to --","time":355335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and this may be one of the most important
things that I've ever learned","time":358216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in the decade of doing this research.","time":361622,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"My one year turned into six years:","time":364808,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thousands of stories, hundreds
of long interviews, focus groups.","time":369024,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"At one point, people were
sending me journal pages","time":373730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and sending me their stories --","time":376135,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"thousands of pieces of data in six years.","time":377996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I kind of got a handle on it.","time":382012,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I kind of understood, this is
what shame is, this is how it works.","time":383730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I wrote a book, I published a theory,
but something was not okay --","time":388192,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and what it was is that, if I roughly
took the people I interviewed","time":394463,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and divided them into people who really
have a sense of worthiness --","time":398643,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that's what this comes down to,
a sense of worthiness --","time":405239,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they have a strong sense
of love and belonging --","time":408025,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and folks who struggle for it,","time":411271,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and folks who are always wondering
if they're good enough.","time":412946,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"There was only one variable that separated","time":416070,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the people who have a strong sense
of love and belonging","time":418333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the people who really struggle for it.","time":421097,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And that was, the people who have
a strong sense of love and belonging","time":423380,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"believe they're worthy
of love and belonging.","time":427122,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it.","time":430444,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They believe they're worthy.","time":432245,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And to me, the hard part of the one thing
that keeps us out of connection","time":435476,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is our fear that we're not
worthy of connection,","time":441318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was something that,
personally and professionally,","time":444557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I felt like I needed to understand better.","time":446984,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So what I did is I took
all of the interviews","time":449547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where I saw worthiness,
where I saw people living that way,","time":454548,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and just looked at those.","time":457390,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What do these people have in common?","time":460054,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I have a slight office supply addiction,
but that's another talk.","time":462126,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I had a manila folder,
and I had a Sharpie,","time":466793,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I was like, what am I going
to call this research?","time":470294,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the first words that came
to my mind were "whole-hearted."","time":472938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These are whole-hearted people,
living from this deep sense of worthiness.","time":476547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I wrote at the top
of the manila folder,","time":480087,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I started looking at the data.","time":482967,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, I did it first in a four-day,
very intensive data analysis,","time":484920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where I went back, pulled the interviews,
the stories, pulled the incidents.","time":490937,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What's the theme? What's the pattern?","time":494538,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My husband left town with the kids","time":497110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I always go into this
Jackson Pollock crazy thing,","time":500111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where I'm just writing
and in my researcher mode.","time":503112,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And so here's what I found.","time":508365,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What they had in common
was a sense of courage.","time":512854,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I want to separate courage
and bravery for you for a minute.","time":516364,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Courage, the original
definition of courage,","time":519485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when it first came
into the English language --","time":521950,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's from the Latin word "cor,"
meaning "heart" --","time":524213,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the original definition was to tell
the story of who you are","time":526590,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with your whole heart.","time":529625,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And so these folks had, very simply,
the courage to be imperfect.","time":531799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They had the compassion to be kind
to themselves first and then to others,","time":538372,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because, as it turns out,","time":543373,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we can't practice compassion
with other people","time":544596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if we can't treat ourselves kindly.","time":546854,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the last was they had connection,
and -- this was the hard part --","time":548999,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as a result of authenticity,","time":553420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they were willing to let go
of who they thought they should be","time":556421,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in order to be who they were,
which you have to absolutely do that","time":559730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for connection.","time":564358,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The other thing that they had
in common was this:","time":568063,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They fully embraced vulnerability.","time":575650,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They believed that what made them
vulnerable made them beautiful.","time":580419,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They didn't talk about vulnerability
being comfortable,","time":590881,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"nor did they really talk
about it being excruciating --","time":594730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as I had heard it earlier
in the shame interviewing.","time":597580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They just talked about it being necessary.","time":600082,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They talked about the willingness
to say, "I love you" first ...","time":603373,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the willingness to do something
where there are no guarantees ...","time":609118,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the willingness to breathe
through waiting for the doctor to call","time":616023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"after your mammogram.","time":620382,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're willing to invest
in a relationship","time":623371,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that may or may not work out.","time":626660,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They thought this was fundamental.","time":629205,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I personally thought it was betrayal.","time":632182,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I could not believe I had pledged
allegiance to research, where our job --","time":635587,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you know, the definition of research
is to control and predict,","time":640207,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to study phenomena for the explicit
reason to control and predict.","time":644295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And now my mission to control and predict","time":648962,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"had turned up the answer
that the way to live is with vulnerability","time":653352,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and to stop controlling and predicting.","time":656945,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This led to a little breakdown --","time":659067,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":661642,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"-- which actually looked more like this.","time":666730,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":669730,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And it did.","time":671247,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I call it a breakdown; my therapist
calls it a spiritual awakening.","time":673248,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":676452,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"A spiritual awakening
sounds better than breakdown,","time":677710,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I assure you, it was a breakdown.","time":680151,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I had to put my data away
and go find a therapist.","time":681952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let me tell you something:
you know who you are","time":684880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when you call your friends and say,
"I think I need to see somebody.","time":687135,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Do you have any recommendations?"","time":690399,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because about five
of my friends were like,","time":692229,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Wooo, I wouldn't want
to be your therapist."","time":694302,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":696470,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I was like, "What does that mean?"","time":699232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And they're like,
"I'm just saying, you know.","time":701233,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Don't bring your measuring stick."","time":704464,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":706465,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I was like, "Okay."","time":709225,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I found a therapist.","time":711285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My first meeting with her, Diana --","time":713143,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I brought in my list of the way
the whole-hearted live, and I sat down.","time":716849,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she said, "How are you?"","time":721167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I said, "I'm great. I'm okay."","time":723000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She said, "What's going on?"","time":726619,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this is a therapist
who sees therapists,","time":728167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because we have to go to those,
because their B.S. meters are good.","time":730810,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":736047,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And so I said, "Here's the thing,
I'm struggling."","time":738476,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she said, "What's the struggle?"","time":742333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I said, "Well, I have
a vulnerability issue.","time":745182,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I know that vulnerability
is the core of shame and fear","time":747467,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and our struggle for worthiness,","time":752846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but it appears that it's also
the birthplace of joy, of creativity,","time":754467,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of belonging, of love.","time":760167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I think I have a problem,
and I need some help."","time":762516,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I said, "But here's the thing:
no family stuff, no childhood shit."","time":767976,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":773167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""I just need some strategies."","time":775167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":778167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":782167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":785776,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So she goes like this.","time":789023,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":792167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And then I said, "It's bad, right?"","time":794547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And she said, "It's neither good nor bad."","time":797167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":800167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":""It just is what it is."","time":802024,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I said, "Oh my God,
this is going to suck."","time":804404,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":807167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And it did, and it didn't.","time":810333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it took about a year.","time":812611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And you know how there are people","time":814698,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that, when they realize that vulnerability
and tenderness are important,","time":816738,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that they surrender and walk into it.","time":820786,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A: that's not me,","time":823971,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and B: I don't even hang out
with people like that.","time":825955,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":828376,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"For me, it was a yearlong street fight.","time":831167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was a slugfest.","time":834492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Vulnerability pushed, I pushed back.","time":836079,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I lost the fight,","time":838333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but probably won my life back.","time":841444,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And so then I went back into the research","time":843467,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and spent the next couple of years","time":845467,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"really trying to understand
what they, the whole-hearted,","time":847167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what choices they were making,
and what we are doing with vulnerability.","time":850167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why do we struggle with it so much?","time":856167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Am I alone in struggling
with vulnerability?","time":858531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No.","time":861930,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So this is what I learned.","time":863167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We numb vulnerability --","time":866699,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when we're waiting for the call.","time":869420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was funny, I sent something out
on Twitter and on Facebook","time":871031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that says, "How would you
define vulnerability?","time":873944,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What makes you feel vulnerable?"","time":876242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And within an hour and a half,
I had 150 responses.","time":877814,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because I wanted to know what's out there.","time":880562,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Having to ask my husband for help
because I'm sick, and we're newly married;","time":885944,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"initiating sex with my husband;","time":890991,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"initiating sex with my wife;","time":893022,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"being turned down; asking someone out;","time":895760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"waiting for the doctor to call back;","time":898762,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"getting laid off; laying off people.","time":900825,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is the world we live in.","time":903191,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We live in a vulnerable world.","time":905702,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And one of the ways we deal
with it is we numb vulnerability.","time":908694,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And I think there's evidence --","time":912428,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's not the only reason
this evidence exists,","time":914167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I think it's a huge cause --","time":916572,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We are the most in-debt ...","time":918705,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"obese ...","time":923278,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"addicted and medicated
adult cohort in U.S. history.","time":925650,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The problem is -- and I learned this
from the research --","time":933055,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that you cannot selectively numb emotion.","time":936349,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You can't say, here's the bad stuff.","time":940031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's vulnerability,
here's grief, here's shame,","time":943167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"here's fear, here's disappointment.","time":945567,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't want to feel these.","time":947267,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to have a couple of beers
and a banana nut muffin.","time":949167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":952073,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I don't want to feel these.","time":954783,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I know that's knowing laughter.","time":956676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I hack into your lives for a living.","time":958676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"God.","time":961167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":963167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"You can't numb those hard feelings","time":965738,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"without numbing
the other affects, our emotions.","time":968520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You cannot selectively numb.","time":971178,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So when we numb those,","time":972654,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we numb joy,","time":975285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we numb gratitude,","time":977832,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we numb happiness.","time":979167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then, we are miserable,","time":981888,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we are looking
for purpose and meaning,","time":985035,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then we feel vulnerable,","time":987068,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so then we have a couple of beers
and a banana nut muffin.","time":988524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it becomes this dangerous cycle.","time":991356,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"One of the things that I think
we need to think about","time":995827,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is why and how we numb.","time":998984,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And it doesn't just have to be addiction.","time":1001668,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The other thing we do is we make
everything that's uncertain certain.","time":1005217,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Religion has gone from a belief
in faith and mystery to certainty.","time":1010167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I'm right, you're wrong. Shut up."","time":1015277,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it.","time":1018927,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just certain.","time":1021351,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The more afraid we are,
the more vulnerable we are,","time":1023080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the more afraid we are.","time":1025520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is what politics looks like today.","time":1026929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's no discourse anymore.","time":1028960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's no conversation.","time":1030659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's just blame.","time":1032547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You know how blame
is described in the research?","time":1033795,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A way to discharge pain and discomfort.","time":1037293,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We perfect.","time":1042356,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If there's anyone who wants their life
to look like this, it would be me,","time":1043570,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but it doesn't work.","time":1047372,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because what we do is we take fat
from our butts and put it in our cheeks.","time":1048623,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":1052267,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Which just, I hope in 100 years,
people will look back and go, "Wow."","time":1055730,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":1059167,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And we perfect,
most dangerously, our children.","time":1061714,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let me tell you what we think
about children.","time":1065167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're hardwired for struggle
when they get here.","time":1067334,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when you hold those perfect
little babies in your hand,","time":1070167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"our job is not to say,
"Look at her, she's perfect.","time":1073073,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My job is just to keep her perfect --","time":1076055,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"make sure she makes the tennis team
by fifth grade and Yale by seventh."","time":1077975,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's not our job.","time":1081406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Our job is to look and say,","time":1082667,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""You know what? You're imperfect,
and you're wired for struggle,","time":1084300,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but you are worthy of love and belonging."","time":1087340,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's our job.","time":1090241,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Show me a generation
of kids raised like that,","time":1091844,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we'll end the problems,
I think, that we see today.","time":1094098,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We pretend that what we do
doesn't have an effect on people.","time":1096723,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We do that in our personal lives.","time":1103611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We do that corporate --","time":1105269,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"whether it's a bailout, an oil spill ...","time":1106516,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a recall.","time":1110126,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We pretend like what we're doing","time":1111310,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"doesn't have a huge impact
on other people.","time":1113311,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I would say to companies,
this is not our first rodeo, people.","time":1116167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We just need you to be authentic
and real and say ...","time":1120509,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""We're sorry. We'll fix it."","time":1124659,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But there's another way,
and I'll leave you with this.","time":1130275,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is what I have found:","time":1133071,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"To let ourselves be seen,
deeply seen, vulnerably seen ...","time":1134476,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to love with our whole hearts,
even though there's no guarantee --","time":1141631,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that's really hard,","time":1146044,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I can tell you as a parent,
that's excruciatingly difficult --","time":1147322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to practice gratitude and joy
in those moments of terror,","time":1153235,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when we're wondering,
"Can I love you this much?","time":1157441,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Can I believe in this this passionately?","time":1159778,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Can I be this fierce about this?"","time":1161988,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just to be able to stop and, instead of
catastrophizing what might happen,","time":1163942,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to say, "I'm just so grateful,","time":1167543,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because to feel this vulnerable
means I'm alive."","time":1169544,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the last, which I think
is probably the most important,","time":1173488,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is to believe that we're enough.","time":1177174,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because when we work from a place,
I believe, that says, "I'm enough" ...","time":1179404,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"then we stop screaming
and start listening,","time":1185483,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we're kinder and gentler
to the people around us,","time":1189475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we're kinder and gentler to ourselves.","time":1191826,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"That's all I have. Thank you.","time":1194865,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":1196367,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1042","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: How to speak so that people want to listen
talk__description: Have you ever felt like you're talking, but nobody is listening? Here's Julian Treasure to help. In this useful talk, the sound expert demonstrates the how-to's of powerful speaking -- from some handy vocal exercises to tips on how to speak with empathy. A talk that might help the world sound more beautiful.
transcript_zh-cn: {"data":{"translation":{"id":"72687","language":{"id":"178","endonym":"中文 (简体)","englishName":"Chinese, Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"2732717","uri":"/profiles/2733783","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/03/da/81/252545.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1398402351.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Qingqing Mao","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"2583181","uri":"/profiles/2584246","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1395256812.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Yuanqing Edberg","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"人类的声音：","time":1960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是我们所有人都弹奏的乐器。","time":4070,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可能是这个世界上最有力的声音。","time":5992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它绝无仅有，或能引起战争，","time":8348,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或能说“我爱你”。","time":10116,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然而，很多人有这种经历，","time":11940,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当他们说的时候，人们并不在听。","time":13816,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是为什么呢？","time":16210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们怎样有力地说","time":17346,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而让世界发生某种改变？","time":19020,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我所提议的是，","time":21136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们需要改变一些习惯。","time":23132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在此我为你们收集整理了，","time":24972,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说话的七宗罪。","time":27308,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我没打算假装这是一个详细的列表，","time":29444,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这七个，我以为是","time":31876,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们相当容易犯的坏习惯。","time":34508,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"第一就是，流言蜚语，","time":37132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在背后说某些人的坏话。","time":39989,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这不是一个好习惯，我们都很明白","time":42700,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那个说闲话的人在五分钟以后","time":44368,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就会在别人跟前说我们的闲话。","time":46700,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"第二，评判。","time":49771,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们知道有些人在谈话中是这样的，","time":51515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这让人很难听进别人的话，","time":53323,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你知道你被人评判","time":55379,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"且被认为不合格。","time":57579,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"第三，消极。","time":60029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你能陷入这个泥潭。","time":61929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的母亲，在她生命的最后几年里，","time":63659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"变得非常非常消极，很难让人听她说话。","time":65211,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我记得有一天，我对她说，","time":67366,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“今天是十月一号，”","time":69303,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说，“我知道，这不可怕吗？”","time":70316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":73140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当某人那么消极的时候是很难让人听进去的。","time":75262,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"另外一种消极，就是抱怨。","time":78440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是英国的全国性艺术。","time":81281,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是我们的全国性运动。我们抱怨天气，","time":85542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"体育和政治，几乎每件事，","time":87670,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但实际上抱怨是病毒性的悲催，","time":90135,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它不会在这个世界上传播太阳和光明。","time":92272,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"借口。我们都遇上过这个家伙。","time":96292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也许我们都曾经是这个家伙。","time":99296,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有些人有指责癖好。","time":100796,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们怪罪任何人","time":103490,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不是对自己的行为负责任，","time":105718,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，这又是让人难以聆听的一种。","time":107346,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"七件里面的老六，倒数第二，","time":110282,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"浮夸，吹牛。","time":112604,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它有时贬低了我们的语言，事实上。","time":116210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如，如果我看见","time":118638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"什么真的很神奇的事情，","time":119940,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那我该说什么呢？","time":121930,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":123826,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当然这种夸大后来就变成了说谎。","time":125840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"彻头彻尾的说谎，我们就不想听","time":128338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种我们知道会说谎的人。","time":129906,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"最后是，固执己见，","time":132223,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把事实和意见混淆。","time":135444,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当这两件事混为一谈，","time":139323,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你就像在听风一样。","time":140912,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道，有人用他们自己的意见来强迫你。","time":142387,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这很难让我们听讲。","time":145987,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这就是说话的七宗罪。","time":148547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为这些是我们需要避免的。","time":151588,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但有没有比较正面的呢？","time":154021,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"的确有。","time":156890,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想建议四种我们可以牢靠站立的","time":158173,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真正强有力的基石或者基础，","time":160419,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我们想让我们的言语有力","time":163443,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并且让世界产生变化。","time":166420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"幸运的是，这些事情连起来是一个单词。","time":169655,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个词就是“hail”，它有着特别好的定义。","time":172523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不是讲那个天上掉下来的","time":175619,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"砸在你头上的东西。","time":177587,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我在谈论的是","time":178875,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“热情地致敬或赞扬”这个定义。","time":180340,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为我们的言辞会如此被接受，","time":182840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我们坚持这四件事。","time":185107,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那么它们到底是什么呢？","time":186649,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看看你是否能猜到。","time":188425,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"H，代表了诚实（Honesty），当然，","time":189825,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说真话，直接了当并且清楚明白。","time":193283,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A，代表了真实(Authenticity)，做一个自然而然的自己。","time":196254,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的一个朋友把它描述为","time":200295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"坚持真实的自己，","time":201869,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我觉得这是一个优美的表述。","time":203505,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I，代表了正气(Integrity)，言而有信，","time":205443,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说到做到，","time":208079,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成为别人能信任的人。","time":209867,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"L，代表爱（Love）。","time":211947,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不是指罗曼蒂克的爱情，","time":215130,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是指对别人有良好的祝愿，这出于两个原因。","time":217251,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一，我认为绝对的诚实","time":220660,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也许不是我们所想要的。","time":222907,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的意思是，天哪，今天早上你真难看。","time":224030,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那可能不必要。","time":226663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"诚实是很重要的。当然，适当地带着爱。","time":230021,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但还有，当你真的很希望别人好，","time":233379,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就很难同时评判他们。","time":236474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不知道你们是否能","time":239111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同时做到这两点。","time":241534,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么hail。","time":243310,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"上面提到的是你所说的内容。","time":244910,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"另外，就像老歌里唱的，你所说的很重要，","time":246667,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有你的表达方式也很重要。","time":248845,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你有一个很神奇的工具盒。","time":250338,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"里面有难以置信的工具，","time":252410,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然而这个工具盒只有不多的人打开过。","time":254270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我愿意跟你们在这里","time":257810,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"做一点儿探查，并且找出几种工具。","time":259331,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你也许想拿来试一下，","time":261240,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些将会增加你说话的力量。","time":263110,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"比如说，音域。","time":266242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"假声大部分时候可能是没用的，","time":267986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但在两者之间会有一种是有用的。","time":272180,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对于在座的语音教练们，","time":274234,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不会在这个问题上很深入。","time":275619,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然而，你能定位你的声音。","time":277299,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我把声音提到鼻子这儿，你可以听出不同。","time":279242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我把声音降到嗓子这里，","time":281976,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我们大部分人大多数时候所做的。","time":283784,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是如果你想有份量，","time":286785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你需要降到胸腔。","time":288642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你听出了不同吗？","time":291120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们给声音低沉的政治家投票，那是真的，","time":292730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我们把深沉","time":296770,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和权力、权威联系在一起。","time":299738,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是音域。","time":302445,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"然后我们再说音色，","time":304134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是你的声音让人感觉如何。","time":305501,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"研究显示我们喜欢那种","time":307270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"丰厚，平滑，温暖，像热巧克力一样的声音。","time":309190,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当然如果你没有那样的声音，这也不是世界末日。","time":314635,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为你可以训练。","time":317923,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去找到一个声音教练。","time":319365,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以做很神奇的事情，","time":320609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"利用呼吸，姿势，还有锻炼","time":322185,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来提高你嗓音的音色。","time":324921,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"然后是韵律。我喜欢韵律。","time":327435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是唱歌，是元语言，","time":329227,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们用来传送意味。","time":331403,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在谈话中是意思的根基。","time":333477,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那种说话一个声调的人","time":336315,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很难让人听讲，","time":338538,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果他们没有一点儿韵律。","time":340395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那就是单调这个词的来源，","time":342611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者说枯燥无味，一成不变。","time":345586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们还有重复性的韵律，","time":348306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每个句子的结尾好像是一个疑问句，","time":351603,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但事实上，它不是疑问句，而是陈述句。","time":354323,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":356371,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你一遍一遍地重复某个东西，","time":359154,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它会限制你","time":361170,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用韵律来交流的能力，","time":362347,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为这是一件憾事，","time":363895,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我们努力打破那个习惯。","time":365820,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"语速，我可以非常非常兴奋地","time":368741,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"飞快地说着什么，","time":370871,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者我能慢下来强调，","time":372283,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在结尾处，当然是我们的老朋友，","time":376579,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"沉默。","time":378920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在讲话中，有一点儿沉默","time":382555,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没关系，是吗？","time":384426,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不需要用“嗯” 和“ 啊”来填充。","time":386561,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"沉默就很有力。","time":389425,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"当然，音调常常跟语速一起","time":391823,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来指示兴奋度，但你能仅仅用音调就显示出来。","time":394151,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你把我的钥匙放在哪儿啦？","time":396679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你把我的钥匙放在哪儿啦？","time":398383,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么轻微的差别","time":400287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在这两个表达中。","time":402190,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"最后，是音量。","time":404156,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我能用音量表示极端的兴奋。","time":406402,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我打扰了任何人的话，抱歉。","time":409803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者，我能用很轻的声音","time":411980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让你认真地注意。","time":414291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有人全程一直都在说话。","time":416342,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别那样。","time":418427,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那叫做“公放音乐”，","time":419900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把你的声音不假思索","time":423259,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和草率地强加给别人。不好。","time":425875,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"当然，这些工具真正发挥作用的地方，","time":429671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是当你有什么很重要的事情要做的时候。","time":431571,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可能是像这样站在演讲台上","time":433899,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对着人演讲。","time":435535,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它可能是求婚，","time":437010,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要求加薪，或者婚礼上的讲话。","time":439539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不管是什么，如果它非常重要，","time":442693,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你应该看着这个工具盒，","time":444949,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以及将要工作运行的发动机，","time":448179,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有预热的发动机不会好好工作。","time":450509,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"预热你自己的声音。","time":453604,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"让我给你演示怎样做。","time":455580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们都愿意站起来一会儿吗？","time":457428,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我会给你演示六个预热声音的锻炼，","time":460536,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在每次演讲之前我都这么做。","time":463452,"__typename":"Cue"},{"tex
