t":"在跟任何重要的人谈话之前，做以下这些。","time":466925,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一，举起双臂，吸气，","time":469696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后呼出，啊哈，就像那样。","time":472662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再来一次。","time":475764,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"啊哈，很好。","time":477392,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我们要预热我们的嘴唇，","time":480390,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"做出吧，吧，吧，吧，","time":482132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"吧，吧，吧，吧。很好。","time":484484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在，brrrrrrr，","time":487436,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就像你是个孩子。","time":490876,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"brrrrr。现在你的嘴唇应该活了。","time":492326,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"下一个是舌头，","time":494853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"夸张的啦，啦，啦，啦……","time":496428,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"美极了。你们做得很好。","time":500850,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，卷舌一个R，Rrrrrr。","time":502360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就像给舌头的香槟酒。","time":505955,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最后，如果我只能做一个，","time":508171,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"专业人士把这叫做警报。","time":510491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个特别好。它开始于“we”然后转为“aw”。","time":512298,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“we”是高音，“aw”是低音。","time":514731,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么就是，“weeeaawww……”","time":515991,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"妙极了。给你自己来鼓个掌。","time":522706,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"请坐，谢谢你们。（鼓掌）","time":524882,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"下次你演讲之前，提前做到这几项。","time":527712,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"现在让我在结束之前作个总结。","time":530336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这一点是认真的。","time":532976,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是我们的所在，对吗？","time":535272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们说得不好，","time":537103,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们也听不进去，","time":538768,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在一个吵闹和喧哗的环境里。","time":540136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我已经在讲台上","time":543055,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"分阶段地谈到这个问题。","time":545120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个世界会是怎样，","time":546798,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我们有说服力，","time":548432,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们有意识地听，","time":550152,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在一个量身定做的环境下？","time":552208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者说得更大一些，","time":555602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"世界将会是怎样，","time":558585,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我们有意识地说话，","time":559682,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有意识地倾听，","time":562310,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并且有意识地针对声音","time":564343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来设计我们的周围环境？","time":565970,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那会是一个听起来非常美丽的世界，","time":567447,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在那儿","time":570671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"理解会是常态。","time":572567,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是一个值得传播的理念。","time":574582,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"感谢你们。","time":577255,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢你们。（鼓掌）","time":579663,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2034","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}
transcript_en:
{"data":{"translation":{"id":"72694","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"The human voice:","time":1960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's the instrument we all play.","time":4070,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's the most powerful sound
in the world, probably.","time":6610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's the only one that can start a war
or say "I love you."","time":9093,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And yet many people have the experience","time":11940,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that when they speak, people
don't listen to them.","time":13822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And why is that?","time":16210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"How can we speak powerfully
to make change in the world?","time":17346,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What I'd like to suggest,","time":21485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there are a number of habits
that we need to move away from.","time":22821,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've assembled for your pleasure here
seven deadly sins of speaking.","time":25690,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm not pretending
this is an exhaustive list,","time":29444,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but these seven, I think, are pretty large
habits that we can all fall into.","time":31876,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"First, gossip.","time":37132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Speaking ill of somebody
who's not present.","time":39989,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Not a nice habit,
and we know perfectly well","time":42700,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the person gossiping, five minutes later,
will be gossiping about us.","time":44820,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Second, judging.","time":49771,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We know people who are like this
in conversation,","time":51515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's very hard to listen to somebody","time":53923,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if you know that you're being judged
and found wanting at the same time.","time":55879,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Third, negativity.","time":60029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You can fall into this.","time":62447,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My mother, in the last years of her life,
became very negative,","time":63759,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's hard to listen.","time":66820,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I remember one day, I said to her,
"It's October 1 today,"","time":68166,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she said, "I know, isn't it dreadful?"","time":70923,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":73040,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"It's hard to listen
when somebody's that negative.","time":75262,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":77635,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And another form
of negativity, complaining.","time":78931,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, this is the national art of the U.K.","time":81475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's our national sport.","time":85542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We complain about the weather, sport,
about politics, about everything,","time":86977,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but actually, complaining is viral misery.","time":90435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's not spreading sunshine
and lightness in the world.","time":92555,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Excuses.","time":96292,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"We've all met this guy.","time":98048,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Maybe we've all been this guy.","time":99396,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Some people have a blamethrower.","time":100996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They just pass it on to everybody else","time":103490,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and don't take responsibility
for their actions,","time":105718,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and again, hard to listen
to somebody who is being like that.","time":108046,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Penultimate, the sixth of the seven,","time":110982,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"embroidery, exaggeration.","time":112804,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It demeans our language,
actually, sometimes.","time":116210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For example, if I see something
that really is awesome,","time":118638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what do I call it?","time":121930,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":123220,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And then, of course,
this exaggeration becomes lying,","time":125840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we don't want to listen
to people we know are lying to us.","time":129300,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And finally, dogmatism.","time":132323,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The confusion of facts with opinions.","time":135688,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When those two things get conflated,","time":139323,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you're listening into the wind.","time":141262,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You know, somebody is bombarding you
with their opinions as if they were true.","time":142763,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's difficult to listen to that.","time":146454,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So here they are, seven deadly
sins of speaking.","time":148547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These are things I think we need to avoid.","time":151588,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But is there a positive
way to think about this?","time":154021,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Yes, there is.","time":156890,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'd like to suggest that there are four
really powerful cornerstones, foundations,","time":158458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that we can stand on if we want our speech","time":163974,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to be powerful and to make
change in the world.","time":166420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Fortunately, these things spell a word.","time":170288,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The word is "hail," and it has
a great definition as well.","time":172523,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm not talking about the stuff
that falls from the sky","time":175619,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and hits you on the head.","time":178287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm talking about this definition,","time":179575,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to greet or acclaim enthusiastically,","time":181219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which is how I think
our words will be received","time":183040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if we stand on these four things.","time":185307,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So what do they stand for?","time":186903,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"See if you can guess.","time":188425,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The H, honesty, of course,","time":190320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"being true in what you say,
being straight and clear.","time":193283,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The A is authenticity,
just being yourself.","time":196254,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A friend of mine described it as
standing in your own truth,","time":200295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which I think is a lovely way to put it.","time":203505,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The I is integrity, being your word,","time":205443,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"actually doing what you say,","time":208079,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and being somebody people can trust.","time":209867,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the L is love.","time":212358,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't mean romantic love,","time":215130,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I do mean wishing people
well, for two reasons.","time":217251,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"First of all, I think absolute honesty
may not be what we want.","time":220660,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I mean, my goodness,
you look ugly this morning.","time":224074,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Perhaps that's not necessary.","time":226663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Tempered with love, of course,
honesty is a great thing.","time":230021,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But also, if you're really
wishing somebody well,","time":233379,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's very hard to judge
them at the same time.","time":236474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm not even sure you can do
those two things simultaneously.","time":239111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So hail.","time":243310,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Also, now that's what you say,","time":244910,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's like the old song,
it is what you say,","time":246667,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's also the way that you say it.","time":248935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You have an amazing toolbox.","time":250638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This instrument is incredible,","time":252410,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and yet this is a toolbox
that very few people have ever opened.","time":254270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'd like to have a little rummage
in there with you now","time":257810,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and just pull a few tools out","time":260431,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that you might like to take
away and play with,","time":261855,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which will increase
the power of your speaking.","time":264118,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Register, for example.","time":266442,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, falsetto register may not
be very useful most of the time,","time":267986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but there's a register in between.","time":272180,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm not going to get very
technical about this","time":274234,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for any of you who are voice coaches.","time":276419,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You can locate your voice, however.","time":278205,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So if I talk up here in my nose,
you can hear the difference.","time":279942,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If I go down here in my throat,","time":282824,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which is where most of us
speak from most of the time.","time":284332,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But if you want weight,","time":286985,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you need to go down here to the chest.","time":288642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You hear the difference?","time":291120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We vote for politicians
with lower voices, it's true,","time":292730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because we associate depth with power","time":296770,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and with authority.","time":299738,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's register.","time":302445,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Then we have timbre.","time":304134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's the way your voice feels.","time":305501,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Again, the research shows","time":307270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that we prefer voices
which are rich, smooth, warm,","time":308626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like hot chocolate.","time":312424,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well if that's not you,
that's not the end of the world,","time":314635,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because you can train.","time":317923,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Go and get a voice coach.","time":319365,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And there are amazing things you can do","time":320609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with breathing, with posture,
and with exercises","time":322491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to improve the timbre of your voice.","time":324921,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Then prosody. I love prosody.","time":327435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is the sing-song, the meta-language","time":329227,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that we use in order to impart meaning.","time":331403,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's root one for meaning in conversation.","time":333477,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People who speak all on one note
are really quite hard to listen to","time":336315,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if they don't have any prosody at all.","time":340395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's where the word
"monotonic" comes from,","time":342611,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or monotonous, monotone.","time":345586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Also, we have repetitive
prosody now coming in,","time":348306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where every sentence ends
as if it were a question","time":351603,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when it's actually not
a question, it's a statement?","time":354323,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":356824,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And if you repeat that one,","time":359154,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's actually restricting your ability
to communicate through prosody,","time":360740,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which I think is a shame,","time":364108,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so let's try and break that habit.","time":365994,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Pace.","time":369315,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I can get very excited by saying
something really quickly,","time":370418,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or I can slow right down to emphasize,","time":373203,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and at the end of that, of course,
is our old friend silence.","time":376579,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's nothing wrong with a bit
of silence in a talk, is there?","time":382555,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We don't have to fill it with ums and ahs.","time":386561,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It can be very powerful.","time":389833,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Of course, pitch often
goes along with pace","time":391823,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to indicate arousal, but you
can do it just with pitch.","time":394151,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Where did you leave my keys?","time":396795,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Higher pitch) Where did you
leave my keys?","time":398383,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, slightly different meaning
in those two deliveries.","time":400487,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And finally, volume.","time":404156,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Loud) I can get really excited
by using volume.","time":406402,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sorry about that, if I startled anybody.","time":409803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or, I can have you really pay attention
by getting very quiet.","time":411980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Some people broadcast the whole time.","time":416707,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Try not to do that.","time":418527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's called sodcasting,","time":419900,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":421752,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Imposing your sound on people around you
carelessly and inconsiderately.","time":423445,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Not nice.","time":428013,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Of course, where this all comes
into play most of all","time":429115,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is when you've got something
really important to do.","time":431671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It might be standing on a stage like this
and giving a talk to people.","time":434199,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It might be proposing marriage,","time":437651,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"asking for a raise, a wedding speech.","time":439539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Whatever it is, if it's really important,","time":442693,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you owe it to yourself
to look at this toolbox","time":444699,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the engine that it's going to work on,","time":448472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and no engine works well
without being warmed up.","time":450509,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Warm up your voice.","time":453604,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Actually, let me show you how to do that.","time":455482,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Would you all like to stand
up for a moment?","time":457557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to show you","time":460536,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the six vocal warm-up exercises
that I do before every talk I ever do.","time":461691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Any time you're going to talk
to anybody important, do these.","time":466925,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"First, arms up, deep breath in,","time":469859,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and sigh out, ahhhhh, like that.","time":472662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One more time.","time":475764,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Ahhhh, very good.","time":477392,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now we're going to warm up our lips,","time":480390,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we're going to go Ba, Ba, Ba, Ba,","time":482132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Ba, Ba, Ba, Ba. Very good.","time":484484,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And now, brrrrrrrrrr,","time":487436,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just like when you were a kid.","time":490876,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Brrrr. Now your lips
should be coming alive.","time":492426,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We're going to do the tongue next","time":494853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with exaggerated la, la, la,
la, la, la, la, la, la.","time":496528,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Beautiful. You're getting
really good at this.","time":500850,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then, roll an R. Rrrrrrr.","time":503065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's like champagne for the tongue.","time":505955,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Finally, and if I can only do one,","time":508171,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the pros call this the siren.","time":510491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's really good. It starts
with "we" and goes to "aw."","time":512298,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The "we" is high, the "aw" is low.","time":514942,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you go, weeeaawww, weeeaawww.","time":516586,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Fantastic. Give yourselves
a round of applause.","time":522706,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Take a seat, thank you.","time":524969,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":526238,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Next time you speak, do those in advance.","time":527712,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now let me just put this
in context to close.","time":530336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is a serious point here.","time":532976,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is where we are now, right?","time":535272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We speak not very well","time":537103,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to people who simply aren't listening","time":538768,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in an environment that's all
about noise and bad acoustics.","time":540636,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I have talked about that on this stage
in different phases.","time":543555,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What would the world be like","time":546798,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if we were speaking powerfully","time":548432,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to people who were listening consciously","time":550152,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in environments which were
actually fit for purpose?","time":552208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or to make that a bit larger,","time":555602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"what would the world be like","time":558585,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if we were creating sound consciously","time":559943,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and consuming sound consciously","time":562310,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and designing all our environments","time":564343,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"consciously for sound?","time":566070,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That would be a world
that does sound beautiful,","time":567547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and one where understanding
would be the norm,","time":570671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that is an idea worth spreading.","time":574582,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":577255,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":578411,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2034","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: My philosophy for a happy life
talk__description: Born with a rare genetic disorder called progeria, Sam Berns knew he'd be facing more obstacles in life than most. This didn't stop him from taking charge of his own happiness. In this moving and inspirational talk, Berns lays out the three principles of the personal philosophy that allowed him to do so.
transcript_zh-cn:
{"data":{"translation":{"id":"65684","language":{"id":"178","endonym":"中文 (简体)","englishName":"Chinese, Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"865474","uri":"/profiles/866420","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/03/48/32/215090.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1352599726.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Dong Mao","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"2340494","uri":"/profiles/2341559","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/03/39/6c/211308.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1389541036.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Yikai Yang","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"大家好","time":18023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是山姆","time":20217,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"才满17岁","time":21634,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几年前 高一之前","time":24401,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想要在校军乐队（Foxboro福克斯波罗高中）里打军鼓","time":27648,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我十分想要实现这个梦想","time":32852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不过问题是每个军鼓套件","time":35589,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"重量大约40磅左右（18公斤）","time":37852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我患有一种叫做Progeria（早年衰老症）的病","time":40155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以至于我本身才只有50磅（23公斤）左右","time":42770,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以 理论上 我根本没有办法身挂普通尺寸的军鼓","time":46858,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此乐队主管只能派我在","time":51615,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"中场表演时演奏后排打击乐器","time":55654,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当时的后排打击乐器很有趣","time":59005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"囊括了许多非常酷的节奏打击乐器","time":61110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像邦哥小对鼓 定音鼓","time":64803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"蒂姆巴尔鼓以及牛铃","time":68623,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"虽然这些是很有趣","time":71107,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我还是沮丧极了
因为这些跟军乐都全然无关","time":73318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我坚信没有任何事能阻挡我","time":78420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在中场表演时","time":80914,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在军乐队里打军鼓","time":83585,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以一位工程师应我与我家人之邀
为我量身设计了","time":85010,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一个特制的军鼓背带","time":89865,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它很轻以至我能方便的穿上它","time":91793,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"经过不懈努力","time":95580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们做出了一个仅有6磅（2.7公斤）左右的军鼓套装装置","time":99638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":103859,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想让大家更深入了解一下早衰症的情况","time":108129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在世界上仅只有350例","time":112427,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是一种极为罕见的疾病","time":118340,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它的症状体现在：","time":120880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"紧肤、体重缺增、成长萎缩","time":123335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以及心脏病","time":127408,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去年我母亲以及她的科学家团队","time":129011,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成功发表了第一个早衰症治疗范本","time":132586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此我应邀接受
NPR（美国国家广播）的采访","time":136725,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"主持人约翰汉密尔顿问我","time":139460,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“关于你 大家最需要了解什么？”","time":142006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“关于你 大家最需要了解什么？”","time":144272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的回答很简单","time":146538,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的生活很快乐","time":149264,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":151691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"虽然我在生活中遇到很多阻碍","time":155762,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"绝大多数都归咎于早衰症","time":159663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想人们因此为我感到难受","time":162533,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我从不在乎这些障碍","time":165095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"无论如何我都能尽力克服它们","time":167802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此我今天才能坐在这和大家
分享我快乐的人生哲学","time":171007,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以对我而言这种理念有三个方面
这一点引自著名的弗瑞斯布依勒
（1986年电影《咪走堂》主角）","time":176132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"时光如梭，若不止步环顾四周，你可能将错过一些值得留意的东西——Ferris Bueller （《咪走堂》）","time":180757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一点我的人生哲学理念是","time":184830,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"命里无时莫强求","time":188516,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我可以做的仍有很多很多","time":191552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们有时会问我","time":194032,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“伴随着早衰症的生活是不是很艰难？”","time":196799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"又或
"患有早衰症的你每日都会面临什么样的挑战?"","time":199252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想说 即使我有早衰症","time":202569,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我大部分的时间都花在考虑一些","time":206053,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟早衰症无关的事情上","time":208686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是这并不意味着我完全
忽略了这些障碍的消极因素","time":211534,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我无法做某事时","time":216435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"例如长距离跑步或玩激烈的过山车","time":218491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我当然知道我会错过什么","time":222557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但取而代之的，我选择侧重那些","time":224583,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对我来说充满热情的活动","time":228499,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"例如童子军 音乐或漫画书","time":232276,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"又或任何关于我最爱的波士顿体育队的活动","time":235791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是的，所以——
（笑声）","time":238756,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不过 有时我会通过一定的调整","time":241862,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"寻找一些不同于常人的方式去做某些事","time":246001,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最终把这些东西归类于个人"能做"的范畴里","time":247712,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"正如方才各位所见的
军鼓一事","time":251799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此 这里有个视频片段","time":254803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"关于几年前我和我们","time":256512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Foxboro高中军乐队在一次中场演奏的","time":258951,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"《蜘蛛侠》的一个片段","time":261760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（视频）","time":263864,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"♫ 蜘蛛侠主题曲","time":266648,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（掌声）","time":307115,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"谢谢","time":310622,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好吧 好吧 所以——","time":312548,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很酷是吧","time":314921,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这样我就已然能够完成","time":316226,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"想在军乐队里演奏
小军鼓的这一梦想","time":319561,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我相信我可以
做到我所有的梦想","time":322117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以同样希望你也用这种理念
以实现你自己的梦想","time":325009,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"下一个观点是：","time":330167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我始终跟那些与我志同道合的人在一起","time":332382,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些品质高尚的人们","time":336818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我非常幸运的拥有
一个不可思议的家庭","time":338634,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们始终支持着我
并贯穿这我整个的一生","time":342680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在学校里我也相当幸运的","time":346110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"拥有一群非常铁朋友们","time":348489,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们同样都傻傻的痴迷于乐队","time":351498,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我们真正欣赏和享受
彼此的照顾和陪伴","time":355050,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们互帮互助
当需要彼此帮助时","time":357412,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"彼此心有灵犀","time":360434,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们在一起共同进退","time":364562,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我们高二","time":366865,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此我们可以指导年轻的乐队成员","time":369372,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"作为一个这个集体的一员","time":375129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我热衷于在一个
像乐队一样的集体里","time":376986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我们在一起制作音乐","time":379916,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种音乐是真的 是真诚的
它完全取代了我的早衰症","time":382834,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我享受制作音乐时","time":388243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可以不用去担心我的疾病","time":389875,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我甚至因为参与制作了一部纪录片","time":393870,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而在电视上露过几次面","time":396564,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我感觉最棒的时候","time":398975,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就是和周围的人在一起的时候","time":401459,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们给我的生活提供了
真正的积极的影响","time":405607,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当然同时我也希望同样能给
他们的生活提供正能量","time":409005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（掌声）","time":414699,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"谢谢","time":418247,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以重点是","time":419436,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我希望大家感激和爱您的家人","time":421395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"爱您的朋友们和兄弟们","time":425294,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并答谢您的导师","time":428453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和您的社区","time":431860,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为他们是您日常生活中
一个非常真实一面","time":433557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们可以在提供正能量方面
作出真正重大的贡献","time":436654,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接着说 第三个方面：","time":440980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“到此为止，我们不会往回看很远。
我们要始终向前看，开启新的门，致力新的事”——
Walt Disney （迪士尼老板）","time":443663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可能知道这是引用自沃尔特迪斯尼的","time":445898,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它也是我最喜欢的引用之一","time":449686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我总是尽量朝前看","time":451495,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"寻找目标并努力
使我的生活更丰富多彩","time":454230,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它不需要很大","time":457265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它可以是任何事","time":458956,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如期待下一次漫画书的出版","time":461339,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或是去参加大型的家庭度假","time":463946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"又或是跟我的朋友们在一起","time":466467,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去参加下一个高中足球比赛","time":468736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然而 所有这些都促使我","time":471691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"知道光明的未来在等待着我","time":475013,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并给我勇气从而度过人生的艰难时刻","time":477851,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种精神包括着保持一种前瞻性的思维状态","time":482287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我尽力让自己不去
浪费能量为自己感到难过","time":487795,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为当我这么做时
我会陷入一个悖论","time":491389,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并且除了悲伤这不会给我
带来任何幸福或其他情感","time":494871,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并不是说我完全忽略这种悲伤的感受","time":499454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我只是坦然的接受了它","time":503015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我接纳它并承认这个事实","time":504897,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同时做我需要去做的
并跨越这道屏障","time":508273,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我少年时 我想成为一名工程师","time":511775,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想成为一名发明家","time":515081,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一个可以让未来的世界
变的更美好的发明家","time":516995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也许这促使我热衷于乐高玩具","time":520009,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我搭建它们时","time":522184,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我能自由的表达我的感受","time":524502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这理想也是源于我的家人和我的导师","time":527814,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们完整了我的人生
让我对自己感觉很好","time":533489,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是如今我的雄心有些改变","time":537985,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想步入生物领域","time":541133,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也许关于细胞生物学或遗传学","time":543609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或生物化学 或其他方面","time":547948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个我正望着的是我的一个朋友","time":552417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"弗朗西斯 柯林斯 美国国家卫生研究院主任","time":555698,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我们在去年TEDMED聊天的场景","time":559252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我觉得无论我选择要成为什么","time":562670,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我坚信我可以改变世界","time":566208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且正因我努力地改变世界
我将会感到幸福和开心","time":569521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大约在四年前","time":574417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"HBO开始拍摄一部叫做
《山姆的生活》的纪录片","time":576562,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是关于我的家人和我的","time":579247,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是一个非常棒的经历 但那也只是四年前","time":582282,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"正如任何人一样
我对很多事物的看法已经改变了","time":586285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"希望由此变成熟
像我潜在的职业选择一样","time":589761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然而 有些事情是自始至终没有改变的","time":594165,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如我的心态和对人生的哲学","time":598798,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我想给你们看","time":602679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一段我年少时的视频","time":604730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这段视频能更具体阐述我的人生哲学","time":607921,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（视频）","time":611492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道它更多是关于基因方面的","time":612659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以这是它微观的体现","time":616314,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它一般像这样","time":619857,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而正是这个东西剥夺了我
做很多事的能力","time":621335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也是这个东西导致其他孩子死去","time":624135,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是它让每个人都感到压力","time":626669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它是一种不正常的蛋白质","time":629639,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种蛋白质削弱了正常的细胞结构","time":635276,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以","time":640465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它却也减轻了我的负担因为现在","time":642076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我已经不用去多虑早衰症","time":645458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我已经是一个它的实例了","time":648210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好吧 还不错吧？","time":655905,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（掌声）","time":657507,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"谢谢","time":661596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以 正如你所视我已经寻觅
这种乐观的思维方式很多年了","time":662671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我之前从没真正将此付诸实践","time":665990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"直到去年一月","time":670435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我真的病了 我得了支气管炎在医院住了几天","time":674176,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我被与我身边的一切隔绝了","time":679010,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些是我的生活","time":683600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些是我的全部","time":685124,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是得知我将转好","time":687952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并期待着病愈的时候","time":691029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这种状态鼓励着我继续前进","time":694009,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有时我必须勇敢","time":696659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而这并不总是那么容易","time":699211,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有时我踌躇","time":701003,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我也会有糟糕的时候","time":702617,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不过我明白
变得勇敢本来就不是一件容易的事儿","time":704363,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而对我来说
我觉得勇敢是继续前进的关键","time":707857,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以 总而言之","time":711957,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不想浪费精力在悲伤中","time":714181,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我和我希望在一起的人们在一起","time":717725,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这样我才始终继续前进","time":721040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我希望大家利用这种乐观的态度","time":723317,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"面对你们的阻碍","time":726689,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这样你们就能和我一样有一个愉快的人生","time":728766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哦 等等","time":731613,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"另外还有一条建议","time":733131,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":735619,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不要错过任何一个你能参与派对","time":737219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我学校明晚将组织同学舞会","time":739709,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我一定会去的","time":742085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"非常感谢","time":744169,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（掌声）","time":745641,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"13587","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}
transcript_en:
{"data":{"translation":{"id":"65672","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"696187","uri":"/profiles/696800","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/03/7a/74/227956.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345426606.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Ariana Bleau Lugo","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"1210040","uri":"/profiles/1211074","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/03/45/0c/214284.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345429144.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Robert Prottas","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"Hello everyone.","time":18023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm Sam,","time":20217,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I just turned 17.","time":21634,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A few years ago,
before my freshman year in High School,","time":24401,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I wanted to play snare drum
in the Foxboro High School Marching Band,","time":27648,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it was a dream
that I just had to accomplish.","time":32852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But each snare drum and harness","time":35589,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"weighed about 40 pounds each,","time":37852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I have a disease called Progeria.","time":40155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So just to give you an idea,
I weigh only about 50 pounds.","time":42770,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, logistically, I really couldn't carry
a regular sized snare drum,","time":46858,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and because of this the band director
assigned me to play","time":51615,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"pit percussion during the halftime show.","time":55654,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now pit percussion was fun.","time":59005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It involved some really cool
auxiliary percussion instruments,","time":61110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like the bongos, timpani,","time":64803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and timbales, and cowbell.","time":68623,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it was fun,","time":71107,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but it involved no marching,
and I was just so devastated.","time":73318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"However, nothing was going 
to stop me","time":78420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"from playing snare drum
with the marching band","time":80914,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in the halftime show.","time":83585,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So my family and I worked
with an engineer to design","time":85010,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a snare drum harness","time":89865,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that would be lighter,
and easier for me to carry.","time":91793,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So after continuous work, we made","time":95580,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a snare drum apparatus
that weighs only about 6 pounds.","time":99638,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":103859,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I just want to give you some more
information about Progeria.","time":108129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It affects only about
350 kids today, worldwide.","time":112427,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it's pretty rare,","time":118340,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the effects of Progeria include:","time":120880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"tight skin, lack of weight gain,
stunted growth,","time":123335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and heart disease.","time":127408,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Last year my Mom 
and her team of scientists","time":129011,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"published the first successful
Progeria Treatment Study,","time":132586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and because of this
I was interviewed on NPR,","time":136725,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and John Hamilton asked me
the question:","time":139460,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""What is the most important thing","time":142006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that people should know about you?"","time":144272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And my answer was simply that","time":146538,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I have a very happy life.","time":149264,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":151691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So even though
there are many obstacles in my life,","time":155762,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with a lot of them
being created by Progeria,","time":159663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't want people to feel bad for me.","time":162533,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don't think about
these obstacles all the time,","time":165095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'm able to overcome
most of them anyway.","time":167802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I’m here today, to share with you
my philosophy for a happy life.","time":171007,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, for me,
there are 3 aspects to this philosophy.","time":176132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So this is a quote
from the famous Ferris Bueller.","time":180757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The first aspect to my philosophy is that","time":184830,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I’m okay with what I ultimately can’t do","time":188516,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because there is so much I can do.","time":191552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now people sometimes 
ask me questions like,","time":194032,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Isn’t it hard living with Progeria?" or","time":196799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""What daily challenges
of Progeria do you face?"","time":199252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I’d like to say that,
even though I have Progeria,","time":202569,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"most of my time
is spent thinking about things","time":206053,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that have nothing to do
with Progeria at all.","time":208686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now this doesn’t mean that I ignore
the negative aspects of these obstacles.","time":211534,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I can’t do something like","time":216435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"run a long distance,
or go on an intense roller coaster,","time":218491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I know what I’m missing out on.","time":222557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But instead,
I choose to focus on the activities","time":224583,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I can do through things
that I’m passionate about,","time":228499,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like scouting, or music, or comic books,","time":232276,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or any of my favorite Boston sports teams.","time":235791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Yeah, so --
(Laughter)","time":238756,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"However, sometimes I need to find
a different way to do something","time":241862,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"by making adjustments,","time":246001,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I want to put those things
in the "can do" category.","time":247712,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Kind of like you saw
with the drum earlier.","time":251799,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So here’s a clip","time":254803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with me playing Spider-Man","time":256512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with the Foxboro High School 
Marching Band","time":258951,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"at halftime a couple of years ago.","time":261760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Video)","time":263864,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"♫ Spider-Man theme song ♫","time":266648,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":307115,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you.","time":310622,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"All right, all right, so --","time":312548,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That was pretty cool,","time":314921,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and so I was able
to accomplish my dream","time":316226,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of playing snare drum
with the marching band,","time":319561,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as I believe I can do
for all of my dreams.","time":322117,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So hopefully, you can accomplish
your dreams as well, with this outlook.","time":325009,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The next aspect to my philosophy is","time":330167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I surround myself
with people I want to be with,","time":332382,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"people of high quality.","time":336818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I’m extremely lucky
to have an amazing family,","time":338634,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who have always supported me
throughout my entire life.","time":342680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I’m also really fortunate to have","time":346110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a really close group of friends 
at school.","time":348489,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now we’re kind of goofy,
a lot of us are band geeks,","time":351498,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but we really enjoy 
each other’s company,","time":355050,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we help each other out 
when we need to.","time":357412,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We see each other
for who we are on the inside.","time":360434,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So this is us goofing off a little bit.","time":364562,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we’re juniors in High School now,","time":366865,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we can now mentor
younger band members,","time":369372,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as a single collective unit.","time":375129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What I love about
being in a group like the band,","time":376986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that the music
that we make together,","time":379916,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is true, is genuine,
and it supersedes Progeria.","time":382834,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I don’t have to worry about that","time":388243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when I’m feeling so good
about making music.","time":389875,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But even having made 
a documentary,","time":393870,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"going on TV a couple of times,","time":396564,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I feel like I’m at my highest point","time":398975,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when I’m with the people
that surround me every day.","time":401459,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They provide the real
positive influences in my life,","time":405607,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as I hope I can provide
a positive influence in theirs as well.","time":409005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":414699,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you.","time":418247,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So the bottom line here,","time":419436,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that I hope you appreciate
and love your family,","time":421395,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"love your friends,
for you guys, love you Bro’s","time":425294,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and acknowledge your mentors,","time":428453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and your community,","time":431860,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because they are a very real
aspect of everyday life,","time":433557,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they can make a truly significant,
positive impact.","time":436654,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The third aspect to the philosophy is,","time":440980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Keep moving forward.","time":443663,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here’s a quote by a man
you may know, named Walt Disney,","time":445898,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it’s one of my favorite quotes.","time":449686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I always try to have something
to look forward to.","time":451495,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Something to strive for
to make my life richer.","time":454230,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It doesn’t have to be big.","time":457265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It could be anything from","time":458956,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"looking forward to
the next comic book to come out,","time":461339,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or going on a large family vacation,","time":463946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or hanging out with my friends,","time":466467,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to going to the next
High School football game.","time":468736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"However, all of these things
keep me focused,","time":471691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and know that there’s
a bright future ahead,","time":475013,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and may get me through
some difficult times that I may be having.","time":477851,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now this mentality includes staying
in a forward thinking state of mind.","time":482287,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I try hard not to waste energy
feeling badly for myself,","time":487795,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because when I do,
I get stuck in a paradox,","time":491389,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where there’s no room for 
any happiness or any other emotion.","time":494871,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, it’s not that I ignore
when I’m feeling badly,","time":499454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I kind of accept it,","time":503015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I let it in, 
so that I can acknowledge it,","time":504897,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and do what I need to do 
to move past it.","time":508273,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I was younger,
I wanted to be an engineer.","time":511775,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I wanted to be an inventor,","time":515081,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who would catapult the world
into a better future.","time":516995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Maybe this came 
from my love of Legos,","time":520009,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the freedom of expression 
that I felt","time":522184,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when I was building with them.","time":524502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this was also derived
from my family and my mentors,","time":527814,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who always make me feel whole,
and good about myself.","time":533489,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now today my ambitions
have changed a little bit,","time":537985,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I’d like to go into the field of Biology,","time":541133,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"maybe cell biology, or genetics,","time":543609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or biochemistry, or really anything.","time":547948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is a friend of mine,
who I look up to,","time":552417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Francis Collins, the director of the NIH,","time":555698,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and this is us at TEDMED last year,
chatting away.","time":559252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I feel that no matter what
I choose to become,","time":562670,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I believe that I can change the world.","time":566208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And as I’m striving to change the world,
I will be happy.","time":569521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"About four years ago,","time":574417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"HBO began to film a documentary","time":576562,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about my family and me
called “Life According to Sam”.","time":579247,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That was a pretty great experience,
but it was also four years ago.","time":582282,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And like anyone, my views
on many things have changed,","time":586285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and hopefully matured,
like my potential career choice.","time":589761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"However, some things have stayed 
the same throughout that time.","time":594165,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Like my mentality,
and philosophy towards life.","time":598798,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I would like to show you","time":602679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a clip of my younger self from the film,","time":604730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I feel embodies that philosophy.","time":607921,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Video)","time":611492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I know more about it genetically.","time":612659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it’s less of an embodiment now.","time":616314,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It used to be like","time":619857,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this thing that prevents me
from doing all this stuff,","time":621335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that causes other kids to die,","time":624135,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that causes everybody 
to be stressed,","time":626669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and now
it’s a protein that is abnormal,","time":629639,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that weakens the structure of cells.","time":635276,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So,","time":640465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it takes a burden
off of me because now","time":642076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don’t have to think about","time":645458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Progeria as an entity.","time":648210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Okay, pretty good, huh?","time":655905,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":657507,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you.","time":661596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, as you can see I’ve been
thinking this way for many years.","time":662671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But I’d never really had to apply
all of these aspects of my philosophy","time":665990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to the test at one time, 
until last January.","time":670435,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was pretty sick, I had a chest cold,
and I was in the hospital for a few days,","time":674176,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I was secluded from 
all of the aspects of my life that I felt","time":679010,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"made me, me,","time":683600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that kind of gave me my identity.","time":685124,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But knowing
that I was going to get better,","time":687952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and looking forward to a time
that I would feel good again,","time":691029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"helped me to keep moving forward.","time":694009,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And sometimes I had to be brave,","time":696659,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it wasn’t always easy.","time":699211,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Sometimes I faltered,","time":701003,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I had bad days,","time":702617,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I realized that being brave
isn’t supposed to be easy.","time":704363,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And for me, I feel it’s the key way
to keep moving forward.","time":707857,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, all in all,","time":711957,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I don’t waste energy
feeling bad for myself.","time":714181,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I surround myself with people
that I want to be with,","time":717725,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I keep moving forward.","time":721040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So with this philosophy,
I hope that all of you,","time":723317,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"regardless of your obstacles,","time":726689,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"can have a very happy life as well.","time":728766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Oh, wait, hang on a second,","time":731613,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"one more piece of advice –-","time":733131,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":735619,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Never miss a party if you can help it.","time":737219,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My school’s homecoming dance
is tomorrow night,","time":739709,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I will be there.","time":742085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you very much.","time":744169,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":745641,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"13587","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: The next outbreak? We're not ready
talk__description: In 2014, the world avoided a global outbreak of Ebola, thanks to thousands of selfless health workers -- plus, frankly, some very good luck. In hindsight, we know what we should have done better. So, now's the time, Bill Gates suggests, to put all our good ideas into practice, from scenario planning to vaccine research to health worker training. As he says, "There's no need to panic ... but we need to get going."
transcript_zh-cn:
{"data":{"translation":{"id":"83582","language":{"id":"178","endonym":"中文 (简体)","englishName":"Chinese, Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"4140330","uri":"/profiles/4142065","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/04/0a/e9/264937.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1426927453.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Min Wang","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"362091","uri":"/profiles/362212","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/01/69/d4/92628.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345425607.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Wang-Ju  Tsai","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"当我还是小孩时,","time":5504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们最担心的灾害是核战争。","time":7268,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我们在地下室有个这样的筒子，","time":11819,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"装满了罐头食物和水。","time":15085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当核战争爆发时，","time":18256,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们就要躲到地下室去，
蹲低身子并靠那个筒子维生。","time":19731,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"今天的全球灾难最大的危险","time":25877,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看起来已不像这样了。","time":29597,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实上，会像这样。","time":32197,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果有什么东西在未来几十年里
可以杀掉上千万人，","time":36288,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那比较有可能是个高度传染的病毒，","time":41929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不是战争。","time":45314,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是导弹，而是微生物。","time":47792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"部分的理由是因为","time":51679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们在核威慑上投注了很大的
精力和金钱。","time":53878,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我们在防止疫情的
系统上却投资很少。","time":58081,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们还没有准备好预防
下一场大疫情的发生。","time":64069,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"让我们看看埃博拉病毒。","time":67893,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我相信大家在报纸上
都有读到这样的新闻，","time":69758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"充满了许多艰难的挑战。","time":73615,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用我们追踪消灭脊髓灰质炎（小儿麻痹）的
案例分析工具，","time":75221,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我仔细地追踪这病毒的发展。","time":79076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"随着疫情的发展我们可以看到，","time":83721,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"问题不在于我们没有一套
可以使用的系统，","time":85573,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是我们根本没有任何系统。","time":90081,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实上我们可以看到有几个
很明显的不足。","time":94479,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们找不到一群准备好了的流行病学家，","time":99028,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能去疫区看看病理和病情发展。","time":103940,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"病例都是由纸上报道传来的。","time":107696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"信息传上线时已经很晚了，","time":110452,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"此外还很不准确。","time":112808,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也找不到训练有素的医护小组。","time":115492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们没有一套让人们严阵以待的方法。","time":117858,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"目前，“无国界医生”
在动员志愿者上做了很大的贡献。","time":120453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但即使如此，我们调动数千名
工作者到疫区的速度","time":125784,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还是十分差强人意的。","time":128880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大的疫情会需要我们动员
数十万的人员，","time":132022,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我们没有任何人在研究治疗的方向。","time":140752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也没有人在看诊断的方法。","time":145155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有人在想该用什么工具。","time":146946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"举个例子来说，
我们也许可以抽取生还者的血液，","time":150243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"处理过后，再将血浆注入
人体内来保护没得病的人。","time":153723,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是这个方法从来没有试过，","time":159158,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以有很多事都还没来得及做。","time":161764,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而这的确是全球性的失败。","time":163520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"世界卫生组织的目的是来监视流行病，
而不是来做我刚讲的事。","time":168305,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是在电影中演的剧情又是另一回事。","time":174819,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有一群很英俊的流行病学家准备就绪，","time":177842,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们到了疫区拯救了大家，
但这是纯好莱坞的剧情。","time":182674,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们的准备不足 ，
可能会导致下一场疫情，","time":190017,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比埃博拉病毒的危害更严重。","time":193887,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我们看看埃博拉病毒在
过去一年中的发展。","time":198735,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大约死了一万人，","time":204311,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所有的死者都在西非的三个国家里。","time":207149,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"之所以没有扩散的原因有三个。","time":211846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一个是卫生工作人员作的
很多英雄事迹。","time":214433,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们找到很多病人
并防止了更多人得病。","time":218874,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第二个是病毒的特性，","time":222136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"埃博拉病毒不是靠空气传染的。","time":224621,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"等到你有足够的传染力时，","time":227697,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大部分的人已经病得卧床不起了。","time":229810,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第三个是因为病毒没有传到都会区。","time":234610,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这纯粹是运气好。","time":238411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果病毒传到了都会区，","time":240115,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么死亡的人数绝对不止于此。","time":242355,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以下一次我们可能不会这么幸运了。","time":245877,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有的病毒可能让你毫无察觉，
但当感染病毒的人乘飞机或者去逛商场，","time":249466,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们其实已经具有一定的传染力了。","time":254530,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"此外病毒的来源可以是
天然的，像埃博拉病毒，","time":257842,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或是由生物恐怖攻击产生的。","time":260846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以可以让疫情惨上千倍的
病毒是存在的。","time":262826,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"事实上，让我们来看看一个病毒
由空气传染的模型，","time":267474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像1918年的西班牙流感。","time":273475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"疫情有可能像这样发展：","time":277630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"病毒会以很快的速度向全世界蔓延。","time":279560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以看到全球有三千万人
死于这个疾病。","time":283558,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是个很严重的问题。","time":288683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们绝不应该忽视。","time":290496,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"但事实上我们可以建立
一个很好的反应系统。","time":292257,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们可以利用所有发展至今的科技和科学。","time":296692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们可以用手机","time":301836,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来收集信息和发布信息。","time":302883,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们有卫星地图可以看到
人们在哪里和往哪移动。","time":306140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们在生物学上也有进展，","time":310319,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可以大幅缩短我们找到病原的时间，","time":312627,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并可以在很短的时间里找出解药和疫苗。","time":316453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我们是有工具的，","time":321322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这些工具必须统合在
一个全球健康系统下。","time":322888,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"此外我们必须处在准备好的状态。","time":327500,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"而我们如何做好准备，","time":329793,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最好的例子还是来自于备战。","time":332257,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对军人来说，他们是随时随地
都准备好要投入战争的。","time":334758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们还有预备军人，
能使备战人口大量增加。","time":339005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"北约组织有个机动小组，
可以很快地行动起来。","time":342136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"北约组织有很多战争游戏可以测试
人员是否已训练有素？","time":346005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们是否了解燃油，补给","time":349455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和相同的收音机频率？","time":351883,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是的话，那么他们就已准备好了。","time":354241,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些就是面对疫情时我们该准备的事。","time":356779,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"关键的项目有哪些？","time":361134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一，在贫穷的国家里
必须有发达的卫生系统。","time":363301,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"母亲们可以安全地生小孩，","time":368241,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小孩们可以接种疫苗。","time":371568,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也可以在很早的阶段
侦查到疫情的爆发。","time":373295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们需要后备的医疗部队：","time":378064,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有很多训练有素的专业人员，","time":379935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"随时准备好能带着他们专长到疫区。","time":382501,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们可以用军队来配合医护人员，","time":385853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"利用军队移动迅速的特性，","time":390266,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来进行后勤运输和维持安全。","time":394417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们也需要进行一些情境模拟，","time":396220,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是进行战争游戏而是进行病菌游戏 ，
看看防卫漏洞在哪。","time":399129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"上一次的病菌游戏是在美国进行的，","time":403927,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那是在2001年了， 进行得也不是很顺利。","time":406723,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"目前病菌得一分人类零分。","time":410453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最后我们在疫苗和病理学上
还需要很多的研发工作。","time":415410,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在某些方面例如腺相关病毒上，
我们已经有了相当的突破，","time":421609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可以在很短的时间内生效。","time":425246,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我目前没有明确的预算
这到底需要多少钱，","time":429229,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我确信跟损失比起来是比较便宜的。","time":432599,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"根据世界银行的估算，
如果我们有流感的疫情暴发，","time":437095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"全球经济会损失三万多亿美元。","time":441740,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们还会可能有千百万人员的死亡。","time":445465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟仅仅只是准备好比起来，","time":449332,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些额外的投资会带来显著的益处。","time":452317,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"基础的卫生保健，研发，","time":454518,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可以促进全球健康的平衡发展，","time":456582,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让这个世界更健康更安全。","time":459432,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以我觉得这非常重要重要。刻不容缓。","time":463212,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不需要惊慌。","time":467514,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不需要囤积面罐头
或是躲到地下室去，","time":468980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我们必须急起直追，因为时间有限。","time":473469,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"事实上，要说这场埃博拉病毒的疫情
带来了什么正面影响的话，","time":477309,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那就是提早响起了警报，
让我们觉醒并做好准备。","time":483524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们如果即刻开始准备，那么在
下一场疫情来临前我们是可以准备好的。","time":489330,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢大家。","time":494978,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":496574,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2225","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}
transcript_en:
{"data":{"translation":{"id":"83570","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"When I was a kid,","time":5504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the disaster we worried about most 
was a nuclear war.","time":7398,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's why we had a barrel like this
down in our basement,","time":11819,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"filled with cans of food and water.","time":15085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When the nuclear attack came,","time":18256,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we were supposed to go downstairs,
hunker down, and eat out of that barrel.","time":19901,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Today the greatest risk 
of global catastrophe","time":25877,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"doesn't look like this.","time":29597,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Instead, it looks like this.","time":32457,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If anything kills over 10 million people
in the next few decades,","time":36438,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's most likely to be 
a highly infectious virus","time":41929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"rather than a war.","time":45314,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Not missiles, but microbes.","time":47792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, part of the reason for this is that","time":51679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we've invested a huge amount
in nuclear deterrents.","time":53878,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But we've actually invested very little 
in a system to stop an epidemic.","time":58081,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We're not ready for the next epidemic.","time":64129,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Let's look at Ebola.","time":68023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm sure all of you read about it 
in the newspaper,","time":69758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"lots of tough challenges.","time":73615,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I followed it carefully 
through the case analysis tools","time":75221,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we use to track polio eradication.","time":78876,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And as you look at what went on,","time":83721,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the problem wasn't that there was a system
that didn't work well enough,","time":85573,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the problem was that we 
didn't have a system at all.","time":90081,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, there's some pretty obvious
key missing pieces.","time":94589,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"We didn't have a group of epidemiologists 
ready to go, who would have gone,","time":99028,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"seen what the disease was,
seen how far it had spread.","time":103940,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The case reports came in on paper.","time":107696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was very delayed
before they were put online","time":110452,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they were extremely inaccurate.","time":112808,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We didn't have a medical team ready to go.","time":115492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We didn't have a way of preparing people.","time":117858,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, Médecins Sans Frontières 
did a great job orchestrating volunteers.","time":120453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But even so, we were far slower
than we should have been","time":125784,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"getting the thousands of workers
into these countries.","time":128880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And a large epidemic would require us
to have hundreds of thousands of workers.","time":132022,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There was no one there 
to look at treatment approaches.","time":140752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No one to look at the diagnostics.","time":145155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"No one to figure out 
what tools should be used.","time":146946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"As an example, we could have 
taken the blood of survivors,","time":150243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"processed it, and put that plasma
back in people to protect them.","time":153723,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But that was never tried.","time":159158,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So there was a lot that was missing.","time":161764,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And these things 
are really a global failure.","time":163520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The WHO is funded to monitor epidemics,
but not to do these things I talked about.","time":168305,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, in the movies it's quite different.","time":175049,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's a group of handsome
epidemiologists ready to go,","time":177842,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they move in, they save the day,
but that's just pure Hollywood.","time":182674,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The failure to prepare 
could allow the next epidemic","time":190177,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to be dramatically 
more devastating than Ebola","time":193887,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let's look at the progression 
of Ebola over this year.","time":198735,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"About 10,000 people died, 
","time":204311,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and nearly all were in the three
West African countries.","time":207149,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's three reasons why
it didn't spread more.","time":211846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The first is that there was a lot 
of heroic work by the health workers.","time":214433,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They found the people and they 
prevented more infections.","time":218874,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The second is the nature of the virus.","time":222136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Ebola does not spread through the air.","time":224621,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And by the time you're contagious,","time":227697,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"most people are so sick 
that they're bedridden.","time":229810,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Third, it didn't get
into many urban areas.","time":234220,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And that was just luck.","time":238411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If it had gotten into a lot 
more urban areas,","time":240115,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the case numbers 
would have been much larger.","time":242355,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So next time, we might not be so lucky.","time":245877,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You can have a virus where people 
feel well enough while they're infectious","time":249466,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that they get on a plane
or they go to a market.","time":254530,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The source of the virus could be 
a natural epidemic like Ebola,","time":257842,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or it could be bioterrorism.","time":260846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So there are things that would literally
make things a thousand times worse.","time":262826,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"In fact, let's look at a model
of a virus spread through the air,","time":267474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"like the Spanish Flu back in 1918.","time":273475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So here's what would happen:","time":277630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It would spread throughout the world
very, very quickly.","time":279560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And you can see over 30 million people
died from that epidemic.","time":283558,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So this is a serious problem.","time":288683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We should be concerned.","time":290496,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But in fact, we can build
a really good response system.","time":292257,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have the benefits of all the science
and technology that we talk about here.","time":296692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We've got cell phones","time":301836,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to get information from the public 
and get information out to them.","time":302883,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have satellite maps where we can see
where people are and where they're moving.","time":306140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have advances in biology","time":310319,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that should dramatically change 
the turnaround time to look at a pathogen","time":312627,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and be able to make drugs and vaccines
that fit for that pathogen.","time":316453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we can have tools,","time":321322,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but those tools need to be put
into an overall global health system.","time":322888,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we need preparedness.","time":327500,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The best lessons, I think, 
on how to get prepared","time":329793,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"are again, what we do for war.","time":332257,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For soldiers, we have full-time,
waiting to go.","time":334758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We have reserves that can scale 
us up to large numbers.","time":339005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"NATO has a mobile unit 
that can deploy very rapidly.","time":342316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"NATO does a lot of war games 
to check, are people well trained?","time":346005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Do they understand 
about fuel and logistics","time":349455,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the same radio frequencies?","time":351883,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So they are absolutely ready to go.","time":354241,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So those are the kinds of things
we need to deal with an epidemic.","time":356779,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"What are the key pieces?","time":361134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"First, we need strong health systems
in poor countries.","time":363301,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's where mothers 
can give birth safely,","time":368591,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"kids can get all their vaccines.","time":371778,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But, also where we'll see 
the outbreak very early on.","time":373295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We need a medical reserve corps:","time":378154,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"lots of people who've got 
the training and background","time":379935,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who are ready to go, with the expertise.","time":382501,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then we need to pair those
medical people with the military.","time":385853,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"taking advantage of the military's ability
to move fast, do logistics","time":390266,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and secure areas.","time":394417,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We need to do simulations,","time":396220,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"germ games, not war games,
so that we see where the holes are.","time":399129,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The last time a germ game 
was done in the United States","time":403927,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was back in 2001, 
and it didn't go so well.","time":406723,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So far the score is germs: 1, people: 0.","time":410453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Finally, we need lots of advanced R&D
in areas of vaccines and diagnostics.","time":415490,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There are some big breakthroughs, 
like the Adeno-associated virus,","time":421609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that could work very, very quickly.","time":425246,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Now I don't have an exact budget
for what this would cost,","time":429229,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I'm quite sure it's very modest
compared to the potential harm.","time":432599,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The World Bank estimates that 
if we have a worldwide flu epidemic,","time":437095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"global wealth will go down
