by over three trillion dollars","time":441740,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and we'd have millions
and millions of deaths.","time":445465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These investments 
offer significant benefits","time":449332,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"beyond just being ready for the epidemic.","time":452317,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The primary healthcare, the R&D,","time":454518,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"those things would reduce 
global health equity","time":456982,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and make the world more just 
as well as more safe.","time":459812,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So I think this should absolutely
be a priority.","time":463502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There's no need to panic.","time":467514,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We don't have to hoard cans of spaghetti
or go down into the basement.","time":468980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But we need to get going,
because time is not on our side.","time":473469,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"In fact, if there's one positive thing
that can come out of the Ebola epidemic,","time":477309,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's that it can serve as an early 
warning, a wake-up call, to get ready.","time":483524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If we start now, we can be ready 
for the next epidemic.","time":489330,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":494978,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":496574,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2225","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: What makes a good life? Lessons from the longest study on happiness
talk__description: What keeps us happy and healthy as we go through life? If you think it's fame and money, you're not alone – but, according to psychiatrist Robert Waldinger, you're mistaken. As the director of a 75-year-old study on adult development, Waldinger has unprecedented access to data on true happiness and satisfaction. In this talk, he shares three important lessons learned from the study as well as some practical, old-as-the-hills wisdom on how to build a fulfilling, long life.

只有做到刚才说的这些","time":48966,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"才能有好日子过。","time":52656,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要人们纵观整个人生，","time":54526,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"想象各种选择，
以及这些选择最终导致的结果，","time":56726,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几乎是不可能的。","time":61960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"关于人的一生，我们能了解到的，","time":66080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大部分都是通过人的回忆得来，","time":69186,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但众所周知，大部分都是事后诸葛。","time":72656,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一生中，我们会忘记很多发生过的事情，","time":77446,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且记忆常常不可靠。","time":81166,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"但如果我们可以从头到尾地","time":84800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"纵观人的一生呢？","time":89226,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我们可以跟踪研究一个人，
从他少年时代开始","time":92080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一直到他步入晚年，","time":96106,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看看究竟是什么让人们
保持快乐和健康呢？","time":98896,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们做到了。","time":103560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哈佛大学（进行的）这项
关于成人发展的研究，","time":105640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可能是同类研究中耗时最长的。","time":107886,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在75年时间里，
我们跟踪了724个人的一生，","time":113720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"年复一年，了解他们的工作、
家庭生活、健康状况，","time":121360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当然，在这一过程中，
我们完全不知道他们的人生","time":125886,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"将走向何方。","time":130280,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"像这样的研究少之又少。","time":133280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像这样的项目几乎都会在10年内终止，","time":136946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为有许多人会中途退出，","time":141026,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者是研究资金不足，","time":144200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者是研究者转换方向，","time":147146,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者去世，然后项目无人接手。","time":149456,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但感谢幸运女神的眷顾","time":154280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和几代研究人员的坚持不懈，","time":156586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个项目存活下来了。","time":160280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"目前这724人中","time":162530,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"仍有60人在世，","time":167056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"仍然在参与研究","time":168360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大多数人已经90多岁了。","time":170586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我们已经开始研究","time":173560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们的子孙后代，
人数多达2000多人。","time":175496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是这个项目的第四任负责人。","time":179680,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"从1938年起，我们
开始跟踪两组人的生活。","time":183400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一组加入这个项目的人，","time":188176,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当年在哈佛大学上大二。","time":190320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们在二战期间大学毕业，","time":193056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大部分人都参军作战了。","time":195896,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们追踪的第二组人","time":199280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是一群来自波士顿贫民区的小男孩，","time":201466,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们之所以被选中，","time":205646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"主要是因为他们来自
20世纪30年代波士顿","time":207686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最困难","time":211056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最贫困的家庭。","time":212926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大部分住在廉价公寓里，
很多都没有冷热水供应。","time":215686,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"在加入这个项目时，","time":222520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些年轻人都接受了面试。","time":224456,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接受了身体检查。","time":227486,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们挨家挨户走访了他们的父母。","time":229646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后这些年轻人长大成人，","time":233216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"进入到社会各个阶层。","time":235646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"成为了工人、律师、砖匠、医生，","time":238046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有一位成了美国总统。","time":244176,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有人成为酒鬼，有人患了精神分裂。","time":248160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有人从社会最底层","time":253320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一路青云直上，","time":255716,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也有人恰相反，掉落云端。","time":258946,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"这个项目的创始人们，","time":263520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可能做梦都不会想到","time":266506,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"75年后的今天，我会站在这里，","time":268566,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"告诉你们这个项目还在继续。","time":273096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每两年，我们耐心而专注的研究人员","time":277280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"会打电话给我们的研究对象，
问他们是否愿意","time":280946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再做一套关于他们生活的问卷。","time":284006,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那些来自波士顿的人问我们，","time":288040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“为什么你们一直想研究我？
我的生活是很无趣的。”","time":291646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但哈佛的人从没这样问过。","time":296600,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":299616,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"为了更好地了解这些人的生活，","time":308920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不光给他们发问卷。","time":311806,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们还在他们家客厅采访他们。","time":314760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从他们医生那儿拿病历。","time":317246,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"抽他们的血，扫描他们的大脑，","time":320200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟他们的孩子聊天。","time":322736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们拍摄下他们和妻子谈话的场景，
聊的都是他们最关心的问题。","time":324440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大约在10年前，我们
终于开口问他们的妻子，","time":329746,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是否愿意加入我们的研究，","time":333286,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很多女士都说，“是啊，
终于轮到我们了。”","time":335686,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":338406,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那么我们得到了什么结论呢？","time":339486,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那长达几万页的数据记录，
记录了他们的生活，","time":341206,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们从这些记录中间，","time":346440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"到底学到了什么？","time":349526,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是关于财富、名望，
或更加努力工作。","time":351720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从75年的研究中，
我们得到的最明确的结论是：","time":358520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"良好的人际关系能
让人更加快乐和健康。就这样。","time":364846,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"关于人际关系，我们得到三大结论。","time":371000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一，社会关系对我们是有益的，","time":374846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而孤独寂寞有害健康。","time":378966,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们发现，那些跟家庭成员更亲近的人，","time":381496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"更爱与朋友、与邻居交往的人，","time":385176,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"会比那些不善交际、离群索居的人，","time":388286,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"更快乐，更健康，更长寿。","time":393016,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"孤独寂寞是有害健康的。","time":396416,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些“被孤立”的人，
跟不孤单的人相比，","time":399846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"往往更加不快乐，","time":405006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"等他们人到中年时，健康状况下降更快，","time":408246,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大脑功能下降得更快，","time":411216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也没那么长寿。","time":413456,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可惜的是，长久以来，","time":418040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每5个美国人中就至少
有1个声称自己是孤独的。","time":421296,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"而且即便你身在人群中，
甚至已经结婚了，","time":427040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你还是可能感到孤独，","time":429746,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因此我们得到的第二大结论是","time":432436,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不是你有多少朋友，","time":434586,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也不是你身边有没有伴侣，","time":437696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真正有影响的是这些关系的质量。","time":441206,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"整天吵吵闹闹，对健康是有害的。","time":446560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如成天吵架，没有爱的婚姻，","time":451376,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对健康的影响或许比离婚还大。","time":455360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而关系和睦融洽，
则对我们的健康有益。","time":461166,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"当我们的研究对象步入80岁时，","time":465960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们会回顾他们的中年生活","time":469086,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看我们能否预测","time":472120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哪些人会在八九十岁时过得快乐健康","time":473736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哪些人不会。","time":477736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们把他们50岁时的所有信息","time":479680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"进行汇总分析，","time":483926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"发现决定他们将如何老去的，","time":486080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并不是他们中年时的胆固醇水平。","time":488656,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是他们对婚姻生活的满意度。","time":491566,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些在50岁时满意度最高的人，","time":495046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在80岁时也是最健康的。","time":499966,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"另外，良好和亲密的婚姻关系","time":503680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能减缓衰老带来的痛苦。","time":506816,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"参与者中那些最幸福的夫妻告诉我们，","time":510480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在他们80多岁时，","time":514486,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哪怕身体出现各种毛病，","time":516575,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们依旧觉得日子很幸福。","time":519526,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而那些婚姻不快乐的人，","time":522400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"身体上会出现更多不适，","time":525696,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为坏情绪把身体的痛苦放大了。","time":528656,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"关于婚姻和健康的关系，
我们得到的第三大结论是，","time":532360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"幸福的婚姻不单能保护我们的身体，","time":536776,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还能保护我们的大脑。","time":540046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"研究发现，如果在80多岁时，","time":542440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你的婚姻生活还温暖和睦，","time":547126,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你对自己的另一半","time":551066,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"依然信任有加，
知道对方在关键时刻能指望得上，","time":553066,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么你的记忆力都不容易衰退。","time":557216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而反过来，","time":560936,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些觉得无法信任
自己的另一半的人，","time":562456,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"记忆力会更早表现出衰退。","time":565616,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"幸福的婚姻，并不意味着从不拌嘴。","time":570520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有些夫妻，八九十岁了，","time":574016,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还天天斗嘴，","time":577606,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但只要他们坚信，在关键时刻，","time":579366,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对方能靠得住，","time":582560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那这些争吵顶多只是生活的调味剂。","time":584416,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以请记住，","time":589600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"幸福和睦的婚姻对健康是有利的，","time":592376,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是永恒的真理。","time":598096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但为什么我们总是办不到呢？","time":601076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我们是人类。","time":605560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们总喜欢找捷径，","time":607046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"总想一劳永逸，","time":609880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"找到一种方法，解决所有问题。","time":611606,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人际关系麻烦又复杂，","time":615320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"与家人、朋友相处需要努力付出，","time":618686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一点也不高大上。","time":622546,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且需要一辈子投入，无穷无尽。","time":625206,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在我们长达75年的研究中，
那些最享受退休生活的人，","time":628576,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是那些主动用玩伴
来替代工作伙伴的人。","time":633646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就像开头我说过的千禧一代一样，","time":639486,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们跟踪研究的很多人
在年轻的时候","time":642496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"坚信名望、财富和成就","time":646120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是他们过上好日子的保证。","time":650176,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但在75年的时间里，
我们的研究一次次地证明，","time":654120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"日子过得最好的，
是那些主动与人交往的人，","time":658326,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"与家人、朋友或者邻居。","time":664016,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那么你们呢？","time":669080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也许你现在25岁，
或者40岁，或者60岁。","time":671086,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"怎样才算主动与人交往呢？","time":675800,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"嗯，我想有很多种方法吧。","time":679760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最简单的，别再跟屏幕聊天了，
去跟人聊天，","time":683600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者一起尝试些新事物，
让关系恢复活力，","time":689726,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一起散个步呀，晚上约个会呀，","time":694216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或者给多年未曾联系的亲戚打个电话，","time":697360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为这种家庭不和睦太常见了，","time":702246,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但它带来的伤害又很大，","time":705776,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"尤其对那些喜欢
生闷气的人来说更是如此。","time":708016,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我想引用马克•吐温的一段话来作为结束。","time":712000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一个多世纪前，","time":717280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他回首自己的人生，","time":719686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"写下这样一段话：","time":722336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“时光荏苒，生命短暂，","time":724840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"别将时间浪费在
争吵、道歉、伤心和责备上。","time":728576,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用时间去爱吧，","time":734720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"哪怕只有一瞬间，也不要辜负。”","time":737566,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"美好人生，从良好的人际关系开始。","time":742760,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢大家。","time":747186,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":748426,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2399","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}
transcript_en:
{"data":{"translation":{"id":"93563","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"What keeps us healthy and happy","time":760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as we go through life?","time":3760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you were going to invest now","time":6520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in your future best self,","time":9040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where would you put your time
and your energy?","time":11120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There was a recent survey of millennials","time":15120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"asking them what their
most important life goals were,","time":17560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and over 80 percent said","time":22760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that a major life goal for them
was to get rich.","time":24800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And another 50 percent
of those same young adults","time":28960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"said that another major life goal","time":33320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was to become famous.","time":35880,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":38960,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And we're constantly told
to lean in to work, to push harder","time":40200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and achieve more.","time":46880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We're given the impression that these
are the things that we need to go after","time":48960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in order to have a good life.","time":52640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Pictures of entire lives,","time":54480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of the choices that people make
and how those choices work out for them,","time":56720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"those pictures
are almost impossible to get.","time":61960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Most of what we know about human life","time":66080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we know from asking people
to remember the past,","time":69160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and as we know, hindsight
is anything but 20/20.","time":72640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We forget vast amounts
of what happens to us in life,","time":77440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and sometimes memory
is downright creative.","time":81160,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But what if we could watch entire lives","time":84800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as they unfold through time?","time":89200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What if we could study people
from the time that they were teenagers","time":92080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all the way into old age","time":96080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to see what really keeps people
happy and healthy?","time":98840,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"We did that.","time":103560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The Harvard Study of Adult Development","time":105640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"may be the longest study
of adult life that's ever been done.","time":107880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For 75 years, we've tracked
the lives of 724 men,","time":113720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"year after year, asking about their work,
their home lives, their health,","time":121360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and of course asking all along the way
without knowing how their life stories","time":125880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were going to turn out.","time":130280,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Studies like this are exceedingly rare.","time":133280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Almost all projects of this kind
fall apart within a decade","time":136920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because too many people
drop out of the study,","time":141000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or funding for the research dries up,","time":144200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or the researchers get distracted,","time":147120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or they die, and nobody moves the ball
further down the field.","time":149400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But through a combination of luck","time":154280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the persistence
of several generations of researchers,","time":156560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this study has survived.","time":160280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"About 60 of our original 724 men","time":162520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"are still alive,","time":167040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"still participating in the study,","time":168360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"most of them in their 90s.","time":170560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And we are now beginning to study","time":173560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the more than 2,000 children of these men.","time":175480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I'm the fourth director of the study.","time":179680,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Since 1938, we've tracked the lives
of two groups of men.","time":183400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The first group started in the study","time":188160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when they were sophomores
at Harvard College.","time":190320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They all finished college
during World War II,","time":193040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and then most went off
to serve in the war.","time":195880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the second group that we've followed","time":199280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was a group of boys
from Boston's poorest neighborhoods,","time":201440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"boys who were chosen for the study","time":205640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"specifically because they were
from some of the most troubled","time":207680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and disadvantaged families","time":211040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in the Boston of the 1930s.","time":212920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Most lived in tenements,
many without hot and cold running water.","time":215680,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"When they entered the study,","time":222520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"all of these teenagers were interviewed.","time":224440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They were given medical exams.","time":227400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We went to their homes
and we interviewed their parents.","time":229640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then these teenagers
grew up into adults","time":233200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who entered all walks of life.","time":235600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They became factory workers and lawyers
and bricklayers and doctors,","time":238040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"one President of the United States.","time":244160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Some developed alcoholism.
A few developed schizophrenia.","time":248160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Some climbed the social ladder","time":253320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"from the bottom
all the way to the very top,","time":255640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and some made that journey
in the opposite direction.","time":258880,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The founders of this study","time":263520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"would never in their wildest dreams","time":266480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"have imagined that I would be
standing here today, 75 years later,","time":268520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"telling you that
the study still continues.","time":273080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Every two years, our patient
and dedicated research staff","time":277280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"calls up our men
and asks them if we can send them","time":280920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"yet one more set of questions
about their lives.","time":284000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Many of the inner city Boston men ask us,","time":288040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Why do you keep wanting to study me?
My life just isn't that interesting."","time":291640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The Harvard men never ask that question.","time":296600,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":299000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"To get the clearest picture
of these lives,","time":308920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we don't just send them questionnaires.","time":311800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We interview them in their living rooms.","time":314760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We get their medical records
from their doctors.","time":317240,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We draw their blood, we scan their brains,","time":320200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we talk to their children.","time":322720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We videotape them talking with their wives
about their deepest concerns.","time":324440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when, about a decade ago,
we finally asked the wives","time":329720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"if they would join us
as members of the study,","time":333280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"many of the women said,
"You know, it's about time."","time":335680,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":338400,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So what have we learned?","time":339480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What are the lessons that come
from the tens of thousands of pages","time":341200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of information that we've generated","time":346440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on these lives?","time":349520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, the lessons aren't about wealth
or fame or working harder and harder.","time":351720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The clearest message that we get
from this 75-year study is this:","time":358520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Good relationships keep us
happier and healthier. Period.","time":364840,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"We've learned three big lessons
about relationships.","time":371000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The first is that social connections
are really good for us,","time":374840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that loneliness kills.","time":378960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It turns out that people
who are more socially connected","time":381480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to family, to friends, to community,","time":385160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"are happier, they're physically healthier,
and they live longer","time":388280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"than people who are less well connected.","time":393000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the experience of loneliness
turns out to be toxic.","time":396400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"People who are more isolated
than they want to be from others","time":399840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"find that they are less happy,","time":405000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"their health declines earlier in midlife,","time":408240,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"their brain functioning declines sooner","time":411200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they live shorter lives
than people who are not lonely.","time":413440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the sad fact
is that at any given time,","time":418040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"more than one in five Americans
will report that they're lonely.","time":421280,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And we know that you
can be lonely in a crowd","time":427040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you can be lonely in a marriage,","time":429720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so the second big lesson that we learned","time":432400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that it's not just
the number of friends you have,","time":434560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's not whether or not
you're in a committed relationship,","time":437680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but it's the quality
of your close relationships that matters.","time":441200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It turns out that living in the midst
of conflict is really bad for our health.","time":446560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"High-conflict marriages, for example,
without much affection,","time":451360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"turn out to be very bad for our health,
perhaps worse than getting divorced.","time":455360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And living in the midst of good,
warm relationships is protective.","time":461160,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Once we had followed our men
all the way into their 80s,","time":465960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we wanted to look back at them at midlife","time":469080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and to see if we could predict","time":472120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who was going to grow
into a happy, healthy octogenarian","time":473720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and who wasn't.","time":477720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when we gathered together
everything we knew about them","time":479680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"at age 50,","time":483920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it wasn't their middle age
cholesterol levels","time":486080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that predicted how they
were going to grow old.","time":488640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was how satisfied they were
in their relationships.","time":491560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The people who were the most satisfied
in their relationships at age 50","time":495040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were the healthiest at age 80.","time":499960,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And good, close relationships
seem to buffer us","time":503680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"from some of the slings and arrows
of getting old.","time":506880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Our most happily partnered men and women","time":510480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"reported, in their 80s,","time":514480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that on the days
when they had more physical pain,","time":516559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"their mood stayed just as happy.","time":519520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But the people who were
in unhappy relationships,","time":522400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on the days when they
reported more physical pain,","time":525680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it was magnified by more emotional pain.","time":528640,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"And the third big lesson that we learned
about relationships and our health","time":532360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that good relationships
don't just protect our bodies,","time":536760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they protect our brains.","time":540040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It turns out that being
in a securely attached relationship","time":542440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to another person in your 80s
is protective,","time":547120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that the people who are in relationships","time":551040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where they really feel they can count
on the other person in times of need,","time":553040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"those people's memories
stay sharper longer.","time":557200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the people in relationships","time":560920,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where they feel they really
can't count on the other one,","time":562440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"those are the people who experience
earlier memory decline.","time":565600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And those good relationships,
they don't have to be smooth all the time.","time":570520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Some of our octogenarian couples
could bicker with each other","time":574000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"day in and day out,","time":577600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but as long as they felt that they
could really count on the other","time":579360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when the going got tough,","time":582560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"those arguments didn't take a toll
on their memories.","time":584400,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So this message,","time":589600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that good, close relationships
are good for our health and well-being,","time":592360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this is wisdom that's as old as the hills.","time":598080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Why is this so hard to get
and so easy to ignore?","time":601040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, we're human.","time":605560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What we'd really like is a quick fix,","time":607040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"something we can get","time":609880,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that'll make our lives good
and keep them that way.","time":611600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Relationships are messy
and they're complicated","time":615320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the hard work of tending
to family and friends,","time":618680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's not sexy or glamorous.","time":622520,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's also lifelong. It never ends.","time":625200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The people in our 75-year study
who were the happiest in retirement","time":628560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were the people who had actively worked
to replace workmates with new playmates.","time":633640,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just like the millennials
in that recent survey,","time":639480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"many of our men when they
were starting out as young adults","time":642480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"really believed that fame and wealth
and high achievement","time":646120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were what they needed to go after
to have a good life.","time":650160,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But over and over, over these 75 years,
our study has shown","time":654120,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that the people who fared the best were
the people who leaned in to relationships,","time":658320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with family, with friends, with community.","time":664000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So what about you?","time":669080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let's say you're 25,
or you're 40, or you're 60.","time":671080,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What might leaning in
to relationships even look like?","time":675800,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Well, the possibilities
are practically endless.","time":679760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It might be something as simple
as replacing screen time with people time","time":683600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or livening up a stale relationship
by doing something new together,","time":689720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"long walks or date nights,","time":694200,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or reaching out to that family member
who you haven't spoken to in years,","time":697360,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because those all-too-common family feuds","time":702240,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"take a terrible toll","time":705760,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on the people who hold the grudges.","time":708000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I'd like to close with a quote
from Mark Twain.","time":712000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"More than a century ago,","time":717280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"he was looking back on his life,","time":719680,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and he wrote this:","time":722320,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""There isn't time, so brief is life,","time":724840,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for bickerings, apologies,
heartburnings, callings to account.","time":728560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There is only time for loving,","time":734720,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and but an instant,
so to speak, for that."","time":737560,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The good life is built
with good relationships.","time":742760,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":747160,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":748400,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"2399","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: 10 things you didn't know about orgasm
talk__description: "Bonk" author Mary Roach delves into obscure scientific research, some of it centuries old, to make 10 surprising claims about sexual climax, ranging from the bizarre to the hilarious. (This talk is aimed at adults. Viewer discretion advised.)
transcript_zh-cn: {"data":{"translation":{"id":"32831","language":{"id":"178","endonym":"中文 (简体)","englishName":"Chinese, Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"386050","uri":"/profiles/386173","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1463784345.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Liqiu Qian","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"好的。下面是几张图片","time":4000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些图片来源于","time":8000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"《超声医学杂志》上发表的的一篇有趣的文章。","time":11000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"恕我直言，我觉得这篇文章是","time":15000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"《超声医学杂志》有史以来最受争议的文章。","time":18000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"标题为《子宫内自慰观察报告》。","time":21000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":26000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好吧。左边的是只手，在箭头所指的地方。","time":29000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个是阴茎。小手在其周围徘徊。","time":33000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在这呢，我们看看","time":36000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"放射科医师以色列·麦斯内 ue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":612000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好吧","time":616000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":619000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好的。但是动物世界却有明显的上吸迹象","time":621000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如，猪","time":626000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在丹麦，丹麦国家猪繁殖委员会","time":628000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"发现，要是","time":632000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"母猪在人工配种时性唤起","time":634000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"产仔量会上升6个百分点","time":638000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也就是说更多的小猪崽会出生","time":641000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后一个方案应运而生，为的是把","time":644000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"猪的产仔量再提高5个百分点","time":647000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"宣传海报贴满了牲口棚","time":649000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"DVD分发给农民","time":652000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我也有这DVD","time":654000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":656000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可是独家揭露。我会放一小段视频给大家","time":657000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":661000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好的，","time":663000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"开始了，啦啦啦，去工作，","time":665000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看起来还有天真烂漫","time":668000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"接下来他会用双手","time":671000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不过公猪没手，只能用鼻子，好吧，","time":673000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":677000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就这样，公猪的求偶节目有点奇怪","time":680000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":685000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是模仿公猪的重量","time":689000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":691000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要知道，母猪的阴蒂在阴道内","time":694000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，这对母猪来说还是有快感的，就这样","time":697000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":700000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"结果皆大欢喜","time":722000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":724000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我很喜欢这视频","time":726000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"视频开头还颇具教育意义","time":728000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就在农民手部特写那段，镜头给他手上的结婚戒指一个大大的特写","time":730000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好像想告诉观众”好吧，这是他的工作。他喜欢的还是人类女性“","time":732000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":737000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好吧，我住在丹麦时，招待我的女主人名叫安·玛丽","time":741000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我问她”为什么我直接刺激母猪的阴蒂？","time":744000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"为什么我让农民这样做那？","time":750000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这不是5步中的一步吗","time":752000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她答道，你一定要听听原话，我真是爱死这个了","time":754000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说","time":756000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”光是让农民触摸母猪的有阴部就够困难的了，","time":758000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就更别提阴蒂啦。“","time":761000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":764000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是有点害羞但有雄心壮志的农民呢，可以买这个，这可是真的","time":769000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"母猪振荡器","time":772000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这东西连接着精子输送管振动","time":774000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"原因呢，正如我所说的","time":776000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"母猪的阴蒂在阴道内","time":779000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，这东西带来的快感还是比表面上看起来的多得多的","time":781000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并且，我问了女主人，","time":784000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”但是这些母猪，我的意思是，也许你也注意到了，","time":786000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些母猪看起来不是很乐在其中啊。“","time":788000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说”这么说就没道理啦，","time":791000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为，你不能用人的标准去衡量猪","time":793000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人会把痛苦或快感写在脸上，但猪不是这样的。","time":796000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"猪呢，打个比方，更像狗，","time":798000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"用脸的上半部分传达信息，动耳朵就是很好的表现","time":802000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，你也不能准确的把握猪的感受","time":805000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"另一方面，作为灵长类动物，我们人类更趋向于用嘴","time":808000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是藏酋猴射精时的面部表情","time":812000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":816000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"并且，有趣的是，这个表情也会在雌性藏酋猴脸上看到","time":818000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不过是在它和另一只雌性藏酋猴交尾时","time":822000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":826000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"马斯特和强生在20世纪50年代决定","time":829000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要研究透彻整个人类性反应链","time":831000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从性冲动到高潮，从男人到女人","time":836000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人体在期间的一切反应","time":839000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"对女性来说，这些反应都发生在体内","time":841000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这并没有阻止马斯特和强生的步伐","time":844000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们研制出一种仿真交媾仪","time":846000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这东西基本上是个有摄像机的仿真阴茎连着一个马达","time":851000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一个阴茎","time":854000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"丙烯制作的，内嵌摄像机和照明部件","time":856000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"连接在一个这样运转的马达上","time":859000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，被试着与其性交","time":862000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们就是用这种方法，听惊人的","time":865000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可惜的是，这仪器被拆毁了","time":867000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"真是太令我难过了。我并不是想要一个","time":869000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只是想亲眼看看","time":871000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":874000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"一个阳光明媚的一天","time":877000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"阿尔佛雷德·金赛（前面提及的美国性学家）决定","time":880000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"计算精子射出的平均距离","time":883000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这可并非单为满足奇思怪想","time":888000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"金赛博士听说过","time":890000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这样一个理论，那时是40年代","time":894000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"精子","time":897000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"射入宫颈的力度","time":899000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是确保生育的一大因素","time":901000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"金赛觉得这理论是空谈，所以他要用实践检验","time":904000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他在实验室聚集了","time":907000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"300名男子，测量卷尺和摄像机","time":910000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":915000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实上他发现","time":917000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其中四分之三的男子的精液","time":919000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只是溢出","time":922000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而非很有力的喷出射出","time":924000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是，有一个“冠军”的","time":928000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“射程”竟达8英尺（约2.43米），挺惊人的","time":932000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":934000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":936000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是啊，没错","time":937000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":939000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可惜的是，这些被试着是匿名的，他的名字没有被提及","time":940000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"在他的文章中","time":943000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在他的文章中，金赛没提他的名字","time":947000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"金赛，写道","time":949000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“两张床单被铺在地上以防沾污地毯。”","time":952000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（众笑）","time":956000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是金赛所有文献中","time":958000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我第二最喜欢的一句话","time":960000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我最喜欢的呢，是“把芝士摆在交媾的老鼠前，","time":962000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"收吸引的是雌鼠而非雄鼠。“","time":966000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众笑）","time":969000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"十分感谢","time":971000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":973000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢！","time":977000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"549","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[{"author":" the oriental carpets."","time":952000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":956000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Which is my second favorite line
in the entire oeuvre of Alfred Kinsey.","time":958000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My favorite being, "Cheese crumbs

talk__name: Looks aren't everything. Believe me, I'm a model.
talk__description: Cameron Russell admits she won "a genetic lottery": she's tall, pretty and an underwear model. But don't judge her by her looks. In this fearless talk, she takes a wry look at the industry that had her looking highly seductive at barely 16 years old.
transcript_zh-cn: {"data":{"translation":{"id":"47376","language":{"id":"178","endonym":"中文 (简体)","englishName":"Chinese, Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"1549772","uri":"/profiles/1550809","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1352643280.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Xiaoma Cheng","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"1502367","uri":"/profiles/1503404","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1352592739.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"慧颖 Russell,","time":306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"过去的一段时间里","time":2950,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我是个模特","time":7412,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其实，（我干了）10年。","time":9003,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在，我在这个房间内感到一种","time":12990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"令人不适的紧张感","time":16464,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我不该穿这条裙子（笑声）","time":17994,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"幸亏我带了另外一套","time":20992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是TED讲台上第一次现场换装","time":24321,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我觉得今天在场的人都很幸运啊，","time":27970,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果有些女士对的我出现感到惊恐","time":31016,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不必现在告诉我。但我马上就会在twitter上知道的","time":33957,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":36659,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我也想告诉各位我有幸","time":42315,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能够在10秒内","time":44136,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"改变我在你们心中的形象","time":47275,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这不是所有人都能做得到的","time":49938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这双高跟鞋很不舒服","time":53400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而好消息是我不打算穿他们","time":55045,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最坏的消息是我要把这件毛衣从头上套进去","time":59239,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为这时候你们会笑我","time":60944,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以当我穿衣服的时候,（你们）什么都不要做","time":62264,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可以了","time":67230,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那么，我为什么做这个呢（现场换装）？","time":70643,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这很怪","time":73714,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"呃","time":76312,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"希望不会像图片上这样怪","time":80421,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"图象是强大的","time":84839,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但同时又是表面化的","time":88088,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我只是在6秒内就彻底改变了自己在你们心中的形象","time":93036,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在这张照片里","time":97479,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我事实上在现实生活中根本没有男朋友","time":99318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当摄影师","time":102062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"要我弓起背，摸那个男士的头发时","time":104574,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我非常不自在","time":106995,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"确定的是，除了手术","time":111013,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或像两天前我为了工作做的棕褐色(皮肤)","time":113013,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们基本上是没法改变外表的","time":116454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们的外表，虽然是表面化的，固定的","time":120215,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还是极大地影响着我们的生活","time":123671,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以今天，对我来说，变的无惧就意味着要诚实","time":128034,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"今天我站在这里是因为我是个模特","time":132662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我在这个舞台上是因为我是个漂亮的白种女性","time":135547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在我们业内我们称此为“性感女孩”","time":139274,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要回答下人们常常问我的那些问题","time":142039,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(而且是)以一种诚实的方式","time":144553,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"第一个问题是，你是怎么成为模特的？","time":146232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我总是说：“我是被发现的”，但这其实什么也说明不了","time":149134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我成为模特的真正的原因是","time":151936,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我拥有极佳的基因，我是遗产的接受者","time":155454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可能在疑问什么是遗产.","time":158941,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"呃，在过去的几个世纪里","time":160804,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们定义里的美不仅仅只包括健康，年轻","time":163807,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和身材匀称这些我们出于生物本能去赞美的元素","time":169325,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还包括高挑，苗条的体型，","time":173111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"富有女性气质，白色皮肤这些特征。","time":176647,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是我的遗产，","time":179894,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这就是我一直在兑现的遗产，","time":181666,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道你们中有些人","time":184440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可能对这个观点存疑","time":186494,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们可能会举出一些时尚圈人物，例如","time":188210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Naomi, Tyra, Joan Smalls和Liu Wen\n(前三位为黑人模特，第四位为中国模特)","time":189802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"首先，我要表扬下你们对于模特界的了解令人印象深刻","time":193254,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":195846,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但不幸的是，我得告诉你们，在2007年时","time":198077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一名纽约大学的博士在启发之下","time":201630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"统计了所有在职模特的人数","time":204140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在677名正式受雇模特中","time":207766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只有27名，也就是不到百分之四，是非白种人","time":210894,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"下一个人们常问我的问题是","time":215637,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我长大了能当模特吗？”","time":217188,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的第一个答案是：“我也不知道，因为他们没让我来掌管这件事”","time":219143,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但第二个答案，也是我想对问问题的那些小姑娘说的是“为什么？”","time":222547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你知道吗？你可以选择任何的职业。","time":227745,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以成为美国总统","time":229110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或是下一代互联网的发明者","time":230761,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或是个忍者般的心胸外科诗人,","time":232207,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"--这个不错，因为你会是第一个","time":235163,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":237807,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果，听完这些她们还是说","time":240040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“不，不，Cameron，我想当模特”","time":242142,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我会说：“当我的老板吧”","time":243649,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我不能决定任何事","time":245965,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以成为美国Vogue杂志的主编","time":247231,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或是H&M的首席执行官，或下一个Steven Meisel(著名时尚摄影师)","time":249407,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"说你长大后想当模特","time":253031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就像你说你长大后想赢彩票一样","time":254952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（能不能成为模特）不在你的掌控范围之内。当模特很棒","time":258146,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但它不是一个可规划的行业","time":262238,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我将为大家展示我模特从业十年的一些经验","time":263823,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为不像一个忍者般的心胸科诗人","time":268307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它只能立足当下","time":270073,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以如果摄影师就在这里","time":272962,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"灯光就在这里--比如漂亮的水银灯","time":276148,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"客户说：“Cameron,我想要一张走路时的快门照”","time":278045,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这条修长的美腿先迈步，这条手臂放在后面，这条手臂放前面","time":279667,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"露出四分之三侧脸，来来回回，","time":283171,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就这样，然后回头看你臆想中的朋友","time":285764,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"300，400，500次（笑声）","time":288154,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这看上去就像这样（笑声）","time":293419,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"希望不像中间那张那么怪","time":297542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不知道那张是怎么回事儿","time":299753,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"现实是，当你毕业后","time":302968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有了简历，做过了几份工作","time":304860,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你就不能再说其它的了","time":306132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以如果你说你想成为美国总统","time":307686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但你的简历上写着：有十年工作经验的内衣模特","time":311428,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"人们会笑着看你","time":313628,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"下一个人们常问的问题是：“他们会修照片吗？”","time":315420,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是的，他们会修几乎所有照片","time":318112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但这只是工作的一小部分","time":319733,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我第一张模特照片","time":323683,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也是我第一次穿比基尼","time":326447,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我基至还没有过月经","time":329243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道这有点私人，但","time":331085,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时我还很年轻","time":333014,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是那张照片几个月前我跟祖母一起拍的照片","time":334535,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是拍照片当天","time":338400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我朋友跟我在一起","time":341131,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我拍法国Vogue杂志前几天前在睡衣party上拍的照片","time":342497,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我在足球队和V杂志的照片","time":346466,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是现在的我","time":350787,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我希望你们明白的是","time":352247,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些不是我自己的照片","time":354307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是","time":356266,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"由一群专业人士制出的图象,","time":357943,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(他们是)发型师，化装师，摄影师，造型师","time":360871,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以及他们的助理，还有前期制作，后期制作","time":363847,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们制造出了这些图象，而不是我","time":366222,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"下一个问题是","time":369206,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“你能得到免费的东西吗？”","time":371347,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我确实有太多","time":374008,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从没机会穿的8英寸高跟鞋，","time":377445,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是免费的东西","time":379064,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"却是我在现实生活中得到的。而这恰恰是我们不愿意谈的","time":381112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我在剑桥市长大","time":384482,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有一次我走进一家商店却忘了带钱","time":386094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们送了我一条裙子","time":388459,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"十几岁时，我跟朋友一起开车","time":390822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她是个糟糕的司机，闯了红灯","time":393342,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们被停车","time":395207,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我只说了句：“长官抱歉”","time":397246,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们就继续上路了","time":399532,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我得到这些是因为我的外表","time":401918,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不是我是身份。有些人为了他们的外表","time":405569,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而不是身份付出了代价。","time":408388,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我住在纽约，去年","time":410630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有14万青年被停车搜身","time":412216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们中百分之86是黑人和拉美人","time":416077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大多数是年轻的男孩子","time":418261,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而在纽约年轻黑人和拉美男性总数只有17万7千","time":420116,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，对他们来说，问题不是：“我会被停车吗”","time":424602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是“我要被停几次？我什么时候会被停？“","time":427303,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我在为这次演讲做调查时","time":430198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"发现在美国13岁女孩儿群体中","time":431624,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"百分之53不喜欢她们的身体","time":435198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"到了17岁，这一比例上升至百分之78。","time":437886,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"那么最后一个问题是","time":441736,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”当模特是什么感觉？“","time":445118,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我猜他们期待的答案是","time":446134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”如果你再瘦一点儿，你的头发再有光泽一些","time":448934,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你就会很开心，很难以置信“","time":451878,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当在后台时,我们会给出一个","time":454675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"像这样的答案。","time":456790,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们说”能到处旅行","time":458225,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和有创造力的，热情的，灵感不断的人一起工作真的很棒”","time":460822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这不假，但这只是事实的一半","time":464909,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我们永远不会在镜头前说的是,","time":467955,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我永远不会说的是,","time":470678,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“我没有安全感“","time":472774,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我必须每天都要担心","time":475158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我看上去怎么样","time":476612,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果你曾经也想过","time":479537,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我的大腿更瘦，头发更好，我会更开心吗？","time":483596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你只要去看看模特就知道了","time":487550,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为她们有最瘦的大腿，最漂亮的头发，最酷的衣服","time":489181,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而她们却可能是世界上最没有身理安全感的女人","time":491814,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"所以当我为这次演讲做准备时时，发现","time":496796,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很难为诚实找到一个平衡点。因为一方面","time":499054,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我站在这儿，说","time":501947,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”看，我凭着天生的优势得到了这么多东西，”心里会不舒服","time":504907,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可是如果这句话接着","time":508474,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"“可是这些都不能让我开心”也很不自在","time":511622,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但最难的是去展现","time":514411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"性别和种族歧视的职业传统","time":517926,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我自己本身是最大的受益者","time":520310,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但同时我又很开心并受尊重的站在这里","time":523198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"趁着我还年轻，而不是已经工作了10，20或30年","time":526303,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和模特行业间有越来越多的阻隔（不能获得最直接的感觉）","time":529539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为可能到那时我就不会讲我怎样得到第一份工作","time":533236,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"怎样付大学学费","time":536734,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这些现在看来是如此重要的东西","time":539172,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"如果这次演讲能使你有所受益，我希望","time":542054,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是我们都能欣然接受","time":544401,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"图象的力量带来的我们所理解的成功","time":547623,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和我们所理解的失败","time":551590,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢（掌声）","time":553490,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1647","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"47364","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"1107400","uri":"/profiles/1108408","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/02/b7/dd/178141.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345428384.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Morton Bast","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"1201876","uri":"/profiles/1202910","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1345472522.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Joseph Geni","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"Hi. My name is Cameron Russell,","time":306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and for the last little while,
I've been a model.","time":2950,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Actually, for 10 years.","time":9003,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I feel like","time":12990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there's an uncomfortable tension
in the room right now","time":15170,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I should not have worn this dress.","time":17994,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":20041,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So luckily, I brought an outfit change.","time":21823,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is the first outfit change
on the TED stage,","time":24321,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so you guys are pretty lucky
to witness it, I think.","time":27970,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If some of the women were
really horrified when I came out,","time":31016,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you don't have to tell me now,
but I'll find out later on Twitter.","time":33957,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":37124,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I'd also note that I'm quite privileged","time":42315,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to be able to transform
what you think of me","time":44197,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in a very brief 10 seconds.","time":47275,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Not everybody gets to do that.","time":49938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These heels are very uncomfortable,
so good thing I wasn't going to wear them.","time":53400,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The worst part is putting
this sweater over my head,","time":59239,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because that's when
you'll all laugh at me,","time":61784,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so don't do anything
while it's over my head.","time":63857,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"All right.","time":67745,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So, why did I do that?","time":70983,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That was awkward.","time":73714,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":74944,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Well --","time":76896,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":78031,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Hopefully not as awkward as that picture.","time":80421,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Image is powerful,","time":85306,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but also, image is superficial.","time":88088,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I just totally transformed
what you thought of me, in six seconds.","time":93036,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And in this picture,","time":97479,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I had actually never had
a boyfriend in real life.","time":99318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I was totally uncomfortable,","time":102643,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the photographer
was telling me to arch my back","time":104460,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and put my hand in that guy's hair.","time":106962,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And of course, barring surgery,","time":111013,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or the fake tan that I got
two days ago for work,","time":113013,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there's very little that we can do
to transform how we look,","time":116454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and how we look, though it is
superficial and immutable,","time":120215,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"has a huge impact on our lives.","time":123671,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So today, for me, being
fearless means being honest.","time":128034,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I am on this stage
because I am a model.","time":132662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I am on this stage because
I am a pretty, white woman,","time":135547,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and in my industry,
we call that a sexy girl.","time":139274,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to answer the questions
that people always ask me,","time":142039,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but with an honest twist.","time":144910,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So the first question is,
how do you become a model?","time":146232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I always just say, "Oh, I was scouted,"","time":149134,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but that means nothing.","time":151167,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The real way that I became a model","time":152349,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is I won a genetic lottery,
and I am the recipient of a legacy,","time":155454,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and maybe you're wondering
what is a legacy.","time":158941,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Well, for the past few centuries","time":161061,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we have defined beauty
not just as health and youth","time":163807,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and symmetry that we're biologically
programmed to admire,","time":169325,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but also as tall, slender figures,","time":173111,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and femininity and white skin.","time":176647,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this is a legacy
that was built for me,","time":179894,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's a legacy
that I've been cashing out on.","time":181966,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I know there are
people in the audience","time":184440,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who are skeptical at this point,","time":186494,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and maybe there are
some fashionistas who are like,","time":188210,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Wait. Naomi. Tyra. Joan Smalls. Liu Wen."","time":190711,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And first, I commend you on your model
knowledge. Very impressive.","time":193254,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":196421,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But unfortunately,
I have to inform you that in 2007,","time":198077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a very inspired NYU Ph.D. student","time":201630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"counted all the models on the runway,
every single one that was hired,","time":204140,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and of the 677 models that were hired,","time":207766,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"only 27, or less than four percent,
were non-white.","time":210894,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The next question people always ask is,","time":215637,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Can I be a model when I grow up?"","time":217594,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the first answer is, "I don't know,
they don't put me in charge of that."","time":219243,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But the second answer,","time":222901,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and what I really want to say
to these little girls is,","time":224318,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Why? You know? You can be anything.","time":227096,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You could be the President
of the United States,","time":229110,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or the inventor of the next Internet,","time":231380,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or a ninja cardiothoracic surgeon poet,","time":233181,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which would be awesome,
because you'd be the first one."","time":235163,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":237854,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"If, after this amazing list,
they still are like,","time":240040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""No, no, Cameron, I want to be a model,"","time":242398,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"well, then I say, "Be my boss."","time":244327,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because I'm not in charge of anything,","time":245965,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you could be the editor in chief
of American Vogue","time":247855,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or the CEO of H&M,
or the next Steven Meisel.","time":250406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Saying that you want to be
a model when you grow up","time":253031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is akin to saying that you want to win
the Powerball when you grow up.","time":255436,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's out of your control,
and it's awesome,","time":258794,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's not a career path.","time":262238,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I will demonstrate for you now
10 years of accumulated model knowledge,","time":264316,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because unlike cardiothoracic surgeons,","time":268307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it can just be distilled right now.","time":270236,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, if the photographer is right there,","time":272962,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the light is right there, like a nice HMI,","time":276046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the client says,
"We want a walking shot,"","time":278127,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this leg goes first, nice and long,
this arm goes back, this arm goes forward,","time":280298,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the head is at three quarters,
and you just go back and forth,","time":284006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just do that, and then you look back
at your imaginary friends,","time":286948,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"300, 400, 500 times.","time":289972,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":291715,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"It will look something like this.","time":293419,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":295230,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Hopefully less awkward
than that one in the middle.","time":297441,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That was -- I don't know
what happened there.","time":300393,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Unfortunately,
after you've gone to school,","time":302968,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you have a résumé
and you've done a few jobs,","time":305099,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you can't say anything anymore,","time":307453,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so if you say you want to be
the President of the United States,","time":308969,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but your résumé reads,
"Underwear Model: 10 years,"","time":312040,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"people give you a funny look.","time":314470,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"The next question is,
"Do they retouch all the photos?"","time":315900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And yeah, they pretty much
retouch all the photos,","time":318512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but that is only a small component
of what's happening.","time":320917,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This picture is the very first
picture that I ever took,","time":324006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's also the very first time
that I had worn a bikini,","time":326748,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I didn't even have my period yet.","time":329581,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I know we're getting personal,
but I was a young girl.","time":331385,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is what I looked like with my grandma
just a few months earlier.","time":334536,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's me on the same day as this shoot.","time":339016,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"My friend got to come.","time":341216,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's me at a slumber party
a few days before I shot French Vogue.","time":342584,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here's me on the soccer team
and in V Magazine.","time":346679,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And here's me today.","time":350787,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I hope what you're seeing","time":352247,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"is that these pictures
are not pictures of me.","time":354307,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They are constructions,","time":356505,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they are constructions
by a group of professionals,","time":357943,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"by hairstylists and makeup artists
and photographers and stylists","time":360871,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and all of their assistants
and pre-production and post-production,","time":363991,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they build this.","time":367207,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's not me.","time":368239,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Okay, so the next question
people always ask me is,","time":369333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Do you get free stuff?"","time":371754,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Laughter)","time":373104,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I do have too many 8-inch heels
which I never get to wear,","time":374174,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"except for earlier,","time":377445,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but the free stuff that I get
is the free stuff that I get in real life,","time":379064,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that's what we don't like
to talk about.","time":382549,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I grew up in Cambridge,","time":384803,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and one time I went into a store
and I forgot my money","time":386094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they gave me the dress for free.","time":388690,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I was a teenager,
I was driving with my friend","time":390822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"who was an awful driver
and she ran a red and of course,","time":393342,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we got pulled over,","time":396033,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and all it took was a "Sorry, officer,"
and we were on our way.","time":397246,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I got these free things
because of how I look,","time":402363,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"not who I am, and there are
people paying a cost","time":405569,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for how they look and not who they are.","time":408388,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"I live in New York, and last year,","time":410630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of the 140,000 teenagers
that were stopped and frisked,","time":412274,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"86% of them were black and Latino,
and most of them were young men.","time":416077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And there are only 177,000
young black and Latino men in New York,","time":420116,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so for them, it's not a question
of, "Will I get stopped?"","time":424602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but "How many times will I get stopped?
When will I get stopped?"","time":427341,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I was researching this talk,","time":430423,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I found out that of the 13-year-old girls
in the United States,","time":432019,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"53% don't like their bodies,","time":435198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that number goes to 78%
by the time that they're 17.","time":437885,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"So, the last question people ask me is,","time":441981,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""What is it like to be a model?"","time":444903,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I think the answer
that they're looking for is,","time":446527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""If you are a little bit skinnier
and you have shinier hair,","time":448934,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you will be so happy and fabulous."","time":451878,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And when we're backstage,","time":454675,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"we give an answer
that maybe makes it seem like that.","time":456234,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We say, "It's really amazing to travel,
and it's amazing to get to work","time":458781,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with creative, inspired,
passionate people."","time":462285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And those things are true,
but they're only one half of the story,","time":464909,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because the thing
that we never say on camera,","time":468076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I have never said on camera, is,","time":470678,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I am insecure."","time":472774,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I'm insecure because I have to think
about what I look like every day.","time":475158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And if you ever are wondering,","time":480600,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""If I have thinner thighs
and shinier hair, will I be happier?"","time":483596,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you just need to meet a group of models,","time":487550,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because they have the thinnest thighs,
the shiniest hair and the coolest clothes,","time":489479,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they're the most physically
insecure women probably on the planet.","time":493429,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"When I was writing this talk,","time":496896,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I found it very difficult
to strike an honest balance,","time":498302,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because on the one hand,","time":501295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I felt very uncomfortable
to come out here and say,","time":502753,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Look I've received all these benefits
from a deck stacked in my favor,"","time":505189,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it also felt really uncomfortable
to follow that up with,","time":508808,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""and it doesn't always make me happy."","time":512023,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But mostly it was difficult to unpack
a legacy of gender and racial oppression","time":514411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"when I am one
of the biggest beneficiaries.","time":520310,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"But I'm also happy
and honored to be up here","time":523822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I think that it's great
that I got to come","time":526303,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"before 10 or 20 or 30 years had passed
and I'd had more agency in my career,","time":529539,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because maybe then I wouldn't tell
the story of how I got my first job,","time":533236,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or maybe I wouldn't tell the story
of how I paid for college,","time":536734,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which seems so important right now.","time":539631,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"If there's a takeaway to this talk,","time":542074,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I hope it's that we all feel
more comfortable acknowledging","time":543996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the power of image
in our perceived successes","time":547623,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and our perceived failures.","time":551590,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"Thank you.","time":553490,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"(Applause)","time":554866,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1647","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__name: Why people believe they can't draw
talk__description: Most people think they can't draw, but communications expert Graham Shaw isn't buying it. In this fun, instructional talk, he demonstrates how a few adjustments to your drawing technique (and your attitude) can leave you with an effective new presentation tool as well as an outlet for your creativity.
