{"data":{"translation":{"id":"93796","language":{"id":"178","endonym":"中文 (简体)","englishName":"Chinese, Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"5609682","uri":"/profiles/5611419","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/05/42/18/344600.jpeg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1456050061.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Shufang LIU","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"5643141","uri":"/profiles/5644878","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/06/fa/e5/457445.jpeg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1456659272.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"志铉 Arisa","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"错觉","time":7900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Graham Shaw 为什么人们认为他们不能画画 - 怎么证明他们可以？","time":12015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"嗨。","time":15410,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我有一个问题问大家：","time":16541,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"今天在场多少人敢说他会画速写呢？","time":18071,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":23231,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我看举手的大概有1%到2%.","time":24441,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很有意思，是不是？","time":27841,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"有点像人们想起拼写或者唱歌。","time":29057,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们想，“你或者会，或者不会。”","time":33311,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可是，我相信你们一定能。","time":36771,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为当人们说他们不能画的时候，","time":38651,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认为更多跟他们的信仰有关系，
而不是他们的天才或者能力。","time":40565,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我认为，当他们说他们不会画的时候，
那仅是一个错觉。","time":44285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"今天，我就想给你们证明这一点。","time":48065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当我说“画”的时候，","time":50785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我不是说我们大家都要像米开朗基罗那样画。","time":52295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们不是要去画西斯廷礼拜堂的天顶画。","time":55265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而是说，在这个讲话结束后，你们会感觉高兴于","time":58765,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们都能画，有点像这样的画。","time":62225,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（观众窃窃私语）","time":65695,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":66695,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"甚至于有点像这样的画？","time":67855,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":71485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实上要做到这些，
你们只要做两件事情。","time":72465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"首先，要解放思想，
你们能做到吗？","time":76335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（观众：）当然！","time":78545,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后第二点，准备好开始。","time":79475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么，拿一张纸和一支笔出来。","time":82035,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好，下面我们这么着。","time":97581,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我给大家看看我们要画的第一张卡通，","time":101336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么开始先好好看，","time":103676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"来开始了。","time":105496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好好看。","time":107227,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这将是我们要画的第一张卡通。","time":115139,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一个叫史派克的卡通人物。","time":116949,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想请你们跟我一起画。","time":118549,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我画第一条线，然后你们跟着画。
画完了之后请抬起头来。","time":120509,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这样我就知道你们准备好画下一笔了。","time":123929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好，我们开始。","time":126279,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"先画鼻子。","time":128026,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在画眼睛。","time":134729,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"眼睛看起来像66或者双引号。","time":136949,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这样就好了。","time":144233,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，画嘴巴。漂亮的，大大的微笑。","time":146461,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在，在这里，画鼻子。","time":152751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，小平头。","time":158480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，我们把笔落在嘴巴的左边，

这么画一笔。","time":171881,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"脖子左边落笔，
T恤的脖子。","time":177031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"左边一笔，
右边一笔。","time":181487,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"把你们的画举起来让大家看看。","time":184497,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑，嘈杂）","time":186677,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们画的怎么样？","time":187527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":189458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好。","time":192458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好，太棒了！","time":200230,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这么说，看起来你们只是学会了画一张卡通画，","time":202438,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可是，你们实际上学到了更多；","time":206552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们学会了画的顺序，","time":208722,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让你们可以画出千千万万张各种各样的卡通，","time":210922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为，我们只是在这个顺序上做小小的变化。","time":213742,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们再试试这个。","time":217542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"跟着我画。","time":218542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"鼻子。","time":220272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"眼睛。","time":225944,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"微笑。","time":234333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好。","time":237527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再画点头发。","time":238787,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"嘴巴左边下笔，","time":245724,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"头发下面。","time":250671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"上衣的V领。","time":253689,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"左一条线，右一条线。","time":256548,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们又画了一个卡通人物。
让我们叫她萨尔玛。","time":259508,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":262208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我们画了史派克和萨尔玛。","time":263258,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们再来一个。现在就开始了。","time":264818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再搞点小小的变化，
你马上就会明白这个意思。","time":267248,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从鼻子开始。","time":269818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这次我们稍稍改变一下眼睛。","time":274510,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看着，两个连在一起的圆圈。","time":276980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就这样。","time":281260,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，眼睛里点两个小黑点。","time":282280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且，我们稍稍改变一下嘴巴。你们看。","time":286524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小圆圈，这儿涂上颜色。","time":289692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就这样试试。","time":292197,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，耳朵。","time":295260,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在，我们搞搞头发。你们看。","time":300271,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"漂亮的卷发。","time":303441,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同样，在嘴巴左侧也画上，小小一道线。","time":309201,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"耳朵下方，往下画一道。","time":314251,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"T恤领子。","time":317800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"左一道，右一道。","time":319893,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想，我们可以叫他杰夫。","time":322543,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":324223,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们再来一张。","time":325790,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再来一张，开始。","time":328411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们现在明白了。","time":330481,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":331751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们还是从鼻子开始。","time":332531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"注意，我们做了一些小小的变化。","time":336952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这次，我们改一下眼睛，
两只眼睛分开。","time":338722,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"里面点上这样的小点点。","time":341152,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，嘴巴也稍稍不同。","time":347463,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还是来一个小V形。","time":349193,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"三角形。","time":353071,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一小道线条穿过三角，
并且把颜色涂深一点。","time":354531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在，仔细看这里；

还有一个主意。","time":443515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这一个超级小技巧。","time":445985,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"试试这个：戴眼镜的人物。","time":449203,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们就画一个有点像史派克的鼻子。","time":451513,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，画镜框，","time":456590,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"两个这样的圆圈，

只是这次我们要把镜框架起来。","time":471258,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就这样，好好看这一点点。","time":477065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":481513,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这一点点，我真的很喜欢。看着。","time":483718,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑）","time":487024,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，这里一点点。","time":489504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"胡子底下下笔，往下一道，","time":493252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"T恤领子，左一笔，右一笔。","time":498497,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这么就画完了。

和以前跟我学过画的人……","time":509502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我给你们举三个例子，
其他学会画速写的人的例子。","time":513502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且他们当时也吃惊不小，跟你们一样。","time":518522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要把我觉得最喜欢，","time":520762,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"最令我震惊的例子，放到最后。","time":523752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"第一个例子是这样的：","time":526792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我教过很多小孩和学校的学生。","time":528782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小孩子，一般都画得很好，","time":531752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可是一旦过了十五六岁，
大多数都认为自己不会画。","time":534002,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我跟他们交流。","time":537582,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"就在本周，我去了一个学校。","time":538782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"主要是教他们利用画图来帮助记忆。","time":540912,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一位女生试图记住红细胞的功能，","time":544242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她画了这个小图，","time":548262,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一个红色的细胞，提着一个手袋
上面写着O2，","time":549862,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好让她记住血红细胞将氧气带到身体的各个部分。","time":553242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是个不错的例子。","time":557802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"除此之外，我也跟处于不同年龄段
的成年人工作过，","time":559252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"特别是在生意圈子里，","time":562552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们经常想让他们做的介绍观众过目不忘。","time":564782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在这种情况下，一个速写的卡通或者草图
可以大显神通。","time":568232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"同样多数人认为他们不会画。
可是，我们看看这个例子。","time":572242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"几条波浪线，","time":576282,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小船象征着我们大家都在里面。","time":581062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以如果在演讲中画出来，","time":586942,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一定会过目不忘，是不是？","time":589782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当然是的。","time":592242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"可是第三个例子是 -
你们不能有偏好，对不对？","time":593082,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我的最爱。","time":596292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你有没有经历过在一个宴会里有人问你是做什么的？","time":598042,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"当人们问我时，会有点怀疑","time":601262,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这位女士对我说，哦","time":603852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我说，“我做一点培训，我教人学画画”","time":605772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后，她说，“你能来为我们的团体做一些培训吗？”","time":609012,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"她说，“她和一些人一起工作” -她是志愿者-","time":613472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个团体的人们都经历过中风","time":616542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我说，“当然可以，我可以花一些时间做培训”","time":619292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后我说我可以，我预定了时间。","time":622472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你曾经做过这个吗？","time":624532,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那时你在接近","time":625682,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"然后你会想 ，“是什么让我自己陷入在这里？”","time":626882,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我能做它吗？","time":629362,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想， “我能和他们做些什么呢？” 你们明白","time":630772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我知道， 我要画我的卡通画，他们应该喜欢","time":633772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是，随着时间接近，我变的更加忧虑","time":637882,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我一直在想","time":640802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我已经培训过小孩子们，培训过各种成人","time":642162,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我从未培训过像这样的团体","time":644662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它证明是一个叫TALK(说）的慈善机构的部分","time":646672,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个TALK慈善机构是一个的了不起的慈然机构， 它帮助那些患中风疾病的人们","time":650512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且有患有失语症的特殊的情况","time":655492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可能听说过失语症。有时候叫做言语障碍症","time":659492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"关键的事情是它影响他们的沟通交流能力","time":663062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"比如，他们可能有问题在","time":667252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"读，写，说，或者理解上面","time":669512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它可以使比较孤立的一种情况","time":673062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它可以是非常非常使人沮丧，甚至导致失去信心","time":676292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"不管怎样，我准备了所有的资料，怎么做这个培训","time":680642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大概几个小时，中间喝茶休息时间","time":684772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我变得更加忧虑","time":687132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是实际上，我没有必要担心","time":689962,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为我将要向你们展示他们做的","time":691832,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是我做过的最好的事情之一","time":694542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我将给你们展示第一张幻灯片","time":697292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我教了他们史派克，像刚刚教你们一样","time":699754,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想让你们看看他们画画时的表情","time":702644,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（观众）哦","time":706745,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们这里看到的是两个中风患者的康复者","time":709505,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在左边和右边","time":712065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"其中一个志愿帮助者在中间","time":713195,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每一个中风康复者，这个房间里大概有36个人，包括志愿者们","time":716252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一对一的帮助者","time":720602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以看到他们脸上的快乐，是吧","time":722812,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"让我们看另外一个图片","time":725512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这位先生叫大卫，他在拿着这个图片","time":728746,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以说这是史派克的图片，是吧","time":732056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"事实上，我认为他画的史派克更好些","time":734786,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是我没有意识到的是，直到结束这次培训","time":738046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在这次培训中，很多人包括大卫","time":741536,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是用他们非惯用的手画画的","time":744706,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大卫中风影响到他右侧身体","time":747922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以他用他左手画的，很多其他人也是","time":751752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"没有人向我提这回事，也没有人抱怨","time":754542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们就这样画画的","time":757232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它是一个鼓舞人心的培训","time":759032,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它又是一个令人谦恭的培训","time":761172,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是我觉得我做过的最美好的事情之一","time":763232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"培训结束后，我收到Mike Jordan医生一封令人愉快的邮件","time":765512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他是TALK机构的主席","time":769512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他是一名医生，但是他又是一个机构的主席","time":771772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我这里引用他写给我的，他说","time":774822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"”今天我们的康复者认识到他们可以画画","time":776772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它不仅仅是这些；","time":781012,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这是一种让他们建立自信心的活动。","time":782532,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以当时我很高兴，他也很高兴，每个人都很高兴","time":785792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"他们又邀请我去","time":788542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"现在我大概每三，四个月都会去那里一次","time":789972,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很不错。我想这是很温馨的值得分享的例子","time":793062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"想再画一个画？","time":796112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（观众）是","time":797382,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那我们开始，拿起你的笔","time":798302,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们开始了","time":804121,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我将让你画一个你可能认出的人","time":806561,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"开始于大鼻子，有点像史派克的鼻子","time":809521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"下面。我们做眼睛。你可能会想","time":815791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个也有点像史派克","time":822511,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看看下面","time":824941,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你已经热身了","time":831461,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"开始吧","time":836956,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"下面这里一条小线","time":840754,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"再下面","time":844986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"小的V型領，左边一笔，右边一笔","time":847076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么你画出了艾伯特 爱因斯坦","time":851076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":852866,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那么你有了你的笔","time":853826,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你证明了你可以画画","time":856556,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你可以随意带着笔回去","time":861006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"回家里练习","time":863106,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"甚至展示给其他人","time":864506,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但是实际上，我想给你留下一个最后的想法","time":865676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"今天当你们来在这里时","time":870155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"很多人认为你们不会画画","time":872265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想针对这个问大家一个问题，","time":875801,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"还有哪些信念和限制性的想法","time":878991,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"每天我们都带着？","time":882781,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那些我们有办法挑战","time":886491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和换个角度去思考的信念","time":890491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"如果我们真的挑战那些信念并用不同的角度思考他们","time":892791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"除了画画，还有什么对我们来说是可以做到的呢？","time":896271,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"谢谢大家","time":900691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":901971,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"13589","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"93794","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"1702558","uri":"/profiles/1703609","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/08/0b/0f/527119.jpeg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1360705012.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Mile Živković","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"4513305","uri":"/profiles/4515040","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/04/6c/c4/289988.jpg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1434428969.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Tijana Mihajlović","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"Hi.","time":15411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've got a question for you:","time":16541,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"how many people here
would say they can draw?","time":18071,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":22621,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think we've got about one or two percent
of the hands going up,","time":23751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and it's interesting, isn't it?","time":27291,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's a little bit like people think
of spelling or singing.","time":28801,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They think,"You can either
do it, or you can't."","time":33311,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But I think you can.","time":36771,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because when people say they can't draw,","time":38651,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think it's more to do with beliefs
rather than talent and ability.","time":40565,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I think when you say you can't draw,
that's just an illusion,","time":44285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and today I'd like to prove that to you.","time":48065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When I say "draw",","time":50785,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm not saying we're all going
to draw like Michelangelo.","time":52295,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We are not going to be painting
the Sistine Chapel's ceiling.","time":55265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But would you be happy if,
by the end of this session,","time":58765,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you could draw pictures
a little bit like this?","time":62225,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Audience murmuring) Oh, yes!","time":65525,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":66955,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or even a little bit like this?","time":67855,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":71485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Actually, there are only two things
you need to do to be able to achieve this.","time":72465,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One is have an open mind.
Are you up for that?","time":76335,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Audience) Yes!","time":78545,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And two, just be prepared to have a go.","time":79475,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So grab a pen and a piece of paper.","time":82035,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"OK, so here's how it's going to work:","time":97581,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I’ll show you the first cartoon
we're going to do,","time":101336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so just watch to begin with.","time":103676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here we go.","time":105496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just watching.","time":107227,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's going to be our first cartoon.","time":115139,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's a character called Spike.","time":116949,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'd like you to draw along with me.","time":118549,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'll draw the first line, you draw,
and when you've done that, look up,","time":120509,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I'll know you're ready
for the next line.","time":123929,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Okay, here we go.","time":126279,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Start with the nose.","time":128026,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now the eyes.","time":134729,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They're like 66s or speech marks.","time":136949,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it.","time":144233,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, the mouth. Nice, big smile.","time":146461,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, over here, the ear.","time":152751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, some spiky hair.","time":158480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, put the pen to the left
to the mouth, little line like that.","time":165270,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Pen under the ear, drop a line like that.","time":171881,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Pen to the left of the neck,
top of the T-shirt.","time":177031,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Line to the left, line to the right.","time":181487,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just hold your drawings up
and show everyone.","time":184497,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":186677,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"How are we all doing?","time":187527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":188757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"OK.","time":192458,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"OK, fantastic.","time":200230,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, it looks like you've just learned
to draw one cartoon,","time":202122,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but you've actually learned
more than that;","time":206542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you've learned a sequence
that would enable you","time":208722,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to draw hundreds and thousands
of different cartoons,","time":210922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because we're just going to do
little variations on that sequence.","time":213742,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Have a go at this.","time":217542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Draw along with me.","time":218542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nose.","time":220272,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Eyes.","time":225944,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Smile.","time":234333,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it.","time":237527,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now some hair.","time":238787,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Pen to the left of the mouth,","time":245724,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"under the hair,","time":250671,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"little V-shape for the top,","time":253689,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"line to the left, line to the right.","time":256548,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we've got another character.
Let's call her Thelma.","time":259508,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":262208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, we've got Spike and Thelma.","time":263258,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let's try another one. Here we go.","time":264818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Another little variation.
You're getting the idea.","time":267248,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Starting with the nose.","time":269818,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But this time we'll change
the eyes slightly.","time":274510,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Look, two circles together like that.","time":276980,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it.","time":281260,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Then, two little dots in for the eyes.","time":282280,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this time we'll change
the mouth slightly. Watch.","time":286524,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Little circle colored in there.","time":289692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Have a go at that.","time":292197,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, the ear.","time":295260,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, we'll have some fun
with the hair, watch.","time":300271,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nice curly hair.","time":303441,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Then same thing: pen to the left
to the mouth, little line like that.","time":309201,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Under the ear, drop a line.","time":314251,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Top of the T-shirt.","time":317800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Line to the left, line to the right.","time":319893,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I think we'll call him Jeff.","time":322543,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":324223,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We'll do one more.","time":325790,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"One more go. Here we go.","time":328411,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're getting the idea.","time":330481,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":331751,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So we'll start with a nose again.","time":332531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Notice we're doing little variations.","time":336952,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now we'll change the eyes,
so we've got them apart.","time":338722,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We'll put some little dots in like that.","time":341152,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, the mouth slightly different.","time":347463,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let's put a little V-shape like that.","time":349193,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Triangle.","time":353071,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And a little line across,
and we'll just color this a little bit in.","time":354531,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, watch this bit carefully;
some hair, watch.","time":361996,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here we go, little line like that.","time":364236,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, a bit more there.","time":370500,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And watch, a couple of triangles
to make a little bow.","time":375211,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Triangle at the bottom, rest of the hair.","time":383018,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Pen to the left of the mouth again.
You get the idea.","time":388791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Drop a line for the neck.","time":394560,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now the V-shape.","time":398181,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Line to the left, line to the right.","time":401238,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There we go.","time":404938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let's call her Pam.","time":406485,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":407945,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you've done...","time":409015,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":410005,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you've done four cartoons.
You can have a little rest now.","time":413065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":416615,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Take a rest.","time":417565,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're getting the idea.
All we're doing is little variations.","time":418735,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'll just demonstrate a couple to you.","time":421655,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We could go on all day, couldn't we?","time":423535,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You could do someone
looking unhappy, a bit like that,","time":425285,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or you could experiment with,
perhaps, someone who is…","time":427825,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just draw a straight line,
someone looking a bit fed up.","time":431525,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Or perhaps, you could do anything
you like, really, just try things out.","time":434755,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Look at this. Little squiggle.
There we are.","time":438165,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, all sorts of things we could do.","time":441535,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Actually, one more I'll let you do,
one more idea.","time":443515,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is a great little technique.","time":445985,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Have a go at this: people with glasses on.","time":449203,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Just draw a nose a bit like Spike's.","time":451513,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, draw some frames,","time":456590,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so two circles like that
with a little bit in between.","time":459030,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Now, just put some dots
inside for the eyes like that.","time":463496,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, the ear.","time":469068,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it's little bit like we did before,
but this time we'll join up the frames.","time":471258,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That's it. Watch this bit.","time":477065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":481513,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And this bit I really like. Watch.","time":483718,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":487024,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And then, little bit there.","time":489504,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Pencil under the mustache, line down,","time":493252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"top of the shirt, left and right.","time":498497,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So there we have it.
We could carry on, couldn't we?","time":500922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Hopefully, we've done enough
to convince you","time":503752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that in fact we can all draw.","time":505982,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And not just people here.
I've worked with…","time":509502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to give you three examples
of other people who've learned to draw,","time":513502,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and that actually surprised them, too.","time":518522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to save
what I think is my favorite,","time":520762,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"most surprising example until last.","time":523752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The first example is:","time":526792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've worked a lot with children
and students in schools.","time":528782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Actually the little ones,
they just draw fine,","time":531752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but when they get to about 15 or 16,
most of them think they can't draw.","time":534002,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But I worked with them.","time":537582,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I worked this week in a school","time":538782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"where I was coaching them
on using pictures for memory.","time":540912,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"A girl was trying to remember
what red blood cells do,","time":544242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she drew this little picture","time":548262,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"of a red blood cell
carrying a handbag with O2 on it","time":549862,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to remind her that the red blood cells
carry oxygen to all parts of the body.","time":553242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"That was a great one.","time":557802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The other people I worked with
are many adults in all walks of life,","time":559252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and particularly in business,","time":562552,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they often will want
to make presentations memorable.","time":564782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So again, a quick cartoon or sketch
could be really good for that.","time":568232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And again, most people think
they can't draw, but take this example.","time":572242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Couple of wavy lines,","time":576282,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"little boat could be a metaphor
to represent we're all in this together.","time":581062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So that, if that was just drawn
in the presentation,","time":586942,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"would really stay
in the memory, wouldn't it?","time":589782,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Yeah.","time":592242,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But the third example is -
you shouldn't have favorites, should you?","time":593082,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is my favorite.","time":596292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Have you ever been at the party
when someone asks you what you do?","time":598042,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It gets a little bit skeptical
when people ask me that.","time":601262,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This lady said to me, well -","time":603852,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I said, "I do a little bit of training,
and I teach people to draw,"","time":605772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and she said, "Would you come along
and do some for our group?"","time":609012,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"She said, "I work with some people"
- she was a volunteer -","time":613472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a group of people
who have suffered strokes.","time":616542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I said, "Sure, I could spare
some time for that."","time":619292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I said I would,
and I booked the time in.","time":622472,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Have you ever done that?","time":624532,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You get near of that time","time":625682,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you think,
"What have I let myself in for here?"","time":626882,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Will I be able to do it?"","time":629362,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I thought, "What could I
do with them?" you see.","time":630772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I know. I'll do my cartoon drawing.
They'll like that."","time":633772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But then, as I got near of the time,
I got more apprehensive,","time":637882,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because then I was thinking,","time":640802,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""I've worked with children,
with all sorts of adults;","time":642162,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've never worked with a group like this."","time":644662,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It turns out it was all part
of a charity called TALK.","time":646672,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This TALK charity is a wonderful charity
that helps people who've suffered strokes,","time":650512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but have a particular condition
known as aphasia.","time":655492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You might have heard of aphasia,
sometimes called dysphasia.","time":659492,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"The key thing is it affects
their ability to communicate.","time":663062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So, for example, they might have trouble","time":667252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"reading, writing, speaking,
or understanding.","time":669512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It can be quite an isolating condition;","time":673062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it can be very, very frustrating
and can lead to a loss of confidence.","time":676292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Anyway, so I prepared all this stuff,
what to do for this session","time":680642,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"- for a couple of hours,
tea break in the middle -","time":684772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I got more apprehensive.","time":687132,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But actually, I needn't have worried,","time":689962,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"because I'm going to show you now
the work that they did.","time":691832,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was one of the best things
I've ever done.","time":694542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to show you the first slide.","time":697292,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I taught them Spike,
just like I did for you,","time":699754,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I want you to see the reaction
on their faces when they did this.","time":702644,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Audience) Oh.","time":706745,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"What you can see here
are two of the stroke recoverers","time":709505,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on the left and right,","time":712065,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and one of the volunteer
helpers in the center.","time":713195,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Each stroke recoverer, there are about 36
in the room with volunteers as well,","time":716252,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there's one-to-one helpers.","time":720602,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You can just see the delight
on their faces, can't you?","time":722812,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Let's look at another picture.","time":725512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"This is a gentleman called David,
and he's holding up his picture,","time":728746,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and you can tell it was the picture
of Spike, can't you?","time":732056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"In fact, I think he's drawn Spike
even better there.","time":734786,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But what I didn't realize
until even after the session","time":738046,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"was that the number of the people
in this session, including David,","time":741536,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were drawing with their wrong hand.","time":744706,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"David's stroke meant that it affected
the right side of his body,","time":747922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and he drew with his left hand,
as many did.","time":751752,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Nobody mentioned it to me,
nobody complained.","time":754542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"They just got on with it.","time":757232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was an inspirational session for me.","time":759032,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It was quite a humbling session,","time":761172,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"one of the best things
I felt I've ever done.","time":763232,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"At the end of it, I had a lovely email
from doctor Mike Jordan,","time":765512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and he's the chair of the TALK group;","time":769512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"happens to be a medical doctor,
but he's the chair of the group.","time":771772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"He wrote to me, and I'm quoting, he said,","time":774822,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""Our recoverers learned today
that they can draw.","time":776772,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"It's a bit more than that;","time":781012,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"this sort of activity
really builds their confidence."","time":782532,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I was happy, he was happy,
everyone was happy,","time":785792,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"they've invited me back again,","time":788542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I go in there now
about every three or four months.","time":789972,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So it's great. I thought
that was a lovely example to share.","time":793062,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Fancy one more drawing?","time":796112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Audience) Yes.","time":797382,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here we go. Grab your pens.","time":798302,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Here we go. Right.","time":804121,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm going to get you to draw someone
that you would recognize.","time":806561,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So start with a big nose,
a bit like Spike's.","time":809521,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Next, we'll do some eyes,
and you might be thinking,","time":815791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":""This is also a bit like Spike."","time":822511,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Watch the next bit.","time":824941,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're getting warm.","time":831461,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"There you go.","time":836956,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Little line down there.","time":840754,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Down here.","time":844986,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Little V-shape,
line to the left, line to the right.","time":847076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And you've got Albert Einstein.","time":851076,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":852866,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So you've got the pens with you,","time":853826,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"you've proved that you can draw.","time":856556,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You're very welcome
to take the pens with you","time":861006,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and have a practice at home,","time":863106,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"even show somebody else.","time":864506,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"But actually, I'd like to leave you
with a final thought.","time":865676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"When you walked in here today,","time":870155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"many of you didn't believe
you could draw.","time":872265,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I've got a question for you about that.","time":875801,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"How many other beliefs
and limiting thoughts","time":878991,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"do we all carry around with us every day?","time":882781,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Beliefs that we could perhaps
potentially challenge","time":886491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and think differently about.","time":890491,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If we did challenge those beliefs
and think differently about them,","time":892791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"apart from drawing, what else
would be possible for us all?","time":896271,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you very much.","time":900691,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":901971,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"13589","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

talk__description: In a highly entertaining performance, beatboxer Tom Thum slings beats, comedy and a mouthful of instrumental impersonations into 11 minutes of creativity and fun that will make you smile.

Simplified","internalLanguageCode":"zh-cn","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":{"id":"1861895","uri":"/profiles/1862950","avatar":{"url":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/ted.conferences.profiles/00/00/06/4e/d8/413400.jpeg","generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1368357927.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Shengwei Cai","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"translator":{"id":"1591829","uri":"/profiles/1592866","avatar":{"url":null,"generatedUrl":"https://avatars.ted.com/v1/avatar/1354373464.svg","__typename":"UserAvatar"},"name":{"full":"Julia Xu","__typename":"UserName"},"__typename":"User"},"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"我叫汤姆，","time":155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"今天我来到这里","time":1918,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"向大家坦白交待我的谋生之道","time":5094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"基本上，我靠嘴巴","time":8551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"以特殊的方式来换现金","time":12051,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":14241,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我通常都在闹市区的破酒吧","time":15336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和街角做这事儿","time":18535,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这里可能不算是个合适的地方","time":20158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但我还是想给大家稍微做个示范","time":23254,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"究竟我是从事什么工作","time":27087,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（节奏口技）","time":33685,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好了，下一个节目","time":122108,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要回归经典","time":125776,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（鼓掌）","time":130310,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们要倒退","time":132380,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大步倒退","time":134767,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"回到过去","time":136900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（节奏口技：“比利·简\"）","time":142155,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"♫ 比利·简不是我的情人♫","time":161987,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"♫ 她只是个女孩 声称我就是那个人♫","time":165739,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"♫ 但那孩子不是我的骨肉♫","time":170670,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）好了","time":174643,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"大家好吗","time":181780,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"非常感谢，TEDx","time":184483,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"如果大家还不知道的话","time":186992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我叫汤姆.图姆，我是个口技表演家","time":189522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"也就是说刚刚大家听到的所有声音","time":191743,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"都是由我自己发出的","time":194144,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"纯粹只有我的声音而已","time":197095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可以向大家保证","time":199208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"这个麦克风","time":201150,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"绝对没有加任何的音效","time":205800,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我现在非常非常兴奋","time":211171,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":213328,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"你们可是什么都鼓掌啊，太棒了","time":214669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"看呀，妈妈！我成功了！","time":218423,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"今天能来到这里我很兴奋","time":222831,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"代表所有同仁","time":225907,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"和所有与生俱来能够发出非人的声音","time":227931,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"却还未成功创出一番天地的朋友们","time":231159,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"因为这算是一个利基市场","time":234757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而且这个圈子仍比较冷清","time":237692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"特别是我的家乡","time":240056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我来自布里斯班","time":241542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是个非常宜居的城市","time":242844,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"耶！好嘞！大多数的班城人都来了，很好","time":244522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":247405,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"大家知道我来自班城","time":248922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"是个非常宜居的城市","time":251283,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"但坦白说","time":252990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"那儿不算是南半球的文化中心","time":254361,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以我在其他城市表演","time":258226,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"在其他国家表演","time":261630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我对这一份疯狂热情的追逐","time":263398,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"使得我","time":266493,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去到过世界上很多神奇的地方","time":267863,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"所以，如果可以的话，\n我想和大家分享我的经历","time":270415,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"女士们先生们","time":275758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我将要带大家踏上一段旅程","time":277676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"穿越大洲","time":280649,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"穿越声音","time":282206,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我们的旅途从中央沙漠开始","time":286383,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（模仿迪吉里杜管）","time":290712,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（模仿飞机声音）","time":300686,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"印度","time":304221,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（节奏口技）","time":305641,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（模仿锡塔尔琴）","time":319717,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"中国","time":325087,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（模仿古筝）","time":326872,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（节奏口技）","time":339714,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"德国","time":346513,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（节奏口技）","time":348626,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"派对派对，耶","time":367077,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（笑声）","time":368819,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"在到达本次旅途终点前","time":373930,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"女士们先生们","time":377387,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我想给大家展示一下","time":378990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"从新兴大都市布里斯班带来的一项技术","time":381324,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我面前的这堆东西叫合成器","time":384468,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"它们让我能够用我的声音","time":388632,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"变化出不同效果","time":391660,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"例如，左边这个功能","time":393769,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能够让我的声音有一点混响的效果","time":396267,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"能够让我的声音有一点混响的效果","time":398512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"产生了这样的","time":401609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（模仿喇叭声音）","time":403248,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"效果","time":409480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（笑声）","time":411054,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"而这边这些","time":412406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可以利用合音","time":414112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"模仿电子鼓","time":416198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"或类似的声音","time":419027,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我可以把自己的声音录下","time":420094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"只要按这些就可以回放","time":422957,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"（各种声音）","time":428000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"TEDx","time":441559,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（音乐）","time":447629,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":465791,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"我的手可是闲得不得了啊","time":469908,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"最后","time":474288,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"右边的这个功能让我能够","time":475646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"重复重复重复重复重复重复重复重复","time":478692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我的声音","time":482352,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"以上表演，女士们先生们","time":484959,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要带大家踏上一段旅程","time":488029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"去到一个与这个世界分离的地方","time":490879,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我从悉尼歌剧院穿越到","time":493159,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"一个烟雾缭绕的闹市爵士酒吧","time":495832,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"好了朋友们，开始吧","time":500119,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（音乐）","time":503938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"女士们先生们","time":513482,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要向大家介绍一位特别的朋友","time":515278,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我认识的最伟大的低音歌手","time":516848,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"烟枪杰弗逊先生\n让我们开始吧","time":519052,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（音乐）","time":523606,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"好了，女士们先生们","time":566946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我要向大家介绍这次演出的明星","time":568390,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"我们这个时代最伟大的爵士传奇之一","time":570730,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"音乐和爵士爱好者们","time":573186,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"请大家热烈地鼓掌","time":575787,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"欢迎独一无二的瞄眼汤姆先生。开始吧","time":577970,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（音乐）","time":581729,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":586187,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"谢谢。谢谢大家","time":662330,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（掌声）","time":664417,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1792","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}

{"data":{"translation":{"id":"57748","language":{"id":"35","endonym":"English","englishName":"English","internalLanguageCode":"en","rtl":false,"__typename":"Language"},"reviewer":null,"translator":null,"paragraphs":[{"cues":[{"text":"My name is Tom,","time":155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and I've come here today to come clean","time":1918,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about what I do for money.","time":5094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Basically, I use my mouth in strange ways","time":8551,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"in exchange for cash.","time":12051,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":14241,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I usually do this kind of thing
in seedy downtown bars","time":15336,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and on street corners,","time":18535,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so this mightn't be
the most appropriate setting,","time":20158,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but I'd like to give you guys
a bit of a demonstration","time":23254,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"about what I do.","time":27087,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Beatboxing)","time":33685,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And now, for my next number,","time":122108,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'd like to return to the classics.","time":125776,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":130310,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We're going to take it back,","time":132380,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"way back,","time":134767,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"back into time.","time":136900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Beatboxing: "Billie Jean")","time":142155,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"♫ Billie Jean is not my lover ♫","time":161987,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"♫ She's just a girl who claims
that I am the one ♫","time":165739,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"♫ But the kid is not my son ♫","time":170670,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause) All right.","time":174643,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Wassup.","time":181780,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you very much, TEDx.","time":184483,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"If you guys haven't
figured it out already,","time":186992,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"my name's Tom Thum, and I'm a beatboxer,","time":189522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which means all the sounds
that you just heard","time":191743,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"were made entirely using just my voice,","time":194144,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and the only thing was my voice.","time":197095,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I can assure you","time":199208,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"there are absolutely no effects","time":201150,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"on this microphone whatsoever.","time":205800,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And I'm very, very stoked —","time":211171,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":213328,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You guys are just applauding
for everything. It's great.","time":214669,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Look at this, Mom! I made it!","time":218423,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'm very, very stoked to be here today,","time":222831,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"representing my kinfolk","time":225907,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and all those that haven't
managed to make a career","time":227931,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"out of an innate ability
for inhuman noisemaking.","time":231159,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Because it is a bit of a niche market,","time":234757,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and there's not much work going on,","time":237692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"especially where I'm from.","time":240056,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You know, I'm from Brisbane,","time":241542,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which is a great city to live in.","time":242900,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Yeah! All right! Most of Brisbane's here.
That's good.","time":244522,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":247405,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"You know, I'm from Brizzy,","time":248922,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which is a great city to live in,","time":251283,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"but let's be honest --","time":252990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"it's not exactly the cultural
hub of the Southern Hemisphere.","time":254361,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I do a lot of my work outside Brisbane","time":258226,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and outside Australia,","time":261630,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and so the pursuit of this
crazy passion of mine","time":263398,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"has enabled me to see","time":266493,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"so many amazing places in the world.","time":267863,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So I'd like to share with you,
if I may, my experiences.","time":270415,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So ladies and gentlemen,","time":275758,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I would like to take you on a journey","time":277676,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"throughout the continents","time":280649,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and throughout sound itself.","time":282206,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"We start our journey
in the central deserts.","time":286383,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Didgeridoo)","time":290712,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Airplane)","time":300686,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"India.","time":304221,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Beatboxing)","time":305641,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Sitar)","time":319717,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"China.","time":325087,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Guzheng)","time":326872,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Beatboxing)","time":339714,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Germany.","time":346513,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Beatboxing)","time":348626,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Party, party, yeah.","time":367077,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":368819,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And before we reach our final destination,","time":373930,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"ladies and gentlemen,","time":377387,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I would like to share
with you some technology","time":378990,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"that I brought all the way
from the thriving metropolis of Brisbane.","time":381324,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"These things in front of me
here are called Kaoss Pads,","time":384587,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"and they allow me to do a whole
lot of different things","time":388632,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"with my voice.","time":391660,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"For example, the one on the left here","time":393769,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"allows me to add","time":396267,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"a little bit of reverb to my sound,","time":398512,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"which gives me that --","time":401609,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Trumpet) --","time":403248,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"flavor.","time":409480,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Laughter)","time":411054,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And the other ones here,","time":412406,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I can use them in unison","time":414112,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to mimic the effect of a drum machine","time":416198,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"or something like that.","time":419027,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I can sample in my own sounds
and I can play it back","time":420094,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"just by hitting the pads here.","time":422957,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Noises)","time":428000,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"TEDx.","time":441559,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Music)","time":447629,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":465791,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I got way too much time on my hands.","time":469908,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"And last but not least,","time":474288,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"the one on my right here allows me to","time":475646,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"loop loop loop loop loop loop loop loop","time":478692,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"my voice.","time":482352,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"So with all that in mind,
ladies and gentlemen,","time":484959,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I would like to take you on a journey","time":488029,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to a completely separate part of Earth","time":490879,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"as I transform the Sydney Opera House","time":493159,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"into a smoky downtown jazz bar.","time":495832,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"All right boys, take it away.","time":500119,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Music)","time":503938,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Ladies and gentlemen,
I'd like to introduce you","time":513482,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"to a very special friend of mine,","time":515278,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"one of the greatest

it for a walk. Come on, baby.","time":519052,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Music)","time":523606,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"All right, ladies and gentlemen,","time":566946,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"I'd like to introduce you

legends of our time.","time":570899,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Music lovers and jazz lovers alike,","time":573186,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"please give a warm hand of applause","time":575787,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"for the one and only Mr. Peeping Tom.
Take it away.","time":577970,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Music)","time":581729,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"(Applause)","time":586187,"__typename":"Cue"},{"text":"Thank you. talk__description: On any given day we're lied to from 10 to 200 times, and the clues to detect those lies can be subtle and counter-intuitive. Pamela Meyer, author of "Liespotting," shows the manners and "hotspots" used by those trained to recognize deception -- and she argues honesty is a value worth preserving. (Contains mature content)

感谢大家","time":1101000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"},{"cues":[{"text":"（众人鼓掌）","time":1104000,"__typename":"Cue"}],"__typename":"Paragraph"}],"__typename":"Translation"},"video":{"id":"1246","talkExtras":{"footnotes":[{"author":"Bella DePaulo","annotation":"This study found that “kind-hearted, altruistic lies” make up about 25 percent of “everyday lies,” or what we often call “white lies.” The study also shows that lies about feelings and opinions were the most common types of everyday lies.","date":"2004","linkUrl":"http://smg.media.mit.edu/library/DePaulo.ManyFacesOfLies.pdf","source":"in *The Social Psychology of Good and Evil*, Arthur G. Miller, Guilford Press","text":null,"timecode":"02:13","title":"The many faces of lies","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":null,"annotation":"The most recent figures from the Association of Certified Fraud Examiners show that globally there was an estimated $3.7 trillion lost to fraud.","date":"2014","linkUrl":"http://www.acfe.com/rttn/docs/2014-report-to-nations.pdf","source":"Association of Certified Fraud Examiners","text":null,"timecode":"02:42","title":"2014 Report to the Nations on Occupational Fraud and Abuse","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Jerald Jellison","annotation":"","date":"1977","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/sorry-didnt-mean-other-lies/dp/0894560050?tag=teco06-20","source":"Chatham Square Press","text":null,"timecode":"04:10","title":"*I’m Sorry, I Didn’t Mean To, and Other Lies We Love to Tell*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Robert S. Feldman et al.","annotation":"University of Massachusetts psychologist Robert Feldman conducted an experiment in which he brought two strangers together and videotaped them getting to know each other for ten minutes. Afterward he asked the subjects to watch the tape and indicate when they said something that was “not entirely accurate.” Most participants initially asserted that they had been entirely truthful during their conversation. In fact, though, 60 percent had distorted the truth at least once during those ten minutes — most of them without even realizing it. In one case, a participant had flat-out lied by claiming to be the lead singer in a rock band. How is it possible to lie without knowing it? “People lie almost reflexively,” Feldman says. “They don't think about it as part of their normal social discourse.”\r\n","date":"2002","linkUrl":"http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1207/S15324834BASP2402_8#preview","source":"*Basic and Applied Social Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"04:15","title":"Self-presentation and verbal deception: Do self-presenters lie more?","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Jennifer J. Argo et al.","annotation":"This study found that people are more apt to lie to coworkers than to strangers. There are several theories as to why this might be the case. Some psychologists suggest that people are more protective of their public personas at work than anywhere else partly because the truth can often make us extremely vulnerable. If you reveal a weakness by telling the truth to a stranger, you’ll likely never see that person again, but if you do the same at work, there’s a risk that you’ll permanently alter your coworkers’ perceptions of you. And you’ll have to deal with the consequences forever … or at least until you switch jobs.","date":"June 2006","linkUrl":"http://ideas.repec.org/a/ucp/jconrs/v33y2006i1p99-108.html","source":"*Journal of Consumer Research*","text":null,"timecode":"04:34","title":"Social comparison theory and deception in the interpersonal exchange of consumption information","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Deborah Kashy and Bella DePaulo","annotation":"The researchers asked nearly 150 people to keep a diary of all the lies they told on a daily basis. The biggest liars were people who were \"more manipulative, more concerned with self-presentation and more sociable,\" according to the study.","date":"May 1996","linkUrl":"http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8656334","source":"*Journal of Personality and Social Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"04:40","title":"Who lies?","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Bella DePaulo et al.","annotation":"Interestingly, DePaulo found that men and women \"seemed to be using their lies to impress men and to shield and reassure women.\"","date":"May 1996","linkUrl":"http://smg.media.mit.edu/library/DePauloEtAl.LyingEverydayLife.pdf","source":"*Journal of Personality and Social Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"04:42","title":"Lying in everyday life","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Richard Byrne and Nadia Corp","annotation":"This study defines deception as being able to \"manipulate the behavior of others within the social group without the use of force,\" and explains how deception is a sign of \"cognitive sophistication.\"","date":"August 22, 2004","linkUrl":"http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1691785/","source":"*Proceedings of the Royal Society: Biological Sciences*","text":null,"timecode":"05:42","title":"Neocortex size predicts deception rate in primates","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Robert Mitchell and Nicholas Thompson (Editors)","annotation":"","date":"1986 ","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/Deception-Perspectives-Nonhuman-Deceit-Behavior/dp/0887061087?tag=teco06-20","source":"State University of New York Press","text":null,"timecode":"06:00","title":"*Deception: Perspectives on Human and Nonhuman Deceit*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Vasudevi Reddy","annotation":"The author identifies seven types of deception used by toddlers between six months and three years old, based on interviews with parents and studies of 50 children.","date":"April 29, 2007","linkUrl":"http://rstb.royalsocietypublishing.org/content/362/1480/621.abstract","source":"*Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society: Biological Sciences*","text":null,"timecode":"06:13","title":"Getting back to the rough ground: Deception and 'social living'","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Paul Newton et al.","annotation":"The authors in this study argue that children learn to lie just as they learn to speak.","date":"June 2000","linkUrl":"http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1348/026151000165706/abstract","source":"*British Journal of Developmental Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"06:23","title":"Children's everyday deception and performance on false-belief tasks","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Ralph Keyes","annotation":"This author argues that our modern society is awash in a type of lie that is neither truth nor fiction, but more akin to \"casual dishonesty.\"","date":"2004","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/The-Post-Truth-Era-Dishonesty-Contemporary/dp/0312306482?tag=teco06-20","source":"St. Martin's Press","text":null,"timecode":"06:51","title":"*The Post-Truth Era: Dishonesty and Deception in Contemporary Life*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Mark G. Frank and Paul Ekman","annotation":"This study, which involved male participants who were instructed to lie in interviews about a mock theft of money and about their opinion of capital punishment for a study measuring the lie-detection abilities of others, showed that a nonverbal approach to detecting deception could yield 70 percent accuracy in detecting truths and 90 percent in detecting lies.","date":"1997","linkUrl":"http://web.missouri.edu/~segerti/1050H/docs/Ekman.pdf","source":"*Journal of Personality and Social Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"07:03","title":"The ability to detect deceit generalizes across different types of high-stake lies","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Aldert Vrij","annotation":"This book presents a review of 28 studies on verbal indicators of deception. The review shows eight of the 10 studies dealing with “self-references” found that this verbal characteristic occurs less often in deception than in truth-telling. Studies cited by Vrij on “overgeneralized answers” also finds them to be more common in deception than truth-telling.","date":"2008","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/Detecting-Lies-Deceit-Pitfalls-Opportunities/dp/0470516259?tag=teco06-20","source":"Wiley","text":null,"timecode":"08:13","title":"*Detecting Lies and Deceit: Pitfalls and Opportunities*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Sigmund Freud","annotation":"","date":"1989","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/Introductory-Lectures-Psychoanalysis-Sigmund-Freud/dp/0871401185?tag=teco06-20","source":"Liveright","text":null,"timecode":"08:47","title":"*Introductory Lectures on Psychoanalysis*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"David B. Buller and R. Kelly Aune","annotation":"The authors of this study measured the nonverbal behavior of 130 people, including strangers, friends and \"intimates.\"","date":"Winter 1987","linkUrl":"http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2FBF00987257#page-1","source":"*Journal of Nonverbal Behavior*","text":null,"timecode":"09:07","title":"Nonverbal cues to deception among intimates, friends and strangers","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Paul Ekman and Wallace V. Friesen","annotation":"The authors argue that the body “more truthfully reveals to the observer either how the person actually feels (leakage) or the fact that something is amiss (deception clues).” They show that “this difference between face and body would be limited, however, to situations in which the person is engaged in deception. When there is no deception, when communication is frank, then there should be little difference in the information provided from the face and body.”","date":"1974","linkUrl":"http://www.paulekman.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Detecting-Deception-From-The-Body-Or-Face.pdf","source":"*Journal of Personality and Social Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"09:25","title":"Detecting deception from the body or face","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Henry D. O’Hair et al.","annotation":"The authors explain how “prepared” lies told by liars do a better job concealing their lies than “spontaneous” lies told by otherwise truthful people.","date":"Summer 1981","linkUrl":"http://www.researchgate.net/publication/229803617_PREPARED_LIES_SPONTANEOUS_LIES_MACHIAVELLIANISM_AND_NONVERBAL_COMMUNICATION","source":"*Human Communication Research*","text":null,"timecode":"09:32","title":"Prepared lies, spontaneous lies, Machiavellianism, and nonverbal communication","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Joe Navarro","annotation":"The four domains in the article are:  comfort/discomfort, emphasis, synchrony and perception management.\r\n","date":"June 2003","linkUrl":"http://www.au.af.mil/au/awc/awcgate/fbi/decep_detect_4d.pdf","source":"*FBI Law Enforcement Bulletin*","text":null,"timecode":"09:54","title":"A four-domain model for detecting deception: An alternative paradigm for interviewing","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Maurice E. Schweitzer et al.","annotation":"The authors conclude that \"participants with a win-oriented conflict frame were more likely to use deception and to deceive more egregiously than were participants with a cooperative frame.\"","date":"2005","linkUrl":"http://www.donaldegibson.com/files/Conflict%20Frames_0.pdf","source":"*Journal of Applied Social Psychology*","text":null,"timecode":"10:22","title":"Conflict frames and the use of deception: Are competitive negotiators less ethical?","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Paul Ekman","annotation":"Ekman describes this trait as \"the near irresistible thrill some people feel in taking a risk and getting away with it. Sometimes it includes contempt for the target who is being so ruthlessly and successfully exploited. It is hard to contain duping delight; those who feel it want to share their accomplishments with others, seeking admiration for their exploits.\"","date":"December 2009","linkUrl":"http://www.paulekman.com/uncategorized/duping-delight/","source":"Paul Ekman Group","text":null,"timecode":"11:47","title":"Duping Delight","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Paul Ekman and Wallace V. Friesen","annotation":"In addition to discussing the concept of leakage, Ekman introduces his theory of “micro” facial expressions, which he describes as facial expressions whose “duration is so short that they are at the threshold of recognition unless slow motion projection is utilized.” Ekman explains how the face is one of the best body language indicators. “A frozen, immobile poker face is more noticeable than are interlocked fingers or tensely held feet.”","date":"February 1969","linkUrl":"http://www.paulekman.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Nonverbal-Leakage-And-Clues-To-Deception.pdf","source":"*Journal for the Study of Interpersonal Processes*","text":null,"timecode":"12:36","title":"Nonverbal leakage and clues to deception","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"American Academy of Neurology","annotation":"This study explains that people mistakenly only focus on the lower part of the face when trying to detect deceit, since the upper part of the face tends to carry more meaning.","date":"May 4, 2000","linkUrl":"http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2000/05/000503181624.htm","source":"*Science Daily*","text":null,"timecode":"13:06","title":"Often missed facial displays give clues to true emotion, deceit","category":"article","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Evan Marshall","annotation":"","date":"2003","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/The-Eyes-Have-It-Revealing/dp/0806524456?tag=teco06-20","source":"Citadel Press","text":null,"timecode":"13:48","title":"*The Eyes Have It*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"},{"author":"Allan and Barbara Pease","annotation":"","date":"2006","linkUrl":"http://www.amazon.com/The-Definitive-Book-Body-Language/dp/0553804723?tag=teco06-20","source":"Bantam","text":null,"timecode":"13:53","title":"*The Definitive Book of Body Language*","category":"book","__typename":"Footnote"}],"__typename":"TalkExtras"},"__typename":"Video"}}}
